verse_text: Izibir natoon izrk iya aYeso Kiristi
Ibrahim ne a nye atek Ishaku ne Ishaku tes aYakub. aYakub ne a nye atek aYahuda be ribir ronyining wu.
aYahuda ne a tes aPeres be aZera, anyining ba tEnye aTamar. Ne aPeres ne a nye atek aHeruna, ne aHeruna tes Aram.
Aram ne a nye atek Aminadap. Ne Aminadap tes aNashon, aNashon ne a nye atek aSalmon.
aSalmon nye atek aBowas, anyining wu tEnye aRahap, aBowas ne a nye atek aBida, anyining tEnye aRut, ne aBida tes aZhese.
aZhese ne a nye atek aDauda a tEnye agwm. aDauda ne a tes aSolomon anyining wu tEtsang a nye abining aYuriya.
aSolomon ne a nye atek aRahobom, ne aRahobom nye atek Abizha. Abizha ne a nye atek Asa.
Asa ne a nye atek aYehoshafa, ne aYehoshafa tes aYoram, ne aYoram ne a nye atek aYuziya.
Ne aYuziya tes aYotam. aYotam ne a nye atek Ahas, ne Ahas tes aHezekiya.
aHezekiya ne a nye atek aManasa, ne aManasa tes Amon. Amon ne a nye atek aYosiya.
aYosiya ne a nye atek aZhekoniya be ribir aronyining wu nizen iya a tEkok ner aYahuda nong a tEse te sam ni iben aBabila.
Nama kutseng ba na aBabila: aZhekoniya se tes aSheltiyel, ne aSheltiyel tes aZarubabel.
aZarubabel ne a nye atek Abiyud, ne Abiyud tes Aliyakim. Aliyakim ne a nye atek Azuro.
Azuro ne a nye atek aZadok, ne aZadok tes Akim. Akim ne a nye atek Aliyudu.
Aliyudu ne a nye atek Aleyara, ne Aleyara tes aMatana, ne aMatana ne a nye atek aYakub.
Ne aYakub tes aYusufu a tEnye amitek aMarya aya a tEtes aYeso, aya a tEku yis ye aKiristi.

Kamok anong, izam se kusk be anaas kum be izen Ibrahim ma nizen aDauda. Izam se kusk be anaas kum be izen aDauda ma izen a tEtseng ni iben aBabila. Izam se kusk be anaas be izam a tEne na aBabila ma nizen a tEtes aKiristi gip.
Ana ne kutes aYeso Kiristi se. Nizen iyong anyining nye kanamang kusam aYusufu, a be kafa kum ne an nye kuwnng'e ba, a be kafa'me be Kabik Kazhl'e.
Acam wu aYusufu'me nye aner atek nashn Adakunom, iyong a shim nong a tEte aMarya isum nashn nerawe ba, iyong a nye kanyk nong a tEwon kyn.

A tEse kayr kanyk kayong, iyong amaleka Adakunom b nufu kayr nabos nong a tEf be wu ye, aYusufu, igon aDauda, sang tu fok inyim kusk aMarya kanamang kusam wan ba, kamok kafa wu'me nye kafe Kabik Kazhl'e.
A tEtes igon, wan tEku te riyerek ye aYeso, kamok wu ne a tEshesh nerawe kayr rinn ba.E
Cei ikr na nye nong a tEshining ikng iya Adakunom tEf nanu aner kuzarap, a tEf ye,
Di yin, kanamang tEbe kafa, a tEtes igon, a tEku yis ye Imanuwel. (Imanuwel sor, Adakunom se mak be yir.)E
Nizen aYusufu tEshiming ni ida, a nye kyndi amaleka Adakunom'me tEku tak ayong a sok abining wu nong a tEtseng'e.
Amma aYusufu tsang a ku ren kyndi aner abining ba, ma nama a tEtes igon'e, a tEku yis ye aYeso.
Nama a tEtes aYeso na aBetalami ni iben aYahuda, nizen aHiridus tEnye agwm. ner akak afe EtEren ikng ikak natoon adar ne nabas kuwuruk kunom nong EtEb na aUshalima.
ta se rip ye, Agwm ner aYahuda aya a tEtes ame se ak ? Yir di yir adar wu nabas kuwuruk kunom, iyong ne yir m b yir nong tEku ya yir iben.E
Nizen aHiridus tEfa fok anong, iyong a n kayr kudaam didng, anong ne nerawe aUshalima cicr.
Ayong a tusung gbang atsi ne ner kubsp amok cei, a tEku rip ba kar a tEku tes aKiristi'me.
Ayong a tEku tak ye, Na aBetalami ni iben aYahuda, kamok anong ne aner kuzarap akak zibir ye,
EYin ner aBetalami ni iben aYahuda, yin nye yin ayiik'e kayr gwm aYahuda. kamok kayr yin ne a ta s agwm aya a tana fek ner'i Isarela.EE
Ayong aHiridus yis tsen ame kyn nong a tEku rip ba izen iya adar'e tEwuruk dim. Nama EtEku tak,
iyong a tEtom ba na aBetalami'me ye, Tseng se tsr yin igon'e whiwh. Kum ke yin tu s yin ne yin b tin tak yin, nong mi tEtseng tEsu ku ya iben gip.E
Nama a tEfok ikng iya aHiridus'e tEf, iyong Eya kashn be kutseng ba akon ba, ne adar ba tEtsang Edi nabas kunom tu ku wuruk ame se nashn, ay ba karp. Adar'e nyeseng dim nar kaya igon'e tEku se.
Be kub ba nasa'me, ne Edi igon'e be anyining wu aMarya, iyong Etiguum kaben nong EtEku ya iben. bisik acer ba nong EtEnk izinariya be name ikn a tEyis ye amuur .
A tsang a kutak ba kayr nabos ye, sang EtEgor nufe aHiridus baba ba. Iyong EtEbun nuwp ba ni iren ikak.

Nama tsen ame tEku bun, amaleka Adakunom b nufe aYusufu kayr nabos, a tEf be wu ye, Dorok, sok igon'e be anyining'e nong tEteng tEbe yin ni iben aMasar. Sor yin azong ma izen iya ne mi f be wan, kamok aHiridus tEtsr igon'e nong a tEfr.E
Ayong aYusufu dorok, a tEsok igon ame be anyining'e natuk'ong nong EtEbe na aMasar.
sor azong ma izen iya aHiridus tEku. I se anong, nong a tEshining ikng iya Adakunom tEtsang a f be aner kuzarap wu akak ye, Mi yis igon mi kayr aMasar.E

Nizen iya aHiridus tEren ye tsen ame tEku wk, ayong riy wu beseng. Ayong a sak ye a ra fs inoon atek'e kayr aBetalami ne iwp iya i ta se bubarak cicr, naya na ta se ay afa be kutes ne ya a ta ru raar anong. Kum be izen afe a tEdi adar ame.
Nizen iyong ne ikng iya a tEzibir kayr kufumung Irimiya aner kuzarap shining: A tEf ye,
A fok kut kayr kuwp aRama, kut kanak ne kufe riym didng, aRahila ne a sen tos kamok inoon wu, a rawu kutsesek, kamok na tEkus.E
Nizen aHiridus tEku, amaleka Adakunom b nufe aYusufu na aMasar kayr nabos ye,
Dorok, tEsok igon'e be anyining wu nong tEku bun yin ni iben Isarela, kamok ya afe a tEtsr kutser igon ame n kus.E
Ayong a dorok, a tEsok igon'e be anyining'e nong a tEbun ni iben Isarela.
Amma nizen iya a tEfok ye Akilayus ne ngarak natoon rigwm atek wu aHiridus ni iben aYahuda, a fok inyim a tEku bun amma Adakunom tEku krk kuto na nabos'e, ayong a tirr a tEbe ni iben aGalili.
Ne a tseng a tEse sor nuwp a tEyis ye aNazaret. Anong ne a shining ikng iya ner kuzarap kak tEf ye, A tEku yis ye, afu Nazaret.E
Nizen iyong aYohana aner abatisma b a san kutaas rif Adakunom katse ni iben aYahuda.
Ne a f ye, Shishing yin kuse yin, kamok rigwm kaza m b bubarak.E
Ayu ne a nye aya Ishaya aner kuzarap tEf itak wu ye, Kut aner akak yis kayr katse ye, Nye yin Agwm gwm iren, ku nye yin iren'e cop.EE
Ares aYohana'me tEtes a nye be nakuyng arakumi, ne a rosom kudun kukpa nutin wu. Naya wu nye kubep be ashi ritong.
nerawe aUshalima be fe p aYahuda cicr fe a tEse nikyim Ishng aUrdun ame cicr bs nufu.
bs ne Etaas rinn ba ne a ku nye ba abatisma ni Ishng aUrdun ame.
Nizen wu tEdi ner aFarisi be ner aSadusi whr tEbs nar wu tEse be kunye abatisma'me, a f be ba ye, Yin naban fomong, angan tEtak yin ye, i ru ku teng yin amok Adakunom a tEsaase ?
Nye yin itomong i tana tonong ye yin n shishing yin kuse yin.
Sang yin tu wk yin ace yin be kutrng ye, Ibrahim nye ada yirEba. Won ta ka tak yin, Adakunom ta kyem a sok ata na nong a tin nye Ibrahim inoon.
Kanu katm se ritin kakon'e, koakye kakon ka ta tes kutes kutek ba, a tEtmng a ta te nurng.

Mi ta nye yin abatisma be ashi nong i ta tonong ye yin n shishing yin kuse yin. Amma aner a tana b nama mi ti nar be kukyem, aya mi tana kyem i ra akpatak wu gum ba. A tEka nye yin abatisma be Kabik Kazhl'e ne kurng.
Kube wu se nubk wu. A tEtas wh'me ne a korok iwng'e kayr ingm ne a shosh awh'me be kurng kuya sang ku tana ku ba.E
Nizen iyong aYeso dorok na aGalili a ta be ni Ishng aUrdun nong aYohana tEsu ku nye abatisma.
aYohana shim a tEku roon'e, iyong a f ye, Gyr ke mi b nufuan nong wan tin nye abatisma, ne wan bun i b nunaan ingya a?E
Amma aYeso f be wu ye, I se gyr ta nye yir anong; kamok be anong ne a tEshining yir ikng iya Adakunom ta shim.EAyong aYohana tEku shim'me.
Kum a tEfa nye aYeso abatisma ame ne a wuruk kayr ashi'me, ne kaza wor ka karak ne a di Kabik Adakunom kyndi abp ti tiik ni wu.
Ne kut kukak wuruk naza ye, Wan ne inye Igon'i kaya mi ta shim. Mi fok kusas wu didng.E
Iyong Kabik Kazhl tseng be aYeso kayr katse ne Ishetan su ku bmng.
Nama aYeso tEnye azumi kuks isk inaas, katuk be kunom iyong izong tEku r.
Ishetan b a tEf be wu ye, Ke wan ne i nye Igon Adakunom, t, f be ata na nong Eta te abiredi.E
Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, Ise ni izibir ye: Sang anerawe ta sor be naya tsek ba, amma be koakye kuri rif ri ta wuruk nanu Adakunom.EE
Ne Ishetan ame tseng be wu kayr kuwp aUshalima kuzhl'e ne a ku sak a ta nyeseng nar ka ta se ring ring natoon agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben.
Ne a f be aYeso'me ye, Ke wan ne i nye Igon Adakunom, t, furuk ma kaben. Kamok ise ni izibir ye: EA tEf be maleka wu be agbang kut nong EtEka tnng, ne Eka tor be ibk, fan wan bu rus kutak nuta.EE
Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, Ise ni izibir gip ye: Sang wan tu bmng Agwm gwm wan Adakunom ba.EE
Ne Ishetan ame bun a tseng be wu natoon rifan ri ta se garang didng gbak, nong a tEku tosong rigwm kazatse ne kuyiik'e cicr.
Ne a f be aYeso'me ye, Ikr na cicr mi tEka nk, ke wan tEkpa kaben nong i tin ya iben.E
aYeso f be wu ye, Kam be mi Ishetan! Kamok ise ni izibir ye, Agwm gwm wan Adakunom ne wan tEku ya iben ne i ku nye itomong wu zr tsek.EE
Iyong Ishetan tEku won. maleka b nong a tin sak riy na aYeso ame.
Nizen aYeso tEfok ye an te aYohana ni itsm, iyong a tEku bun ni iben aGalili.
A won aNazaret nong a tEbe na aKapanum be kusor, ku tase nanu kudung, ni igak kaben aZebulun ne aNaptali,
nong a tEshining ikng iya Ishaya tEf, ye:
Kaben aZebulun ne kaben aNaptali, yin i tEse yin nabas agbang kudung, a ta tar Ishng aUrdun. Ne kaben aGalili nabas aya sang a tEnye ner aYahuda ba.
fe a ta sor na awhi an di agbang akanang; fe a ta sor na nawu riku akanang min wuruk ni ba.E
Kum be izen iyong aYeso san awazi, ye; Shishing yin kuse yin kamok rigwm kaza m b bubarak.E
Nizen aYeso tEse be kutseng nukim Kudung aGalili, iyong a di aner be aronyining, aSiman a tEku yis ye aBitrus ne aronyining wu Adarawus. sen te agunung ba kayr kudung, kamok ba nye fe kuyising izos.
Ne aYeso f be ba ye, B, ni kuus yin, mi tEka sak yin tin bs yin be nerawe.E
Gbashak, Ewor Ewon agunung ba ame, nong Eta kuus aYeso.

aYeso tEfa ya kashn be kutseng ne a di aner be aronyining, aYakub igon aZabedi ne aronyining wu aYohana. se kayr kukpara ashi be ada ba aZabedi'me, Eta se be kunye kanyk agunung ba, ne aYeso ku yis ba,
ne a wor a won kukpara ashi ame be ada ba nong Eta kuus aYeso.
aYeso gorok kaben aGalili cicr ne a bsp nerawe'me kayr atu aduwa ba, ne a ku taas ba Rif Ritek natoon rigwm kaza. Ne a sak fe irk iriri me tEte atser.
Anong, itak wu tseng cei ma ni iben aSuriya ne Eku bs be fe irk zr zr cicr ne fe Eta se risam didng, ne fe amaan nabik be fe kurk kucicirim ne fe a tEw abas azining. A tEsak ba EtEte atser.
Rigwm nerawe whr nes na aGalili ne kaben ka ta be iwp kusk be afa ne fe aUshalima be fe iben aYahuda ne fe a ta tar Ishng aUrdun cicr bs nufu.
aYeso tEfa di rigwm nerawe whr tEnyim, iyong a ngarak natoon kawhanang kakak nong a tEsonong. limazhiri wu tseng nufu,
ayong a san ku kabsp ba'me ye:
ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta ren kuraar ba kayr kabik, kamok rigwm kaza nye rifuba.
ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta se kayr riy riwe, kamok Adakunom tEku tsesek ba.
ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta mees rice ba, kamok ba ne EtEya kazatse.
ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta be ifeng ne Eshim kunye ikr iya i ta se gyr nashn Adakunom, Adakunom tu ku nk ba ikr ife ba tEshim'e.
ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta be kur riy kamok Adakunom tEr riy ba gip.
ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya ay ba ta se zhl, kamok ba ne a tEdi Adakunom.
ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta shim kugung rice, kamok a tEku yis ba ye inoon Adakunom.
ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a tu ku tabak ba kamok ba nye ikr iya i ta se gyr nashn Adakunom, rigwm kaza nye rifu ba.
ner riy rikan ne Enye ner aya nerawe ta ka kas yin, ne Eka nk yin risam, ne Eti bs abs natoon yin, kamok mi.
Nye yin adidngdng be riy rikan kamok agbang ishorong yin se naza, kamok anong ne Etabak ner kuzarap aya a tEbs nashn yin.
Yin ne i nye yin itk kazatse. Ke itk kam be kurereng wu, a ta nye ne an nong i ta bun i rereng ? A ta bin nye ikng ikak ba, ma ke a ta nyosong, ne nerawe shsh.
Yin ne i nye yin akanang kazatse, kuwp kuya a tEnk na agarang ku ta buruk ba.
A te kurng na apitila, ne a bun a whn ba. A sak na agarang nong koangan a tana n ta di akanang'e.
Kamok anong, won akanang yin tu ya kanang nashn nerawe, nong ke Edi kunye yin kutek ne EtEkerek Ada yin a ta se kayr kaza.
Sang yin tu di yin ye mi b nong ta be birik ikng iya Itsi aMusa ta f be rif ner kuzarap agbugbang'e ta f ba, Mi b nong ta birik ba, amma nong ta shining rif ba'me.
Katsak'e, ne mi ta ka tak yin, kaza be kaben tEgang, ko kaban ikng ikak ihiir'e kayr afumung na ta wei ba, ma koakye a ta f shining.

Koangan ne a won ikng ikak ihiir'e kayr Itsi na nong a ta bsp nerawe'me anong, a tEku yis ye, kaba hiir'e kayr rigwm kaza, amma aner aya ne a ta kuus ikr'me cei ne a bsp nerawe'me anong, a tEku yis ye, agbang aner kayr rigwm kaza.
Won ta ka tak yin, sang ke kunye yin kutek nar kufe ner kubsp Itsi be ner aFarisi ba, T, yin tEn yin kayr rigwm kaza ba ko cik.
Yin fok yin a tEf be nerawe agbugbang ye, 'Sang tu fr akak ba, aner aya ne a fr akak, a tEku t amok!

Amma mi f be yin kyrna'me ye, aner aya ne riy wu beseng be aronyining wu, a tEku t amok. Koangan ne a f be aronyining wu ye a nye Azizik'eEa tEtseng be wu nashn kk kashn. Koangan ne a yis afudang ye, Afunam akak,Ea kyem ke a n kayr kasa kurng.
Kamok anong, ke wan sen nk abeko wan nashn abagadi'me, wan ra yiring ye aronyining wan be ikng ikak be wan,
T, ne wan sak abeko wan'ong azong nizham, nong ta be nufe aronyining wan'e, sen sak yin nizham, ne i ma b nk abeko'me.

Ke akak sen tseng be wan nar amok, nye zizirik nong tin sak yin be wu ni iren nizham ta ra n yin nutu amok'e. Ke anong ba a ta tseng be wan nar amok'e ne aner amok'e ka won nubk fe itomong wu, kashim ne a ka te ni itsm.
Katsak'e, ne mi ta tak, wan ta kyem i wuruk ba, ma ke wan karang kutiming'e cei nizham.
Yin fok yin a tEf ye, Sang tu nye rikuna ba.E
Amma kyrna'me, mi ta tak yin ye, koangan ne a di aner abining a shim kayr riy wu ye ke wu men be wu, a nye rikuna be wu kayr riy wu.
Ke rinyisi abas kubk riya wan tEsak nong tEnye rinn, tun nong ta barak! I tEnar wan ti wei ribir kurm wan be kurm wan cicr tana n kayr kasa kurng.
Ke kubk riya wan tEsak wan tEnye rinn, tun nong ta barak. I tEnar wan ti wei ribir kurm wan be kurm wan cicr tana n kayr kasa kurng.
A bun a f ye, Koangan ne a tEkam be abining wu, a ru ku nk kufumung kukam kuwnng dim.E

Amma kyrna'me, ikng iya mi ta sen f be yin se ye, ke aner akak kam be abining wu ye, sang ke ise ye abining'e nye rikuna ba, t, i te kyndi wu ne a tu te kayr rikuna'me ingya. Aner aya ne a sok abining'e, a nye rikuna.
Anong gbak, yin fok yin a f be tukop yir ye, Sang tu shu natoon abs ba, amma shining kunk kut wan tEnye be Agwm gwm.E
Amma ikng iya mi ta f yin se ye, Sang tu shu yin ba ko cik, ko be kaza, kamok kaza nye kar itsik rigwm Adakunom.
Sang tu shu ko be kaben ba, kamok kaben nye ikng kusaas atak Adakunom, ko be aUshalima kamok azong ne a nye kuwp Agbang Agwm.
Sang tu shu be rice wan ba, kamok wan ta kyem i sak kakuyong kazining ta te kakan ka kawe ba.
Ikng iya yin tana f yin tsek nye, EiEka WayoEayi. Koakye i ta bun i nar anong ne nufe Amaan aner.
Yin fok yin a tEf ye, Rinyisi natoon rinyisi, rinyi natoon rinyi.E
Amma ikng iya mi ta f be yin kyrna se ye, Sang tu rayin aner aya a tEka nye yin anyas ba. Ke aner akak ta rus nufok kukak, ne wan ku kirik kufe afa.
Ke aner akak tseng be wan nar amok, a ti shan kukpiin wan, ne wan ku nk ma be agbang kukpiin wan gip.
Ke aner akak f ye ma wan ra su ku sak ni iren akilomita azining, ne wan tseng be wu akilomita afa.
Ke aner akak ta rip ikng ikak, ku nk. Ke aner akak b kutsr ikp nufuan, sang tu won dar i ku nk ba.
Yin fok yin a tEf ye, Shim ferim wan ne i di mudn wan kyr.E
Amma mi f be yin kyrna'me ye: Shim yin mudn yin, ne nye yin fe Eta ka tabak yin aduwa.
Kamok be nong ne yin tEte yin inoon Ada yin afe a ta se kayr kaza. Wu nk maan anerawe ne ner atek akanang kunom cicr, ne a nyesek iza natoon nerawe wu ya a ta be kuse kutek be ya a ta nye amaan'e.
Kamok ke yin shim yin ya a ta ka shim yin tsek, ishorong aky ne yin ta s yin nufe Adakunom ? Anong ne fe kushashang itsm iben nye gip.
Ke yin nye shou yin ferim yin tsek, t, aky ne yin nye yin ife ita nar ife ribir nerawe ? furin gip Enye anong.
Kamok anong, shining yin, kyndi Ada yin afe a ta se kayr kaza ta shining.
Nye yin tatan, fan kunye kutek yin bu se nong nerawe tEdi. Ke yin nye yin anong yin ta s yin ishorong nufe Ada yin aya a tase kayr kaza ba.

Kamok anong, izen iya ne yin nk yin aner aya a ta se kayr kutsr, sang tu tsang i taas yin kyndi kardak ner ta nye natu aduwa ni ikim iren nong Eta s kuyiik nufe nerawe ba. Won ta ka tak yin katsak'e, ba n s ishorong ba cei nakuruk.
Amma ke yin ta tobok yin aner aya a tase kayr kutser, t, sang akak tu ren ikng iya wan ta sen nye'me ba,
nong as kutobok yin ta se nunrng. Ada yin afe a ta di ikng iya a tEnye nunrng tEka nk yin ishorong yin.

Izen iya ne yin tEnye yin aduwa, sang tu nye yin kyndi kardak ner ta nye ba, kamok ba shim kunye aduwa nunyeseng kayr atu aduwa ba ni ikim iren nong nerawe ta ka di ba. Won ta ka tak yin katsak'e, ba n shan ishorong ba cei nakuruk.
Amma ke wan tEnye aduwa, n kayr kutu wan ne i whn kanukutu ne i nye aduwa wan be Ada wan aya a tu ku di ba. Ada wan aya a ta di ikr iya a tEnye nunrng, tEka nk wan ishorong wan.
Ke ta nye yin aduwa, sang tu yiir itoos yin ikng izining ba, kyndi furin ta nye ba, ba di ye EtEku fok ba kamok ba ta nye aduwa asp.
Sang tu nye yin kyndi ba ba, kamok Ada yin ren ikng iya yin ta shim yin nizham yin tEru ku rip yin.
Ana ne yin ta nye yin aduwa, EAda yir afe a ta se kayr kaza, won riyerek wan tu sor zhl,
rigwm wan tu b, a tu nye ikng iya wan ta shim kayr kazatse, kyndi a ta nye kayr kaza.
Ni nang yir naya kuya koakye katuk,
Ni rng yir rinn yir, kyndi yir tErng yir ya afe a tin nye yir rinn.
Sang tu tseng be yir nar kaya yir tana taam yir ba, ni shesh yir nubk Amaan Aner. [Kamok rigwm be kukyem ne kuyiik nye kufuan ma izen izen. Anong!]E

Katuk kakak, aZakariya t se be itomong ritsi kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben, kyndi i ta se ni ign ba.
A t ku kasa be kubarak ikiriwhr, kyndi ign kukasa atsi ta se, nong a t se n kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e nong a t shosh name a ta be ikn itek.
Izen kushosh name'me t fa nye, rigwm nerawe fe kuya Adakunom iben cei se nufang ninye aduwa.
Ayong amaleka Adakunom ti wuruk na aZakariya'me, a nyeseng nabas kubk riya kyndi kar a t ku shosh ikr ikn'e.
Nizen iya aZakariya t ku di, a te febek, ne inyim ku r didng.
Amaleka'me f be wu ye, Sang tu fok inyim ba, aZakariya, an fok aduwa wan. Abining wan Alisabatu t ka tes igon, wan t ku te riyerek ye aYohana.
A t sor ikng riy rikan didng nufuan. nerawe whr t nye riy rikan kamok kutes wu.
Kamok a t se yiik nashn Adakunom, a t s kugbr ka ikng iya i tana ku sak a t feng ba. A t ku shining be Kabik Kazhl'e kum nutes wu.
A t sak nerawe Isarela whr t ku bun nufe Adakunom ba.

A t tseng nashn Agwm gwm kayr kabik be kukyem kuri kufe Iliya nong a t sak ay tek inoon t ku bun ni inoon ba, ne a sak ya a ta shonong, ta kuus kutseng aner a ta se gyr nashn Adakunom. A t sak nerawe t nye kanyk kamok Agwm gwm.
Ayong, aZakariya rip amaleka'me ye, Mi t san an t ren ye iyu nye katsak ? Mi n kop, abining'i gip an b ay didng.
Ne amaleka'me f be wu ye, Mi ne i nye aGyebel. Mi se nashn Adakunom. A min tom nufuan nong t ka tak Rif Ritek na.
Kyrna, wan t te agbanu, t kyem i f kanu ba, ma izen iya ne rif na shining, kamok wan ti nk katsak rif mi ba, ri t shining be katsak ke izen'e nye.
nerawe daam didng be kutor aZakariya, kamok aZakariya'me mak a sor didng kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e.
Nizen iya a t wuruk, a ba kyem a f kanu be ba ba. nerawe ma ren ye Adakunom mu ku tonong ikng ikak kayr agbang kutu'me, kamok a kpaan kuf be ibk, a kyem a f kanu ba.
Izen kunye itomong wu t fa gang, a t bun kari.
Nama izen cik ne abining wu Alisabatu be kafa, yong a yiir insk rice wu ma ifn itoon.
Ayong Alisabatu'e f ye, Agwm gwm ne a ti nye iyu, nizen na ne a ti tonong ritek wu ne a ni tun kayr isum nashn nerawe.
Nizen iya kafa Alisabatu'me t se ifn igataar, Adakunom tom amaleka wu aGyebel na aNazaret, kayr kuwp kukak niben aGalili,
nufe agbik kanamang kakak, ka t tsang ka sak ka t nye kuwnng be aner akak riyerek wu t nye aYusufu. A nye aner kasa aDauda, a t nye agwm. Riyerek agbik kanamang'e nye aMarya.
Amaleka'me tseng nufu a t se f be wu ye, Dazha, Agwm gwm se mak be wan, a ma ka nk agbang ritek wu.
aMarya daam didng be rif wu'me, a yiir kut'me ka aky kuri ashou'ong'e.
Ayong amaleka'me f be wu ye, Sang wan tu fok inyim ba, aMarya, wan n s ritek Adakunom.
Wan t shan kafa, t tes igon kamitek'e, a t ku te riyerek ye, aYeso.
A t se yiik, ne a ku yis ye, Igon Adakunom ayiik'e. Agwm gwm yir Adakunom t ku nk itsik rigwm atukop wu aDauda.
A tin i nye rigwm nasa aYakub ma izen izen, rigwm wu t gang zr ba.
Ayong aMarya t ku rip ye, I t san'e an i t se anong, sang mi tan ren aner amitek ba ?
Ayong amaleka'me f be wu ye, Kabik Kazhl'e tin tiik natoon wan ne kukyem Adakunom ka kis. Kamok anong, a t yis azhl'e ayong, wan tana tes'ong ye Igon Adakunom.
Afuri wan Alisabatu, t s igon ko be rikp wu'ong gip, wu aya sang a t kun tes ba, se be kafa, kufn wu kufe igataar na.
Kamok ikng ikak nar agap Adakunom ba.
Ayong aMarya f be wu ye, Mi nye asam Adakunom, won i tu se anong be mi kyndi wan t f. Ne amaleka'me tseng a t ku won.
Nizen iyong aMarya dorok a t nye kanyk nong a t tseng zizirik nuwp kukak kayr nawhanang iben aYahuda.
A n nasa aZakariya nong a t nye Alisabatu ashou.
Alisabatu t fa fok ashou aMarya'me ne igon'e, naka borok be agap kayr kafa wu. Ne a shining Alisabatu be Kabik Kazhl'e.
Ayong Alisabatu t kut, a t f ye, Wan nye aner aya i ta s ritek Adakunom kayr nyining, igon wan tana tes nye aner aya a ta s ritek Adakunom gip.
Aky sak mi s ritek Adakunom ana, ang Agwm gwm mi kusum t b nunaan ?
Kum mi t fa fok ashou wan, ne igon ka ta se nafa mi naka borok be riy rikan.
Aner aya a ta s ritek Adakunom ne a nye wan aya i tin nk katsak ye, ikng Agwm gwm t f be wan t shining.
Ayong aMarya f ye, Riy mi sen kerek Adakunom mi.
Ne kabik'i nye riy rikan be Adakunom aner kashesh'i.
Kamok wu ti sak riy ni imees rice asam wu tin se kayr'e. Kyrna ma izen izen, koakye izam tin yis ye, aner aya a ta s ritek Adakunom.
Kamok wu aya a ta nye ayiik'e min nye agbang ikr, riyerek wu se zhl.
Kur riy wu se natoon fe a ta fok inyim wu, ma izam izam.
A nye ayiik ikr be ibk wu. A sak fe a ta be kuka tsik kayr ay ba n te shaam.
A tisik gwm natoon tsik rigwm ba, a tiyiik fe a ta mees rice.
A sak fe a ta fok izong ta whas be ikr itek, a ro rum dar ikng ikak.
A min s asam wu Isarela, ne a yiring be wu a ta fok kur riy wu,
ne Ibrahim be nabon wu ma izen izen, kyndi wu t f be da yir.
aMarya sor be Alisabatu kyndi ifn itaar nizham a t ra kubun kari.
Izen t fa nye Alisabatu tana tes igon'e, yong a tes igon kamitek'e.
fegbak wu ne afe iri wu t fa fok ye, Agwm gwm n fok kur riy wu didng, yong t s mo be riy rikan.
Nama inom ikara be kutes'e, b nong t nye igon'e izhak, shim ke t yis be riyerek atek wu, aZakariya.
Amma anyining igon'e f ye, Wayo, a t ku yis ye, aYohana.
Ayong f be wu ye, Akak kuse kayr afe iri wan ta be riyerek'ong baŔ
Ayong rip atek igon'e be ibk ye ka wu shim a t yrk igon'e angan ?
A f ye a ru ku nk ikng izibir, ne a zibir ye, Riyerek'e nye aYohana. Koangan te zhing.
Nizen iyong aYohana bun a kpaan kuf kanu, yong a san kukerek Adakunom.
fegbak'e te zhing. nerawe yiir kuf itak natoon ikr na cei niwp i ta se nawhanang niben aYahuda.
Koangan aya a t fok itak'e daam kayr riy wu, ne a ma t ye, K igon'e t te aky ? Kamok kukyem Adakunom se mak be wu.
A shining ada wu aZakariya be Kabik Kazhl'e yong a nye kuzarap ye,
Nakerek nye nafe Ada Adakunom ner Isarela, kamok an b an shesh nerawe wu.
A min nk yir aner kashesh aya a ta be kukyem, kayr kasa asam wu aDauda.
Kyndi wu t f ni nanu ner kuzarap wu azhl'e agbugbang'e.
Ye, wu tin shesh yir nubk mudn yir ne ya a tin di yir kyr cei.
A fok kur riy da yir, ne a yiring be rif wu rizhl'e riya sang a tana bur ba,
be kushu a t nye be ada yir Ibrahim ye,
a tin shesh yir nubk mudn yir, nong a tin sak yir t ku nye yir itomong dar inyim
kayr kuse kuzhl'e ne kunye kutek nashn wu nusor yir cei.
Wan, igon'i, a t ka yis ye aner kuzarap Adakunom Ayiik'e, wan t tseng nashn Agwm gwm nong t nye kanyk iren kamok wu.
A t nk nerawe wu kuren itak kashesh kayr kurng rinn ba,
kamok kur riy Adakunom yir, ne akanang kashesh a ta ne naza tin wuruk ni yir
nong ku ta tonong fe a ta se kayr awhi be fe a ta se na nawu riku akanang. Ne a ni tonong yir iren i ta b be kameneng riy.
Ne igon'e rasak, ne ka kpa agap kayr Kabik. A sor kayr katse ma izen iya a tin wuruk kanang natoon nerawe Isarela.
Nizen iyong agbang agwm a t ku yis ye aKaisar Agusta nk itsi ye a ra fa nerawe niben aRom cicr.
Iyu ne i nye imsng ifa nerawe a t nye nizen iya aKiriniyus t nye agwmna niben aSuriya.
Koangan be nuwp wu nong a t su ku fa.
Ayong aYusufu gip a dorok na aNazaret niben aGalili, a t be niben aYahuda nuwp aDauda, a ta yis ye aBetalami, kamok wu nye aner kasa aDauda.
A tseng azong nong t su ku fa be aMarya, kanamang kusam wu ame, ne ka se be kafa.
Nizen t se azong, izen kutes'e nye,
yong a tes acam, igon imsng wu. A kunung be tan ares nong a t mees nukpara a tin korok itsamang naya, kamok ba s kasa nar tsen t ku tisik ba.
fe kufek tuse t sor niwng bubarak azong ne yrk tsamang ba natuk.
Amaleka Adakunom ti wuruk niba ne akanang kuyiik Adakunom ku gorok ba ma inyim t r ba didng.
Amma amaleka'me f be ba ye, Sang tu fok yin inyim ba, mi ma ka bn yin Rif Ritek rif riy rikan didng, riya ri ta nye rif nerawe cicr.
Katuur a ma ka tes yin aner kashesh nuwp aDauda, wu ne a nye aKiristi, aya a ta nye Agwm gwm.
Ikng iya yin tana san i di yin nye, igon a tan kunung be tan ares nameneng kayr kukpara a tin tes itsamang naya.
Nizen izining rigwm maleka fe a ta se kayr kaza wuruk nong t kerek Adakunom mak be amaleka ame ye,
Kuyiik nye kufe Adakunom aza kayr kaza, nazatse kameneng riy kuse nufe ner fe wu ta shim.
Nizen iya maleka'me t ku won ba nong t ku bun naza, fe kufek ame f ye, I tseng yir na aBetalami nong ta se di yir ikng Adakunom t min tak yir na.
Iyong tseng zizirik ne se s aMarya be aYusufu be igon ame an mees kayr kukpara a tin tes itsamang naya ame.
Nizen fek ame t di igon'e yong tsang taas ikng iya ba t fok natoon igon'e.
nerawe ya a t fok itak cicr korok ibk nafok ne te zhing.
aMarya sak ikr'me cei kayr riy wu, ne a ni t natoon'e.
fek ame t bun ne tsang tiyiik Adakunom ne ku kerek kamok ikr ba t fok ne di cei, kyndi a t ku tak ba.
Nama inom ikara be kutes'e, izen a tana ku nye izhak t fa nye, yong a t ku te riyerek ye, aYeso, riyerek riya amaleka t tsang a ku te'me kum ne an be kafa wu ba.
Izen a tana ku kusu ba nama kutes t nye, kyndi Itsi aMusa ta f, yong aYusufu be aMarya tseng be aYeso na aUshalima nong a t nk nashn Agwm gwm.
Kyndi i t se kayr izibir Itsi Agwm gwm ye, Koakye igon kamitek'e kafe imsng'e t sor Kazhl'e kafe Agwm gwm.
Ne nye asidaka bp afa ka zip ifa ayi kyndi Itsi Agwm gwm t f ye ra nye.
T, aner akak tuse na aUshalima a t ku yis ye aSiman, afe a t se gyr nashn Adakunom, ne a nye Adakunom itomong. A se be kutor afe a tana b a tsesek Isarela. Kabik Kazhl'e se mak be wu.
Kabik Kazhl'e tsang ka ku tonong ye sang wu t tsang a ku ba, ma a di aKiristi'me, aya Agwm gwm t kasa.
Kabik'e t ku ra riy, yong a n nubang agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben, izen iya atek igon'e t b be igon ba aYeso ame, nong a t ku nye ikng iya Itsi ba t f.
Ayong aSiman t shan a t ku kunung, ne a kerek Adakunom ne a f ye,
Agbang Agwm gwm, kyndi wan t tsang i f, kyrna won asam wan tu tseng caang.
Kamok mi n di kashesh wan be anyisi mi,
Kaya wan t nye kanyk'e nanyisi nerawe cei.
A ta nye akanang afe a tana tonong ner aya sang a ta nye ner aYahuda ba, katsak, ne a bn nerawe wan Isarela kuyiik.
Atek igon be anyining'e te zhing be ikng iya a t f natoon igon'e.

Ne aSiman ku te ba kuc a t f be aMarya anyining igon'e ye, Adakunom tsang a sak igon na t sak nerawe Isarela akak tu ku bun kama, ne a sak kak ta ya kashn. A t sor ikng nerawe tanin f imaan'e natoon wu,
nong a s a t ts kutrng nerawe whr, ne ikng'e t ya riy didng gip.
Abining akak a t nye kuzarap tuse azong gip, riyerek wu nye aHanatu angas aPanuwel irem Ashiru. A tsang a kop didng, a te ay kanataar be amitek wu
ne amitek'e ku. A sor akumung ma ay isk ikara be anaas, a kam be agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben zr ba. A yiir ya Adakunom iben katuk be kunom ne a nye azumi be aduwa.
A b nufuba nizen iyong, a t kerek Adakunom, ne a f rif natoon igon'e nufe ya a t sor ne tor t di aya a tana sheshek aUshalima.
Nizen aYusufu be aMarya t fa gang i nye ikr Itsi Adakunom t shim cei, t bun na aGalili t be nuwp ba na aNazaret.
Igon'e rasak ne ka kpa agap a t shining be kukyem ne ritek Adakunom se mak be wu.
Koakye riy tek aYeso tseng na aUshalima kamok riy rikan izen aPasova.
Nizen aYeso t se ay kusk be afa, atek wu tseng be wu nar riy rikan kyndi ign ba t f.
Nama t gang riy rikan'e, tek aYeso'me t sen kubun kari, aYeso tu fan na aUshalima, ba ren ba.
sor ye a se mak be ba, ma woso kutseng ne san i ku tsr kayr fe iri be ferim ba.
t fa ku di ba, ne kubun na aUshalima nong t su ku tsr.
Nama inom itaar t s kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben nusonong natite ner kubsp, ne a ka foos ba ne a ku risim ba.
Koangan afe t ku fok, te zhing kamok kuren ikng wu be kuri kushiish wu t shiish.
Atek wu t fa ku di ne a te zhing, ne ang wu f be wu ye, Igon'i, aky sak wan ti nye yir'e ana ? Yir be ada wan i kun daam yir be ku ka tsr yir makiyi.
Ayong a t ku rip ba ye, Aky sak yin tsang i ni tsr yin ? Yin ren yin ye gyr ke mi se nasa Ada mi aa?
Amma ba ren ikng wu tin f natoon'e ba.
Ayong a tseng na aNazaret mak be ba ne a kuus ikng iya ba t f. Ang wu saas ikr'me kayr riy wu cei.
Ayong aYeso ti barang kurasak ne kukyem, ne a kpa kati kaseng nashn nerawe ne Adakunom.

Nizen aKaisar aTibariya ta se kayr riy rif kusk be atoon be rigwm wu, aBuntus Bilatus nye agwmna iben aYahuda, ne aHiridus nye agwm iben aGalili ne aronyining wu aFilibus nye agwm iben Ituriya be aTarakunitus, ne aLisaniya nye agwm iben Abiliya.
Nizen iya aHanana be aKayafas t nye gbang tsi, rif Adakunom b nufe aYohana igon aZakariya kayr katse.
A tsang a tseng niben aUrdun cei ne a f rif natoon abatisma kushishing kuse nong a t ku rng ba rinn.
Kyndi i ta se ni izibir kayr kufumung Ishaya aner kuzarap ye, Kut aner akak yis kayr katse ye, Nye yin Agwm gwm iren, ku nye yin iren'e cop.
Nar na ta se surung a t shining be iben, Koakye kawhanang be agung a t yirik. Iren i ta se gordok, i t te riyong, Iren i ta risik i t te itek.
nerawe cei t di kashesh Adakunom.
aYohana f be rigwm nerawe a t bs nufu nong a tu ku nye ba abatisma ye, Yin naban afomong! Angan t tees yin ye i ra teng yin amok Adakunom a t saase ?
Nye yin kunye kuya ku tana tonong ye yin n shishing yin kuse yin, sang tu wk yin rice yin ye Ibrahim ne a nye ada yin ba. Mi ta tak yin, Adakunom ta kyem a sok ata na, a tin nye Ibrahim inoon.
Kanu katm se ritin kakon'e kyrna, koakye kakon ka ta tes kutes kutek ba, a t tmng a t te nurng.
Ne rigwm nerawe'me ku rip ye, T, aky ne yir ta nye yir ?
Ayong aYohana f ye, Aner aya a ta be akpiin afa a ra kabak be afe a ta be ba, afe a ta be naya ra nye anong gip.
fe kushashang itsm iben bs nong t ka nye ba abatisma gip, ne rip ye, Aner kubsp, aky ne yir ta nye yir ?
Ayong a f be ba ye, Sang tu ba shan yin ikng i ta gor iya a t f ye i ri shashang yin ba.
Ne sozha kak ku rip ye, Aky ne yir t nye yir ? Ne a f be ba ye, Tin shashang yin itsm nufe akak be agap ka tin bs yin naborok na nerawe ba, nifan yin nitsm a ta ka karang yin.
nerawe se be kutor kub aKiristi, ne nibrng kayr ay ba ye ka aYohana ne a nye aKiristi'me ?
aYohana f be ba ye, Mi ta nye yin abatisma be ashi, akak afe a ta be kukyem ne a ni nar, t b, afe mi tana kyem i bis idun akpatak wu ba. A t ka nye yin abatisma be Kabik Kazhl'e ne kurng.
Kube wu se nubk wu, a tanin tas alikama a tan shsh, ne a tusung iwng'e kayr ingm, ne a shosh wh'me be kurng kuya sang a tana riming ba.
aYohana nk nerawe iriri itabak be agap ne a ku nye ba awazi.
aYohana tigba aHiridus a t nye agwm, kamok aHiridus'e sok aHirudiya a ta nye abining aronyining wu ne ikr imaan'e ikak wu tan nye.
aHiridus ti barang amaan kunye ne a te aYohana nitsm.
Nizen iya a t nye nerawe'me abatisma cei, a nye aYeso'me gip. aYeso ta se be i nye aduwa, kaza karak,
ne Kabik Kazhl'e kyndi abp ni tiik ni wu. Ne kut ne naza ye, Wan ne i nye Igon'i kaya mi ta shim. Mi fok kusas wan didng.
Nizen iyong aYeso se ay isk itaar a t san itomong wu. A nye igon aYusufu, nutrng rinerawe, aYusufu nye igon aHeli.
aHeli nye igon aMatat, aMatat nye igon aLawi, ne aLawi nye igon aMelki. aMelki nye igon aYana, ne aYana nye igon aYusufu.
aYusufu nye igon aMatatiya, ne aMatatiya nye igon Amos. Amos nye igon aNahum, ne aNahum nye igon Azaliya. Azaliya nye igon aNaya,
ne aNaya nye igon aMaat. aMaat nye igon aMatatiya, ne aMatatiya nye igon aShimeya. aShimeya nye igon aZhose, ne aZhose nye igon aZhod.
ne aZhod nye igon aZhowanan. aZhowanan nye igon aRafaya, ne aRafaya nye igon aZarubabel. aZarubabel nye igon aSheltiyel, ne aSheltiyel nye igon aNeri.
aNeri nye igon aMelki, ne aMaki nye igon Adi. Adi nye igon aKosam, ne aKosam nye igon Almadam. Almadam nye igon Ar,
ne Ar nye igon aZhoshuwa. aZhoshuwa nye igon Aliyeze, ne Aliyeze nye igon aZhorim. aZhorim nye igon aMatat, ne aMatat nye igon aLawi.
aLawi nye igon aSaminu, ne aSaminu nye igon aYahuza. aYahuza nye igon aYusufu, ne aYusufu nye igon aZhonam. aZhonam nye igon Aliyakim,
ne Aliyakim nye igon aMaleya. aMaleya nye igon aManana, ne aManana nye igon aMatata. aMatata nye igon aNatan, ne aNatan nye igon aDauda.
aDauda nye igon aZhese, ne aZhese nye igon aObida. aObida nye igon aBowas. aBowas nye igon aSalmon, ne aSalmon nye igon aNashon.
aNashon nye igon Aminadap, ne Aminadap nye igon Aram. Aram nye igon aHeruna, ne aHeruna nye igon aPeres. aPeres nye igon aYahuda, ne
aYahuda nye igon aYakub. aYakub nye igon Ishaku, ne Ishaku nye igon Ibrahim. Ibrahim nye igon aTera, ne aTera nye igon aNahor.
aNahor nye igon aSeruk, ne aSeruk nye igon aReyu. aReyu nye igon aPelek, ne aPelek nye igon Aber. Aber nye igon aShela, ne
aShela nye igon aKana. aKenan nye igon Afazad, ne Afazad nye igon aShem. aShem nye igon aNuhu, ne aNuhu nye igon aLamek.
aLamek nye igon aMetusela, ne aMetusela nye igon aEnok, aEnok nye igon aYarek ne aYarek nye igon aMahalale, ne aMahalale nye igon aKenan.
aKenan nye igon Anosh, ne Anosh nye igon aShitu. aShitu nye igon Adamu, ne Adamu ma nye igon Adakunom.
aYeso dorok ni ishng aUrdun. An shining be Kabik Kazhl'e, ne Kabik Kazhl'e tseng be wu kayr katse,
azong ne Ishetan su ku bmng, inom isk inaas, ko a yas ba. Ni igang'e izong tu r, kamok sang a t ya naya ba.
Ishetan f be wu ye, Ke wan ne i nye Igon Adakunom, t, f be kuta na nong ku ta te abiredi.
Ne aYeso f be wu ye, I se ni izibir ye, Sang be naya ne anerawe tin sor tsek ba.
Iyong Ishetan bun a tseng be wu nar kakak ring ring, nong a t su ku tonong rigwm kazatse cei kayr izen cik.
Ne a bun a f be aYeso'me ye, Mi t ka nk iren nong tin nye rigwm natoon ikr na cei ne kuyiik ikr'me sor i kufuan, kamok a min nk ikr na cei. Kamok anong mi ta kyem i nk aner aya mi ta shim.
Kamok anong, ke wan ti ya iben, ikr na t te ifuan cei.
aYeso f be wu ye, I se ni izibir ye, Agwm gwm wan Adakunom ne wan t ku ya iben ne i ku nye itomong tsek.

Iyong Ishetan tseng be wu na aUshalima, ne a ku sak a t nyeseng nar ka ta se ring ring natoon agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben. Ne a f be aYeso'me ye, Ke wan ne i nye Igon Adakunom, ne i furuk ma kaben.
Kamok i se ni izibir ye, Adakunom t f be maleka wu be agbang kut nong ta ka tnng,
ne ka tor be ibk, fan wan bu rus kutak nuta.

Nizen iyong aYeso n shining be Kabik Kazhl'e yong a f ye, Mi be riy rikan be wan, Ada agbang, Agwm gwm, wan afe i t nye kaza be kaben, kamok wan nr ya a t be kukyem ne ya a t ren ikng natoon ikr na nong i ta tonong ya a ta se kyndi inoon zhizhk. I se gyr anong, Ada, kamok iyong ne i nye kushim riy wan.
Ada, mi n won koakye nubk wan. Akak ren Igon'e ba, ma Ada'me tsek. Akak ren Ada'me ba, ma Igon'e be ya Igon'e ta shim a tu ku ren ba.
Ayong aYeso kirik nufe limazhiri wu nong a ta f be ba kyn nukim ye, ner riy rikan nye ya a ta di ikr ife yin ta sen yrk yin'e na.
Won ta ka tak yin, ner kuzarap Adakunom be gwm whr shim ke yrk ikr yin ta sen yrk yin'e na, amma kyem di ba, ne shim ke foos ikr yin ta sen foos yin'e na, amma kyem foos ba.
Katuk kakak, aner akak a t ren Itsi aMusa didng dorok nong a t bmng aYeso be kurip ye, Aner Kubsp, aky ne mi ta nye nong ta s kutser kufe izen izen ?
Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, Aky ne i se ni izibir kayr Itsi aMusa ? Itsi'me f an ?
Ne aner ame f ye, Shim Agwm gwm wan Adakunom wan be riy wan cei, be kutser wan cei, be agap wan cei, ne kutrng wan cei, ne i shim afegbak wan kyndi wan ta shim rice wan.
Ne aYeso f be wu ye, Ikng wan t f se gyr. Ke wan nye anong, wan ta s kutser.
A shim ke a tonong ye wu se gyr nashn Adakunom, ayong a rip aYeso ye, T, angan ne a nye afegbak'i ?

Ayong aYeso t tak kumaas na ye, Aner akak dorok na aUshalima, a dorok a tisik a be na aZheriko. Ayong a gor a nyim be gbang kpatang kak, turung ares wu ne mu ku nye amaan atsor, nong t ma ku won azong kyndi kukom.
Nizen iyong atsi akak sen tisik iren iyong gip, a t fa di aner ame ne a faas a t tseng akn wu.
Anong ne aner aLawi akak gip, a t fa b nar'me, a t ku di ne a faas a t tseng akn wu.
Amma aner aSamariya akak a t se be kutseng wu, a t b nar aner ame t ku se. A t fa ku di ne a r riy wu.

A tseng nufe aner ame nong a t ku kusu ifor'e be ashi kakon a ta yis ye anap, ne a ni te name nong a t rosom. Ne a sok aner ame natoon azhaki wu nong a t tseng'e nar tsen tu ku ks, ne a ni sak riy ni wu.

Naya katson'e, a sok ica itsm a ta yis ye adinari ifa a t nk aner a tin sak riy nar ame nong a t f be wu ye, Inga, ni sak riy ni wu. Koakye ne wan ti fr ni wu, nizen iya mi b ne i ni tak, mi t ka karang.
Ayong aYeso t rip ye, Kayr ner ataar na, wan di ye angan ne a nye afegbak atek nufe aner gbang kpatang tu ku tsor na ?
Ayong aner a ta ren Itsi ame f be aYeso ye, Aner a t r riy aner'e. Ne aYeso f be wu ye, T, tseng ta se nye anong gip.
Nizen aYeso be limazhiri wu t se be kutseng, gor nuwp kukak yong abining akak a t ku yis ye aMarta b a t ku shan niren nong a t n kari wu.
aMarta ame be angasnyining akak a t ku yis ye aMarya, a sonong nashn aYeso nong a t foos ikr aYeso t se be kutaas'e.

Amma aMarta s kudaam kamok riy wu se ninye kanyk ikr i ta se nashn wu. Ayong a b nufe aYeso nong a t f be wu ye, Agwm gwm, wan di angasnyining'i t min won nong mi ta nye itomong mi zr aa? F be wu nong a tin s mo.
Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, aMarta! aMarta! Wan min te riy wan nikr didng ma i n nudaam.
Ikng izining ne i nye igbang'e nusor wan. aMarya n kasa iya i ta se gyr, ka akak tin shan ba.
Katuk kakak aYeso se be aduwa nar kakak. Nizen iya a t gang kunye aduwa ame, alimazhiri wu akak f be wu ye, Agwm gwm, ni bsp yir kunye aduwa kyndi aYohana t bsp limazhiri wu'me.
Ayong aYeso f be ba ye, Izen iya yin tana nye yin aduwa, f yin ye, Ada yir, won riyerek wan tu sor zhl, rigwm wan tu b.
Ni nang yir naya kuya koakye katuk.
Ni rng yir rinn yir, kamok yir ta rng yir ya a tin nye yir rinn. Sang tu tseng be yir nar afe a tana sen bmng yir ba.
aYeso bun a f be limazhiri wu'me ye, Angan kayr yin ta tseng nufe afertseng wu natite katuk, ne a f be wu ye, Ar, ni nang gbang abiredi ataar.
Aferim mi akak ne nutseng a gor kari mi, mi be ikng ikak tana ku nk nong a ta ya ba.
Ne afertseng wu ame f be wu ye, Tin daam ba. Mi n whn kanukutu, mi be inoon'i n n yir nutu, mi ta kyem i dorok nong ta b ka nk ba.
Won ta ka tak yin, a t dorok nong a t ku nk sang kamok a ta nye afertseng wu tsek ba, amma kamok afertseng'e tana mak a ku daam. A t dorok nong a t ku nk whr kyndi wu ta shim.
Kamok anong mi f be yin ye, rip yin a t ka nk yin, tsr yin ta s yin, rus yin kanukutu a ta ka karak yin'e.
Kamok koangan afe a ta rip ne a tu ku nk, afe a t tsr a t s, afe a ta rus kanukutu a tu ku karak'e.
Yin atek inoon, angan kayr yin, ke igon wu tu rip izos ne a ku nk iwhen ?
Ka ke a tu rip ritsi ne a ku nk inyng ?
Ke yin, i ta nye yin amaan'e ren i nyesek yin inoon yin ikr itek, shita Ada afe ta se naza ta won dar a nk aya a tu ku rip Kabik Kazhl'e ?
aYeso tun itseng i ta sak rigbanu na aner akak. Nizen itseng'e t wuruk, agbanu'me kpaan kuf kanu. nerawe whr t se azong te zhing.
kak ba f ye, Be kukyem aBazabul, a ta nye agwm tseng, ne a ti turung tseng'e.
kak kayr ba shim ke bmng aYeso yong f be wu ye, a ra nye ikng ikak ife azhing nong iya i tana tonong ye wu ne naza.
aYeso ta ren kutrng ba, yong a f be ba ye, Ke rigwm naka kabak ne ri kpa, ke kasa naka kabak ne ka kpa.
Ke Ishetan naka kabak, rigwm wu ta nye an ri ta nyeseng ? Mi f anong kamok yin f yin ye mi turung tseng be kukyem aBazabul.
Ke mi turung tseng be kukyem aBazabul, t, be kukyem angan ne ner yin ti turung ? Kamok anong, ba ne ta ka tonong yin katsak'e.
Ke i nye ye mi turung tseng'e be kukyem Adakunom, i nye ye rigwm Adakunom m b nufe yin.
Ke aner agap nye kanyk gyr nong a tin tor kasa wu, akak t sok ikng ikak ba.
Ke aner aya a tu ku nar be agap tikpa ni wu, a tin shan ikr aner'e tin tor rice wu ame. A t kok ikr aner'e ta be cei.
Aner aya a ta se mak be mi ba, i nye ye a ti ramin. Afe a ta tusung nerawe mak be mi ba, i nye ye a shik.
Izen iya amaan kabik'e ta wuruk kayr anerawe, ka ta kuus nar nafe sang na ta be ashi ba, ne ka tsr kar ka tana ku fan. Ke ka s ba, ne ka f ye, Mi tu ku bun nar mi t ku wuruk.
Nizen iya ka t ku bun ka se s kar'me an rng a tan nye gyr.
I t tseng nong ka t se bn fudang kanataar ya a ta nye amaan'e ne ku nar, ne b n azong kayr aner'e. Ne kuse aner'e nashn risik ne ku nar kufe imsng'e.
Nizen aYeso t se be kuf ikr'ong, ne abining akak kayr rigwm'e t kut be agap a t f ye, Aner riy rikan ne a nye aner aya a t ka tes ne a ka ngasa.
Amma aYeso f be wu ye, Wayo, aner a ta be riy rikan nye aner a t fok rif Adakunom ne a ninye itomong.
Nizen rigwm nerawe'me tin barang ne aYeso f be ba ye, nerawe izam iyu nye amaan'e. A shim ta yrk ikr azhing ta ra ku nye ba'me ba, ma ke ife aZhona aner kuzarap.
Kyndi i t s be aZhona na aNineve, anong ne i t se be Igon Anerawe be ner izam iyu.

Katuk amok abining akak aya a t nye agwm niben aSheba t nyeseng be ner izam iyu nashn Adakunom ne a tonong ye yin nye yin maan'e, kamok wu t ne nigang kazatse nong a t b foos kukyem aSolomon. T, aya a ta nar aSolomon na aze.
Katuk igang'e ner aNineve t nyeseng be ner izam iyu nashn Adakunom, ne tonong ye nerawe'me nye maan'e. Kamok ba shishing kuse ba be rif aZhona t ku taas ba. T, kyrna afe a ta nar aZhona na aze!
Akak te kurng na apitila ne a kis, ka ne a sak ribong agadu ba, amma a sak nagarang nong fe a ta bs kayr kasa'me ta di akanang'e.
Anyisi wan ne nye apitila kurm wan. Ke anyisi wan nye atser, kurm wan cicr ta s akanang. Amma ke anyisi wan nye atser ba, kurm wan cicr ta se na awhi.
Kamok anong, sak riy be akanang wan t be, kashim a nye awhi.
Ke kurm wan cei se kanang, abas akak t se whi ba, ne kurm'e gysm didng, kyndi kurng apitila ta sak wan ta se kanang.
Nizen aYeso t gang kuf kanu, aner aFarisi akak tu yis ye, ra se ya naya be wu, yong a n a t sonong nong t ya naya'me.
Amma aner aFarisi'me te zhing a t di aYeso t ya naya'me dar ku kusu ibk kyndi ign ba ta f ye a ra nye nizham a ta ra ya naya.
Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, Yin ner aFarisi, yin daam yin be kukusu nama kp be nakereng, amma yin be yin amaan kuse kayr ay yin ne i mr yin nerawe.
Yin funam kak, yin ren yin ye aner a t nye kama'me ne a nye kayr'e aa?
Kamok anong nk yin fe rizor ikr yin ta be yin be riy rizining, nong koakye yin t te zhl.

Aw be yin ner aFarisi, yin nyesek yin izining kayr koakye ikng kusok: ritun be akugang ne afumung a tin nyes gyr tatan, amma yin won yin katsak ne kushim Adakunom. Ikr yin ta nye yin'ong se gyr, amma gyr ke yin nye yin iya i ta nye igbang'e gip.
Aw be yin, ner aFarisi, yin shim yin nar kusosok nayiik'e natu aduwa yin, ne ka nye yin ashou ninar rizhik kyndi gbang ner.
Aw be yin, ner aFarisi, yin se yin kyndi ark nerawe tin tseng natoon'e dar kuren ba.
Akak kayr fe a ta ren Itsi didng ame f be aYeso ye, Aner Kubsp, rif wan t f na, wan ti kas yir gip.
Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, Aw be yin fe i ta ren yin Itsi didng, yin saas yin nerawe acer ya a ta gaar didng, amma yin be rice yin, yin shim tin sak yin kubk yin nong tu ku s mo yin ba ba.
Aw be yin, yin ne i ra bun i nk yin ark ner kuzarap Adakunom ya ada yin t ku fs ba gbugbang.
Yin tonong yin ye, yin kuus yin kama ikr da yin t nye. Ba ne fs ner kuzarap'e ne yin nk yin ark'e.
Kamok anong, Adakunom f kayr kukyem wu ye, Mi t tom ner kuzarap ne manzo, t fs kak ne tabak kak ba.
Kamok anong, a t t ner izam iyu amok kamok da ba t fs ner kuzarap Adakunom agbugbang'e cei kum nizen a t nye kazatse,
kum nizen a t fr aHabila ma nizen aZakariya, aya a t fr natite abagadi ne kar azhl'e. Katsak'e ne mi t ka tak yin, t t ner izam iyu amok kamok ba cei.
Aw be yin ya i ta ren yin Itsi didng, yin tnng yin nerawe iren kuren Adakunom. Yin n yin ba, yin won yin kak ta n ba.
Nizen aYeso t dorok azong, ner aFarisi ne fe kubsp Itsi san ku raba rif wu, ne ku risim iriri ikr.
shim ke aYeso wher kanu nong tu ku yiir be ikng iya wu tana f.
Nizen nerawe whr ta nyim ma naka shesh, aYeso f be limazhiri wu ni imsng'e ye, Nye yin tatan be ayisti ner aFarisi. aYisti'me nye akardak kuse ba.
Ikng ikak kuse a tan whn a tana won dar a karak ba, ka ikng ikak kuse nunrng a tana won dar a ts ba.
Koakye ne yin t f yin nawhi, a t fok kanang, ne koakye ne yin t f yin cucuk nato ka kayr atu kuks a t ngarak nagarang nong a ta f kanang.
r, won t ka tak yin tu fok yin inyim aya a tana fr kurm ba, kamok nama anong a t ba, kyem a nye ikng ikak baba ba.
Won t ka tak yin aner aya yin tana fok yin inyim wu. Fok yin inyim Adakunom, aya nama a t ka fr ne a bun a be iren a tana ka te yin kayr kurng. Katsak'e ne mi t tak yin, fok yin inyim wu.
A rs bp atoon ni itsm cik aa? Gip be anong Adakunom tiburum be akak ba ba.
An fa nakuyng rice yin cei. Sang tu fok yin inyim ba, yin se yin yiik ne i nar yin bp'ong.
Won t ka tak yin, aner aya ne a f nashn nerawe ye wu ti ren, Igon Anerawe t f ye wu tu ren gip nashn maleka Adakunom.
Amma aner aya ne a f nashn nerawe ye wu ti ren ba, a t f anong be wu nashn maleka Adakunom gip.
Koangan ne a f imaan'e natoon Igon Anerawe a tu ku rng'e, amma aner aya ne a zhsh Kabik Kazhl'e a tu ku rng'e ba.
Izen iya ne a tseng be yin nashn kk kashn atu aduwa ner aYahuda be nufe gwm, tu daam yin be ikng yin tana f yin natoon rice yin ba,
kamok Kabik Kazhl'e t ka tak yin ikng iya yin tana f yin nizen iyong.
Aner akak kayr rigwm nerawe ame f be aYeso ye, Aner Kubsp, f be aronyining'i ye a ra kabak kutse ada yir tin won yir'e.
Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, Ar, angan ti sak aner amok kayr yin ka afe i ka kabak yin kutse yin ?
Ne aYeso f be ba ye, Sak yin riy, ne i nye yin tatan be koakye kuri amaan kuyrk, kamok kube ikng whr ne kunye kusor kutek ba.
Ne a ku tak ba kumaas na ye, Arum akak be rik ri ta te naya didng.
Ayong a f riy wu ye, Aky ne mi t nye ? Sang mi ta be kar tanin korok naya mi ba ?
Ayong a f ye, Ikng mi tana nye na. Mi t yirik ngm mi, nong ta nk iya i ta nye igbang'e, nong as mi tin korok naya mi be ribir ikr cei.
Ne mi ma f riy mi ye, Mi be ikr itek nusak ife ay whr. Sor nk, ya ne i s, ne inye riy rikan.
Amma Adakunom f be wu ye, Wan kufunam kukak! Natuk katuur, a t sok kutser wan, iyong angan t kok ikr wan ta naka tusung'e na ?
Anong ne i t se be koangan afe a t tusung rice wu ikr, Adakunom t di kyndi arum ba.
aYeso f be limazhiri wu ye, Kamok anong mi f be yin ye, tu daam yin be kusor yin ba, be ikng iya yin tana ya yin ka ikng iya yin tana s yin ba, ka ikng iya yin tana te yin ba.
Kutser nar naya ne kurm nar ares.
Yrk yin nanon ta di yin. Ba tuus ka tsk ba. Ba be kar i saas naya ka ingm ba, gip be anong Adakunom tu nyesek ba naya. Shita yin i ta nar yin nanon yiik.
Angan kayr yin kamok kudaam wu ta kyem a tin barang kaban izen cik nutser wu ?
Ke yin ta kyem i nye yin ikng ihiir'e kyndi iyong ba, aky sak yin tin daam yin be ribir'e ?
Yrk yin kusas afure ta di yin, ba nye itomong ka tos ares ba Gip be anong, won t ka tak yin ko aSolomon a t nye agwm be ares wu atek kususas'e gip, a te ares kususas'e kyndi azining kayr ba ba.
Ke Adakunom ta kyem a te agam iwng ares anong, aya a ta di katuur, natson ne a te nurng, shita yin'a. Yin fe kunk katsak yin ta raar.
Tin te yin riy natoon ikng iya yin tana ya yin ka tana s yin ba, tu daam yin ba.
Kamok furin kuus ikng kuri iyong cicr gip, Ada yin ren ye yin tsr yin ikr'ong.
Kamok anong, tsr yin rigwm Adakunom, ikr iyong a t ka nk yin gip.
Sang tu fok yin inyim ba, yin ahiir kaming, kamok Ada yin be riy rikan nong yin t nye yin rigwm mak be wu.
Rs yin ikr yin nong ta nk yin fe rizor itsm'e, be kunye anong ne yin ta sak yin kurum nar afe sang ku tana beseng ba, kayr kaza, nar kaya kpatang tanin b bubarak ka its tana ya ba.
Kamok kar kaya ne kurum wan tu kuse, azong ne riy wan t se gip.
Sor yin be kanyk ne i won yin apitila yin be irng,
kyndi sam ya a t nye itomong nasa akak, t sen tor kub atekasa ba. Nizen atekasa'me t be nar riy rikan kuwnng nong ke a b a rus kanukutu, ne a wor a ku karak'e.
I ta sor ikng riy rikan ke atekasa'me b ku s ba an mereng ida ba. Katsak'e ne mi t ka tak yin, a tu ku sak ba ta sosok ne a tun ares wu nong a tu ku nk ba naya.
I ta sor ikng riy rikan be sam ya a t nye kanyk ko atekasa'me b natite katuk ka nadiding bop, ne a ku s ba be kanyk.
Amma yin ren yin ye, ke a fa nye ye atekasa ren izen iya akpatang tana b, ke a tor kasa wu sang ke a won nong akpatang ta nye itsang ba.
Kamok anong yin gip, sor yin be kanyk dim, kamok sang yin ren yin izen iya Igon Anerawe'me tana b ba.
aBitrus rip aYeso ye, Atekasa, kumaas na se natoon yir a? Ka kamok koangan ?
aYeso f be wu ye, Angan ne a nye asam afe a ta be katsak ne a be kukyem ? Aya atekasa wu t ku won ribir sam nubk, ne a ku nyesek ba naya nizen gyr.
I t sor ikng riy rikan ke asam ayong atekasa wu b a tu ku s a sen nye ikng iya a t f be wu ye a ra nye.
Katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak yin, a tu ku won ikr wu cei nubk nong a tu ku sak mo riy.
Ke a fa nye ye asam'me t ry wu ye, Atekasa mi t gum b ba, ne a kpaan kutsosok ribir sam'me, nyining be atek, ne a ya ne a s ma rice zim.
Atekasa'me t b nizen iya afe asam'me ta ren ye a ta b ba, nizen iya wu ta ren ba. Atekasa'me tu ku nye amaan atsor ne a ku barak nar furin.
Asam aya a t ren ikng atekasa wu t shim, a ra nye kanyk, ka a ra nye ikng atekasa wu'me ta shim ba, a t ku whereng didng.

Afe a t ren ikng atekasa wu'me t shim ba, ke a nye ikng i ta tas ke a ku whereng, a tu ku whereng cik tsek. Kamok koangan ne a t ku nk whr, a ma shim ke a s whr nufu. Aner aya a t ku won'e whr, a shim ke a bun a s whr nubk wu.
Mi b tin te kurng nazatse, ye kushim fa nye kus ke ku kun san kuya.
aBatisma kuse a tanin nye'me, a kon ni te ke a min i nye'me.
Yin di yin ye mi b be kusor caang nazatse na a? Wayo, mi b nong ta sak nerawe ta naka kabak.
Kum kyrna, ner atoon nasa kazining ta naka kabak. ner ataar ta raba ner afa, ne ner afa raba ner taar.
Atek igon t rawu igon wu, ne igon rawu atek, anyining igon t rawu angas ne angas'e rawu anyining. Anyining akp t rawu akugon, akugon'e t rawu anyining akp.
aYeso f be ribir nerawe'me ye, Ke yin di yin kunn wuruk nabas rikpa kunom, ne yin wor i f yin ye, Iza ta kpa katuur, ne iza'me kpa.
Ke kuwun tisik, ne yin f yin ye, Kar ta zhoosh, ne ka zhoosh.
Yin kardak ner! Yin ren i f yin natoon kaza be kaben. Aky sak yin kyem i f yin ikng ikak natoon izen na ba ?
Aky sak yin t yin be rice yin ikng i ta se gyr nong t nye yin ba ?

Ke akak se be tseng be wan nar amok, nye kanyk nong tin sak yin niren be wu nizham. Ke anong ba, a t tseng be wan nar amok'e, ne aner kut amok'e ka won nubk fe itomong wu. fe itomong'e ta ka te nitsm.
Mi t ka tak, wan t kyem i wuruk ba, ma wan karang kutiming'e cei nizham.
Nizen iyong ner kak tuse azong fe a t tak aYeso itak natoon ner aGalili ya aBilatus t ku fs ba nizen t sen nye asidaka.
Ayong aYeso f be ba ye, Yin di yin ye ner aGalili ayong ne nye rinn didng ne nar ribir ner aGalili'me kamok t s risam anong a?
Won ta ka tak yin, i se anong ba. Ke yin shishing yin kuse yin ba, yin gip t kus yin cei kyndi ba.
Ka nerawe kusk be ikara t kus nizen rink tin kpa natoon ba na aSiluwam, yin di yin ye rinn ba nar rife ribir nerawe t se na aUshalima cei a?
Mi ta ka tak yin i se nong ba. Ke yin shishing yin kuse yin ba, yin gip t kus yin cicr yin.
Ne aYeso ku tak ba kumaas na ye, Aner akak be ritin atafo rik wu. A ta fa tseng ritin atafo'me nong a t b kutes'e, a ra s ba.
Ayong a f be aner a tin sak riy rik'me ye, Riy rif ataar na ne mi bs ne i tsr kutes atafo na, mi s ba. Tmng ritin'e. Aky sak ri ta tnng kar ana tsek ?
Ayong aner a tin sak riy rik'me f ye, Atekasa, won riman tin barang riy rizining gbak. Mi tin tusung iben nong tin te narik.
Ke rites riy ri ta saase t, ke ri tes ba ne mi tmng.
Katuk Asabar akak, aYeso ku sen bsp nerawe'me nutu aduwa ner aYahuda kukak.
Abining akak tuse azong amaan kabik ta sak a te akun'e ay kusk be ikara. A tiguk a kyem a naka nabak nigaan'e ba.
Nizen aYeso t ku di, a t yis nong a t f be wu ye, Anyiningkasa, a ma ka sun risam wan.
aYeso ti sak kubk ni wu, ne a wor a naka nabak gyr. Abining'e kerek Adakunom.

Riy akk kashn kutu aduwa'me beseng, kamok aYeso t sak akak te atser katuk Asabar. Ayong a f be nerawe'me ye, Inom kuse igataar kamok itomong. Kamok anong yin ta kyem i bs yin nong a t ka sak yin t te yin atser, sang katuk Asabar ba.

Nye yin itomong iya Adakunom ta shim nong tEtonong yin ye yin nye yin limazhiri wu, kamok iyu ne i tEb be Ada'me kuyiik.
Kyndi Ada'me tin shim anong ne mi ma ka shim yin. T, sor yin kayr kuri kushim kuya mi ta ka kushim yin.
Ke yin kuus yin Itsi mi, yin tEsor yin kayr kushim'i, kyndi mi tEkuus Itsi Ada mi ne i sor kayr kushim wu.
Mi f anong nong as riy rikan'i tEse kayr yin, nong riy rikan yin tEshining.
Itsi mi se ye: Naka shim yin kyndi mi tEka shim yin.
Kushim kukak kuse ku ta nar kufe anerawe tana nk kutser wu kamok ferim wu ba.
Yin nye yin ferim mi ke yin kuus yin Itsi mi.
Mi tEba ka yis yin ye sam ba, kamok asam ren kutrng atekasa wu ba. Mi ta ka yis yin ye ferim mi makong, kamok koakye ikng iya mi tEbsp nufe Ada mi, mi ma ka taas yin.
Sang yin ne i ti kasa yin ba, amma mi ne i tEka kasa yin, nong ta se tes yin kutes kutek, kuya ku tana sor ma izen izen. Be anong ne Ada mi tEka nk yin koakye ikng iya yin ta rip yin kayr riyerek'i.
Itsi mi se ye: Naka shim yin.
Ke kazatse ta ka rayin, t, ren yin ye ka tin ramin kum ni imsng'e.

Ke a fa f ye yin nye yin fe kazatse, ke kazatse ta shim yin kamok yin ta nye yin fu. Kyndi i ta se, yin nye yin fe kazatse ba, amma mi ma ka kasa yin kayr fe kazatse. Iyong ne i sak kazatse ta ka rayin yin.
Yiring yin be rif mi tEf be yin ye: Asam akak nar atekasa wu ba.EKe Eti tabak, t, EtEka tabak yin gip. Ke ba kuus rif mi a tEkuus rif yin gip.
Ba tEnye be yin anong kamok riyerek'i, kamok ba ren aya a tin tom ba.
Mi fa b i tEku tak ba ba, ke Edi rinn ba ba. Amma kyrna, ba be iren kuwhr natoon rinn ba ba.
Aner aya a tin ramin, a rawu Ada mi gip.
Mi nye ikng didng iya nerawe tEba, kayr ba. Ke a fa f ye mi nye ba', ke a di rinn ba ba. Amma kyrna ba n di itomong azhing iya mi tEnye, gip be anong, ba ti ramin ne Eraba Ada mi.
Amma iyu se anong, nong a tEshining ikng iya a ta zibir kayr afumung Itsi aMusa ye: ti ramin kpdng tsek.E
Izen iya ne Aner Kutobok'ong b, aya a tana ne nufe Ada. Wu ne a nye Kabik kafe katsak. A tEf itak natoon'i.
Yin gip yin tEf yin itak natoon'i dim, kamok yin se yin mak be mi kum ni imsng'e.
Mi tEtaas yin ikr na cei nong fan yin bu ku bun yin kama.
tEka turung yin kayr atu aduwa. Katsak'e, izen saase iya ke aner akak a ta fr yin, a tEdi ye wu sen nye itomong Adakunom.
tEnye ikr iyong kamok sang ba n ren Ada ka mi ba.
Mi ta ka tak yin ikr na, nong ke izen'e nye yin tEyiring yin ye, mi ma ka krk yin kuto. Mi ta tak yin iyu ni imsng'e ba, kamok mi se mak be yin.
Kyrna, mi be nufe aya a tin tom, gip be anong akak yin ti rip ye, Wan be ak ?Eba.
Yin nye yin riy riwe ye kamok mi tEf ikr na.
Amma katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak yin: Kutseng'i tEka sor yin ikng itek kamok ke mi tseng ba, Aner Kutobok ame tEb ba. Amma ke mi tseng mi tEse ka tom yin'e.
Ke Aner Kutobok'e b, a tEts rinn kazatse be ikng iya i tana tonong kuse kuzhl'e be amok Adakunom.
Kutrng ba se gyr ba' natoon rinn', kamok ba gaar ku nink katsak ni mi.
Kutrng ba se gyr ba' natoon kuse kuzhl'e, kamok mi be nufe Ada mi, yin ta bin di yin ba.
kutrng ba se gyr ba' natoon amok, kamok a tsang an tn aner fe tin nye rigwm nazatse na amok.
Mi be rif didng tana ka tak yin, amma yin ta kyem i na tsesek yin ta fok yin kyrna ba.

Amma izen iya ife Kabik kafe katsak'e b, a tEka tonong yin iren katsak cei kamok sang, a tEf rif rice wu ba. Ikng iya wu ta foos tsek ne wu tEf. A tEbun a tEka taas yin ikr iya i ta rusek, nong a tEra nye.
A tin tiyiik, kamok a tEkok ikr iya i ta nye inaan ne a ka taas yin.
Ikr iya i ta nye ife Ada'me cei nye inaan. Ikng iya i tEsak mi tEf ye, Kabik tEkok ikr inaan ne a ka taas yin.
Nizen cik yin tEbin di yin ba, amma nama izen cik, ne yin bun i ni di yin.E
Iyong limazhiri wu kak f awan ba ye, Rif wu na sor aky, a ta f ye, Nizen cik yin tEbin di yin ba, amma nama izen cicr ne yin bun i ni di yin'e? Ne a bun a f ye: Kamok mi ta be nufe Ada'me āEE
yiir ku naka risim ye, Aky sak a tEf ye, Amma nama izen cikE? Yir ren yir ikng iya wu tin f ba.E

aYeso tEren ye limazhiri wu shim EtEku rip natoon ikng'ong, ayong a f be ba ye, Yin sen na ka risim yin ikng iya rif mi tEsor, mi tEf ye, Nizen cik yin tEbin di yin ba, amma nama izen cik ne yin bun ni di yinEa?
Katsak ne mi ta ka tak yin, yin tEtos ne i nye yin riy riwe ne kazatse nye riy rikan. Yin tEnye yin riy riwe, amma riy riwe yin tEkubun ri ta te riy rikan.
Aner abining a ta sen tes igon fok kur'me, kamok izen kutes wu tan nye. Amma izen iya ne a tes igon wu, ne a tiburum risam'me kamok a be riy rikan wu tan tes igon nazatse.
Anong ne i se be yin gip, kyrna ne i nye izen riy riwe yin. Amma mi tEbun i ka di yin ne i nye yin riy rikan, akak ta kyem a ka roon yin riy rikan yin ba.
Katuk kayong yin tEbin rip yin ikng ikak baba ba. Katsak ne mi ta ka tak yin, Ada'me tEka nk yin koakye ikng yin tana rip yin kayr riyerek'i.
Ko kyrna yin min rip yin ikng ikak kayr riyerek'i ba. Rip yin, yin ta s yin nong riy rikan yin tEshining.
Mi ta taas yin ikr na cei be kumaas gyr tatan, izen saase mi tana ba f be yin be kumaas ba. Amma mi tEf be yin kanang natoon Ada mi.
Katuk'ong yin tEnye yin izong kayr riyerek'i. Yin tErip yin Ada be rice yin sang mi ne ta ka rip yin'e ba.
Wayo, Ada'me ta shim yin be rice wu, kamok yin ti shim yin ne i nk yin katsak ye, mi ne nufe Adakunom.
Mi ne nufe Ada'me, i ta b nazatse. Kyrna mi sen won kazatse'me nong tEku bun nufe Ada'me.E
Ayong limazhiri wu f ye, Yawa, kyrna ne wan ma f rif kanang dar kumaas.E
Kyrna ne yir ma ren yir ye wan ren koakye, sang ma akak tErip ba. Iyuna sak yir ti nk yir katsak ye wan ne nufe Adakunom.
aYeso f be ba ye, Aser, ma kyrna ne yin ra min nk yin katsak a?E
Amma izen saase, n b gip ma, yin tana te yin shaam. Koangan tEku bun kari wu, yin cei tin won yin mi zr. Gip be anong, mi ta se mi zr ba, kamok Ada mi se mak be mi.
Mi ta taas yin ikr na, kamok kayr riyerek'i yin tEs yin kusor caang. Yin tEs yin risam kayr kazatse na, amma na ka tsesek yin. Mi canang kazatse na.E
Nama aYeso tEf ikr na, ne a sok rice wu naza a tEyrk kaza nong a tEnye aduwa ye, Ada, izen'e n nye. Tiyiik Igon wan, nong wu gip a tEka tiyiik.
Kamok wan tEku nk rigwm natoon nerawe cei, nong a ta nk aya wan tEku nk cicr, kutser kufe izen izen.
Kutser kufe izen izen'e nye ye, nerawe ra ka ren ye, wan zr ne i nye Adakunom afe katsak, ne Eren aYeso Kiristi aya wan tEtom.
Mi tEbn kuyiik kayr kazatse be itomong iya wan tin nk i tEnye cei.
T, kyrna Ada, ni tiyiik be kuyiik kuya mi tEbe nashn wan nizham a tEra nye kazatse.
Mi n sak nerawe fe wan tin nk nazatse ma ka ren. nye fuan, wan ne i tEsok ba i tin nk. Ba ma kuus rif wan.
Kyrna ba ren ye koakye wan ta min nk ne nufuan.
Kamok rif, wan tin nk ne mi tEku taas ba ne ba shan, ne Eren be katsak ye mi ne nufuan, ne ba ni nk katsak ye wan ne i ti tom.
Mi nye aduwa kamok ba. Sang kamok nerawe kazatse ne mi ti nye aduwa na ba, amma mi nye aduwa'me kamok fe wan tEmin nk, kamok ba nye afuan.
Koakye mi ta be cei nye ifuan, ne ikr wan ta be cei nye inaan. Mi n s kuyiik kamok ba.

Mi saase nufuan, mi tEba sor nazatse na baba ba. Amma ba ruresek kayr kazatse na nizham. Ada Azhl'e, ku fek ba be riyerek wan rif kukyem, riyerek riya wan tin nk, nong ba tEsor azining kyndi mi ta se be wan.
Nizen iya mi tEse be ba, mi tEku fek ba, ne mi ni sak riy ni ba be riyerek riya wan tin te'me. Akak wei ba, ma ke azining kayr ba aya a tEte kpdng nong as a tEshining Kufumung Rif Adakunom.
Mi saase nufuan kyrna.Amma mi ta nye izong ikr na kum ne mi ruresek kayr kazatse, nong as ba tEshining be kuri riy rikan riya mi tEbe kayr ba.
Mi mak nk ba rif wan yong kazatse tEraba ba, kamok ba nye fe kazatse ba, kyndi mi ta nye afe kazatse ba.
Sang i se ye mi nye aduwa'me ye wan ra ka tun ba kayr kazatse ba, amma ye wan ru ku fek ba nubk Amaan Aner.
Ba nye afe kazatse ba, kyndi mi ta nye afe kazatse ba.
Ku sak ba Etu sor zhl be katsak, rif wan ne rinye katsak.
Kyndi wan tin tom kayr kazatse, anong ne mi ka tom ba kayr kazatse.
Kamok ba ne mi nk rice mi zhl nong as ba gip ta s kute zhl kufe katsak.
Aduwa mi se kamok awan ba tsek ba Amma mi nye aduwa kamok ya a tanin nk katsak ni mi gip, kamok rif ba.
Ada, aduwa mi se ye, ba ra te azining cicr, kyndi wan ta se azining be mi ne mi ma se azining be wan. Won ba gip Etu te azining be yir. Be anong ne kazatse tin nk katsak ye wan ne i ti tom.
Mi ma ka nk ba kuyiik afe wan tin nk, nong as ba tEte azining kyndi yir ta se yir be wan.
Mi sor kayr ba ne wan kayr'i. Won ba tEgung rice didng, nong as kazatse tEren ye wan ti tom, ne ka ren ye mi tEshim ba kyndi wan tin shim.
Ada, mi shim fe wan tEmin nk tu se mak be mi nar kaya mi tu ku se, ne Edi kuyiik'i, kuyiik kuya wan tin tiyiik mo kamok wan tin shim nizham a tEra nye kazatse.
Ada, Wan nye azhl'e, kazatse tEka ren ba gyr tatan, amma mi tEren. ren ye wan ne i ti tom.
Mi n sak ba tEma ka ren, mi tEya kashn be ku sak ba tEka ren, nong as ba gip EtEs kuri kushim kuya wan tin shim nong mi be rice mi gip ta se kayr ba.E
Nama aYeso tEgang i nye aduwa'me, a dorok be limazhiri wu nong EtEtar ishng aKidiron. Rik rikak tuse azong ri tEbe nafar, ayong aYeso n kayr'e be limazhiri wu.
aYahuza afe a tEsok aYeso a tEnk ren kar'me kamok aYeso n m ne a nyiis azong be limazhiri wu.
Ayong aYahuza sok sozha whr ne ner aya a tEtor kk kashn tsi ne ner aFarisi, nong EtEtseng azong. se be ng ne apitila ne ikr itsom.
aYeso tEren ikng iya i tana ku s cei, ayong a wuruk nong a tEf be ba ye, Yin tsr yin angan ?E
Ayong Ef be wu ye, aYeso afu aNazaret.E Ne aYeso f be ba ye, Mi na.E(aYahuza aya a tEku sok a tEnk se azong be ba.)
Nizen iya aYeso tEf be ba ye, Mi na.EYong nerawe'me tEbun amaama ma Ekpas kaben.
A bun a tu ku rip ba ye, Angan ne yin tsr yin ?E Ayong ba f ye, aYeso afu Nazaret.E
Ayong aYeso f be ba ye, Mi ta tak yin ye mi ne i nye wu n. Ke yin ti tsr yin, t, won yin nerawe na tEtseng.E
A nye anong, nong as a tEshining rif aYeso tEtsang a f ye, nerawe ya wan tin nk mi n wei be ko azining ba.E
aSiman Bitrus se be awn itsor, ayong a whiir a tin tn kuto kufe riya sam agbang atsi akak. (Riyerek asam'me nye aMakus.)
Amma aYeso f be aBitrus ye, Kute itsor wan nubas wu. Mi ta s akp risam aya Ada tin nk aa?E
Ayong rigwm sozha ne kk kashn ba, ne fe a tor agbang atsi ner aYahuda yiir aYeso'me nong EtEku roos.
tseng be wu nufe Anas ni imsng'e, a tEnye aman aKayafas agbang atsi riy riyong.
aKayafas'me ne a kun f be ner aYahuda ye i se gyr aner azining tana ku kamok nerawe cei.
Ayong aSiman Bitrus be akak kayr limazhiri aYeso kuus aYeso nama, kamok alimazhiri ren agbang atsi'me, yong a n mak be aYeso kayr azuri agbang atsi'me.
Amma aBitrus nyeseng nufang nanukutu'me. Alimazhiri aya agbang atsi tEku ren ame tEku bun, a ta f be kanamang ka tEnye itomong azong ye a ra n be aBitrus kayr'e.
Kanamang ka ta se be kutor kanukutu'me rip aBitrus ye, Katsak'e wan nye azining kayr limazhiri aner na a'a?E Ne aBitrus f ye, Wayo, mi nye akak ba?E
Kar shirim. Ayong sam be fe a ta tor kar kuya Adakunom iben, kas kurng nong a ta sen fok'e. aBitrus se nunyeseng azong mak be ba ni fok kurng'e.
Ayong agbang atsi risim aYeso natoon limazhiri wu be kubsp wu tEnye.

aYeso f be wu ye, Ei, mi f koakye ikng kanang nashn koangan. Mi bun ibsp nerawe'me kayr atu aduwa ne kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben nar kaya ner aYahuda tEku nyiis cicr. Mi kun i f ikng ikak ni nunrng ba.
Kamok aky ne wan ti nye kurip ? Rip fe a tin foos, ba ren ikng iya mi tEku tas ba.E
aYeso tEfa f anong ne azining kayr ya a tEtor kar kuya Adakunom iben'e ku barak kubk nanyisi. Ne a f be wu ye, Anong ne wan tEshiish agbang atsi'me a?E
aYeso f be wu ye, Ke mi f ikng ikak imaan'e, ne i f Eta fok. Amma ke katsak'e ne mi f, aky sak wan ti rus ?E
Ayong Anas tu bun be wu nufe aKayafas agbang atsi'me be aYeso nurosom.
aSiman Bitrus ta se be ifok kurng wu ame nunyeseng yong akak tEku rip ye, Katsak'e wan nye azining kayr limazhiri wu ba a?EAyong aBitrus ton'e, a tEf ye Wayo, mi nye akak ba.E
Asam agbang atsi akak a tEnye afuri aner aya aBitrus tEtsang a tn kuto wu ame f be wu ye, Aser, mi tEdi yin mak be wu rik nafar aa?E
Ayong aBitrus bun a ton'e gbak nizen iyong ne atsn kpaan ku tp.

Nadiding bop, aner aYahuda'me won kasa aKayafas nong Eta tseng be aYeso nasa aner a tEnye agwmna aRom. ner aYahuda'me gaar kun kayr azuri rigwm'e ye iyong ta sak ba ta ba se zhl ba. Kamok ba shim Eta se ya naya aPasova.
Kamok anong, aBilatus wuruk nufang nong a tEku s ba ne a f be ba ye, Yin bn yin kukun aky natoon aner na ?E
Ayong ba f ye, A fa f ye aner na nye amaan ikng ba, ke yir bn yir be wu aze ba.E
Ne aBilatus f be ba ye, Tseng yin be wu be rice yin nong tEku t yin amok be itsi yin'e.EAmma ner aYahuda ame f ye, A ti nk yir iren ku tn akak amok riku ba.E
I se anong, nong a tEshining ikng aYeso tEtsang a f, a tEf kuri riku wu tana ku.
Ayong aBilatus tEku bun kayr azuri wu ne a yis aYeso nong a tEku rip ye, Wan ne i nye agwm fe aYahuda a?E
aYeso f be wu ye, Kurip na nye kufuan ka kak ne EtEtees ?E
aBilatus f be wu ye, Mi nye afu Yahuda ba. nerawe wan ne gbang tsi ne Ebn be wan aze. Wan nye aky ?E
Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, Rigwm'i nye rif kazatse na ba. A fa f ye ri nye rif kazatse na ke fe a tin nye itomong kon nong Eta tnng ner aYahuda ku ni yiir. Amma kyrna rigwm mi se nar kakak.E
Amma aBilatus f ye, Aser, wan nye agwm a?EaYeso f ye, Wan ne wan f be kanu wan ye mi nye agwm. Ikng iya i tEsak a tin tes'ong, nong ta taas katsak'e. Koangan a ta nye afe katsak, shim kufoos kut mi.E
aBilatus f be wu ye, Aky nye katsak ?ENama a tEf anong ne a bun a wuruk nufang gbak a tEbe nufe ner aYahuda nong a tEf be ba ye, Ko mi tu s be rinn ikng ikak ba.
Amma i nye ign yin, mi tana ka nk yin aner azining kayr afe a ta se ni itsm nizen aPasova. Yin shim yin a tEka won yin agwm fe aYahuda a?E
Ayong Eta kut a tEku shim'e ye, Wayo wu ba, yir shim yir ke wan won aBarabas.E(aBarabas'e nye agbang akpatang.)
Iyong aBilatus sak a ta se whereng aYeso.
Ne sozha'me karam ikiritsan nong Eta te aYeso'me rice. Ne Ekute kuwn kukpiin kuseng kyndi kufe agwm.
yiir bs nufu ne Ef ye, Kunom ra be rigwm, agwm ner Yahuda.ENe Eyiir ku tsosok nanyisi.
aBilatus bun a wuruk gbak a tEf be fe aYahuda'me ye, Di yin, mi ta ka tun yin'e nong tEren yin ye mi tEs a nye rinn ikng ikak ife nong a tu ku t amok ba.E
Nizen iya aYeso tEwuruk an te ribong ikiritsan be awn kukpiin ame ne aBilatus f be ba ye, T, aner'e na!E

Kum gbang tsi ne fe a tEtor kar'me, a tEfa ku di, ne Etasak ye, A ku tigak, A ku tigak.EAmma aBilatus f be ba ye, Yin ku sok yin nong ta su ku tigak yin, mi tEku s be nye rinn ikng ikak nong tu ku t amok ba.E
Amma ner aYahuda yiir'e ding ding ye, Yir be yir itsi, itsi yir f ye, a tEku fr dim, kamok wu sok rice wu ye wu nye Igon Adakunom.E
aBilatus tEfa fok anong a ti barang ku fok inyim didng.
Ayong a tEku bun kayr azuri wu nong a tEse rip aYeso ye, Wan ne ak ?EKo aYeso tEku sak ko'me ba ba.
aBilatus f ye, Wan tEf kanu be mi aa? Wan ren ye mi kyem tEka won ka tEka tigak aa?E
Amma aYeso f be wu ye, Wan ti be kukyem kukak natoon'i zr be kuya a ta ka nk natoon kaza ba. Kamok anong, aner aya a tin sok a tEka nk ne a be rinn ne a ka nar.E

Be rif na aBilatus shim ke a won aYeso, amma ner aYahuda yiir itasak ye, Ke wan won aner na a ta tseng, i nye ye wan nye aferim aKaisar ba. Koangan a ta sok rice wu ye wu nye agwm tonong ye wu rawu aKaisar.E
aBilatus tEfa fok anong, yong a tun aYeso'me nufang ne a sonong natoon itsik amok, a tEnye be ata. (A yis ni irem ner Aramiya ye aGabbata.)
Katuk'ong nye kunom kunye kanyk aPasova, natite kunom. aBilatus f be ner aYahuda ame ye, Inga yin agwm yin!E

Amma ner aYahuda ame korok ikun ye, A ku fr! A ku fr! A ku tigak!E Ayong aBilatus tEku rip ba ye, Yin shim yin mi ta tigak agwm yin a?E Ne gbang atsi ame f ye, Ei, yir be yir agwm akak zr be aKaisar ba.E
Ni igang'e aBilatus sok aYeso nong a tEnk ner aYahuda tEtigak.
Ayong sozha dorok EtEtseng be aYeso. aYeso wuruk kayr kuwp'e an cer kukon a tana ku tigak mo be rice wu, ma nar a tEyis ye Kar hkark Ace. (Ni irem ner Aramiya a yis ye aGolgota.)
Azong ne a tigak aYeso'me mak be ner akak ba afa, azining nabas kubk riya akak nabas kubk rimen.
aBilatus nye izibir ikak nong a tin basak nukon a tin tigak aYeso'me ye, E
ner aYahuda whr fa izibir'e kamok kar a tEku tigak aYeso'me se bubarak be agbang kuwp, a nye izibir'e ni irem ner aYahuda ne ni irem ner aRom ne ife aner aHeleni.
Ayong gbang tsi'me f be aBilatus ye, Sang tu zibir ye, Agwm fe aYahudaEba, amma zibir ye aner na sok rice wu ye wu nye Agwm ner aYahuda.E
aBilatus f ye, Ikng iya mi tan zibir mi zibir'ong.E
Nama asozha'me tEtigak aYeso, Esok ares wu a tEkasap, nasa nanaas. Koangan ba be kukap kuzining. Kukpiin kufe kayr'e tEku tuk kuya ku ta se itan'e izining, kunye kugung'e natoon'e ma natak, a tos ba.

Ayong a f be rice ba ye, I tu sarak yir ba, i nye yir kukasa ta di yir aner aya a tana s.EA nye iyu nong a tEshining izibir Kufumung Adakunom tEf ye, kasap ares'i nace ba, Etin nye kukasa na ares'i.E  Ikng iya sozha'me tEnye'ong.
ner aya a tEse nunyeseng bubarak be kutigak aYeso'me nye anyining wu, be angasnyining wu be aMarya abining aKilopas ne aMarya abafe aMagadaliya.
aYeso tEfa di anyining wu, ne alimazhiri wu aya wu tEshim didng ame nuyeseng azong, yong a f be anyining wu'me ye, Ang, ayong ne a te igon wan.E
Ne a f be alimazhiri'me ye, Ang wan'ong.EKum nizen iyong limazhiri'me tseng be anyining aYeso'me kari wu.
Nama anong, aYeso tEren ye kyrna a n gang koakye, nong as a tEshining ikng iya Kufumung Adakunom tEf yong aYeso f ye, Kut mi n koor.E
Kafeneng akpukpak ashi anap tEku se azong, ayong a ti shumung asoso kayr'e, a tErosom nukon nong a tEnabak aYeso'me nanu.
aYeso tEshushu akpukpak ashi'me ne a f ye, An gang!E Ne a ma roor kut a tEnk kutser wu.

Adakunom f ye, kayr inom igang'e, mi t shining nerawe cicr be Kabik Kazhl'e. Inoon yin atek be nyining t nye kuzarap, Adakunom t tonong cam be nanamang katsak wu. shn t ren katsak Adakunom kayr nabos ba.

ner Isarela fok yin rif na, aYeso a t nye afu Nazaret nye aner aya Adakunom t ka tom yin'e. Adakunom nye itomong azhing be ife kukyem kayr wu nashn yin, yin ren yin anong be rice yin.

nerawe t fa fok anong, rif'me t ku ra ba nay ma a daam didng. Ne f be aBitrus ne ribir manzo'me ye, roneng, yir ta nye yir an ?
