Ritek Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi se mak be kabik yin.
Gbugbang, Adakunom f kanu be tukop yir ni iren zr zr ne nizen zr zr be aner kuzarap.
Amma kayr inom igang'e na, a f kanu be yir be Igon wu, aya a t ku sak a ta te a ya kutse ikr cicr. Mak be wu ne a nye koakye.

Igon'e ne ka nye akanang kuyiik Adakunom, a tas Adakunom kyn. A yiir koakye ikng be kukyem rif wu. Nama a t sak yir ta te yir zhl kayr rinn yir, yong a sonong nubk riya Aya a ta nye a yiik'e kayr kaza.
Kamok anong ne wu nar maleka be kuyiik kyndi riyerek a tu ku te'me ta nar rifuba.
Kamok amaleka akak kuse Adakunom t kun f be wu ye, Wan nye Igon'i, katuur mi n te Ada wan ba.  Ka ye, Mi t te Ada wu, ne wu ma te Igon'i ba.
Nizen iya Adakunom t tom igon wu kafe imsng'e kayr kazatse, a bun a f ye, Won maleka cicr tu ku ya iben.
Natoon maleka, Adakunom f ye, Adakunom sak maleka sor kyndi kuwun ne a sak sam wu t sor kyndi rigyem kurng.
A f natoon Igon'e ye, Itsik rigwm wan, Adakunom, t sor ma izen izen. Katsak ne ka ta nye ishn rigwm wan.
Wan shim katsak ne i rawan amaan kuse kamok anong Adakunom, a ta nye Adakunom wan, t kasa a ta ka korok name rice. A t sak wan ta s kuyiik ku ta nar kufe fudang wan.
A bun a f ye, Kum ni imsng'e, Agwm gwm, wan ne i barak ribor kazatse, kaza nye itomong ibk wan.
Ikr'ong cicr t gor, amma wan t sor ma izen izen. Ikr'ong t kop kyndi ares.
Wan t ka kunung ba kyndi ares, a t yiir ku shishing kyndi ares. Amma wan shishing ba, ay wan be igak ba.
maleka anyaka ne Adakunom kun f be wu ye, Sonong nubk riya mi, ma mi sak mudn wan te ikng kusak atak wan ?
maleka cicr nye nabik naya na ta nye ner ta s kashesh itomong.
Kamok anong, i ni barang yir ku ni sak yir riy natoon ikr i tan fok yir fan i bu te yir titak ta won yir iren'e.
Kamok ke rif a ta shan nufe maleka be agap, koangan afe a ta shonong a gaar kufok'e t s risam kamok ikng iya wu t nye,
yir t nye yir an ta wher yir ke yir gaar yir kushan agbang kashesh kuri kuyu ? Agwm gwm yir be rice wu ne a taas itak kashesh na ni imsng'e. ner ya a t ku fok ti tonong yir ye i se anong be katsak.
Adakunom gip a tonong ye i se anong be kunye ikr azhing ne ife kukyem ne kunang Kabik Kazhl'e t kasap anerawe kyndi wu ta shim.
Sang Adakunom sak maleka nong tin nye rigwm nizam iyu afe yir ta sen nif yir na ba.
Nar kakak, aner akak zibir kayr Kufumung rif Adakunom ye, Anerawe nye aky wan tin daam ni wu ? Anerawe nye aky wan tin sak riy ni wu ?
Wan t ku nye a ti raar cik na maleka, wan t nk rigwm be kuyiik

ne i ku sak a tin nye rigwm natoon ikr cicr.  Nizen Adakunom t ku sak a tin nye rigwm natoon ikr'me, a won dar a ku won ikng ikak ba. Gip be anong, yir di yir anerawe ti nye rigwm natoon ikr cicr kyrna ba.
Amma ikng iya yir ta yrk yir nye aYeso, aya a ta tsang a ni raar na maleka, amma kyrna a tu ku nk kuyiik be rigwm kamok a s risam riku nong se ritek Adakunom ta fok risam riku kamok koangan.
Adakunom ne a nye koakye, kamok wu ne koakye kuse. Kamok anong ke i nye ye Adakunom bn inoon wu whr kuyiik, i ta se gyr a ta tiyiik akk kashn kashesh ba. A nye anong be risam aYeso t s.
Aya a ta se zhl ne ya a t ku sak ba t te zhl nye ner kasa kazining. Kamok anong, aYeso fok isum a t ka yis ba ye ronyining wu ba.
A f ye, Mi t f itak riyerek wan nashn ronyining'i, mi t ka kerek be abom, nashn rigwm nerawe wan.
A bun a f ye, Mi tin fereng ni wan.  Ne a bun a f gbak ye, Mi na mak be inoon Adakunom ta min nk.
Kum inoon'e ta be rinam be nask, wu gip a sok kuse rinerawe nong as kamok riku wu a ta yirik agap aya riku ta se nubk wu, aner'e nye Ishetan
ne a turung ya inyim riku ta ma ka te ba nitsm cicr.
Katsak'e, sang maleka ne wu t ku tobok ba ba, amma kuri Ibrahim ne a t ku tobok ba.
Kamok anong ne wu te kyndi ronyining wu kayr koakye iren, nong as a t te agbang atsi afe a ta be kur riy ne a nye katsak ni itomong Adakunom. A nye asidaka'ong nong a tin sok rinn nerawe.
Wu be rice wu s risam nizen a t ku bmng, kamok anong a kyem a ta tobok ya a ta sen ku bmng ba cicr.
Kamok anong, roneng azhl'e, yin ya i tin se yin kayr kuyis kufe kaza na, t, yin tsik natoon aYeso, a ta nye Amanzo ne Agbang Atsi niren yir ta min nk yir katsak.
aYeso tonong katsak kayr itomong aya a t ku kasa, kyndi aMusa ta nye katsak ni itomong wu kayr nerawe Adakunom.
aYeso be kuyiik ne a nar aMusa kyndi aner rink ta be kuyiik ne a nar rink'e.
Koakye kasa anerawe ne a nk, amma Adakunom ne a nye koakye ikng.
aMusa tonong katsak kayr itomong wu ife asam kayr anerawe Adakunom, nong i ta sor asheda ikr iya i tana b nashn.

Amma aKiristi tonong katsak kyndi igon a tu ku nk kukyem a tanin sak riy natoon nerawe Adakunom cicr. Yir ne i nye yir nerawe'me, ke i ya yir kashn be ku naka tsesek ne ku ni te riy kuya i tin tsor yir kafok natoon'e ma nigang'e.
T, kyndi Kabik Kazhl'e ta f ye, Katuur, ke yin fok yin kut wu,
tu shonong yin ba, kyndi yin t shonong yin nizen iya yin t bmng yin Adakunom kayr katse.
Azong ne da yin ti maas ne a ni bmng, ay isk inaas ne yrk ikr iya mi t nye.
Iyong ne i sak riy mi ta beseng be izam iyong ma mi f ye, Ay ba se gugk be mi koakye izen, a ren ren'i ba.
Kayr riy kubeseng, mi nye kushu ye, Sang ba t s iren tana n nar kufan'i ba ko cik.
roneng, sak yin riy fan akak yin bu nye amaan kutrng ne a won dar a ni nk katsak, nong a ta won kukuus Adakunom afe kutser.
Amma yiir i naka tsesek yin kunom. Ni nye yin itomong be koakye izen iya a ta yis ye, katuur, nong fan rinn bu wk akak yin nong ta shonong.
Yir ta te yir azining be aYeso ke i yiir yir katsak yir ta be yir kum ni imsng'e kpa ma nigang'e.
Kyndi a tan f ye: Katuur, ke yin fok yin kut Adakunom, tu shonong yin ba, kyndi yin t te yin ma i te yin shaam.
ngan ne fok kut Adakunom ne bun shonong ? Cicr ner aya aMusa t ka tun ba niben aMasar.
Riy Adakunom beseng be ngan ma ay isk inaas ? Riy wu beseng be ner a t nye rinn, fe a t kus kayr katse.
Be ngan ne Adakunom shu ye sang ta n kayr nawu kufan wu ba ? Mi f ka be ya a ta nye rinn ?
Kamok anong, yir ren yir ye kyem n ba, kamok kuwon dar kunk katsak ba.
Kamok anong, kum kunk kut a t tsang a f be yir ye, yir t n yir kayr kar kufan wu tu ku se, t, i sak yir riy fan kak yir bu won dar kyem n.
Kamok a min taas yir Rif Ritek kyndi a t ka taas ba. Amma rif ba t fok sor ikng ikak nufu ba ba, kamok fe t fok ti nk katsak ba.

Yir fe i ta min nk yir katsak i n yir kayr kar kufan kyndi Adakunom ta f ye, Riy mi beseng, kamok anong mi shu ye ba t n kayr kar kufan'i ba ko cik.  Adakunom f anong, nama a t tsang a gang itomong kunye kazatse wu.
Kamok nar kakak a f itak kunom kufe kanataar kayr kufumung rif Adakunom ye, Katuk afe kanataar Adakunom fan be kunye itomong wu cicr.
amma ayong a bun a f ye, Ba t n kayr kufan'i ba ko cik.
I rusek anong, kak t n kayr kufan'e, amma ya a t san kufok Rif Ritek s kun kayer'e ba, kamok kushonong ba.
Kamok anong, Adakunom sak kunom kukak a ta yis ye, Katuur. A fa baan didng ne a f nanu aDauda kyndi a ta tsang a zibir ye, Katuur ke yin fok yin kut wu, tu shonong yin ba.
Kamok ke a fa f ye aZhoshuwa ta ka nk ba nar kufan'e ke Adakunom ra ba f ikng ikak natoon kunom kukak nashn ba.
Iyong tonong ye, kufan nama inom kanataar rusek gbak kamok ner Adakunom.
Kamok aner aya a ta n kayr kufan Adakunom, a ta fan ni itomong'e ifu gip kyndi Adakunom t nye.
Won i tu nye yir koakye ikng i tana kyem i nye yir nong ta n yir kayr kufan'ong, fan akak bu kuus kuse ba, a t kpa, ta won dar fok kuto.

Katsak'e rif Adakunom be kutser ne ri be agap itomong. Agap wu nar afe awn iya i i ta ya abas afa. a tm ma kayr kurm nerawe nong a ta kam kutser be kabik ne ikap be isr, ma i ren kutrng riy anerawe be kunye wu.
Ikng ikak kuse nunrng nazatse nashn Adakunom ba. Koakye ikng se ds, i se kanang nashn wu. Nashn wu ne i ta nyeseng yir nong t taas yir koakye ikng i t nye yir.
Kamok anong, kum yir ta be yir agbang atsi ayiik'e, aYeso Igon Adakunom, aya a ta tseng naza, won i tu yiir yir kunk katsak yir be agap didng.
Agbang atsi aya yir ta be yir nye aya a ta r riy yir kayr kuraar yir. A t bmng kayr koakye iren kyndi yir, gip be anong a nye rinn ba.
Won yir tu b yir nashn itsik ritek Adakunom'me be riy rizining, nong as ta s yir kur riy be ritek nizen iya i ta se yir kayr kutsr.
Koakye agbang atsi Adakunom ne a tu kasa kayr nerawe fudang nong a t f kanu rice ba natoon ikr Adakunom ne a nye asidaka kamok rinn.
A kyem a nye tatan be ya a ta taam ne ya a ta dun kuren ikng, kamok wu be rice wu ta be kuraar kuri kuf rinerawe gip.
Iyong ne isak wu nye asidaka kamok rinn wu be rife nerawe.
Akak t kyem a tin te rice wu ba, ma ke Adakunom ne a t yis kyndi a t yis aHaruna.
Anong ne, aKiristi gip, a s kuyiik kusor agbang atsi be rice wu ba. Amma Adakunom ne a f be wu ye, Wan ne i nye Igon mi, katuur mi n te Ada wan.
A bun a f nar kakak ye, Wan nye agbang atsi ma izen izen, kyndi aMakizadek.
Nizen aYeso t se aze nazatse, a t kut naza a t nye aduwa ne a nye izong be nanyisi nufe Adakunom aya a tana kyem a ku shesh kayr riku. Adakunom t fok kamok a nye aner a t mees rice.
aYeso nye Igon Adakunom gyrtatan, amma a ti barang kukuus kut Adakunom kayr risam a t s.
Nizen iya a t ma shining gyr, ne a ma sor iren kutser kufe izen izen nufe koangan aya a ta kuus ikng iya a ta f.
Adakunom ne a t ku kasa a ta sor agbang atsi kyndi aMakizadek.
Yir be yir ikr whr tana f yir natoon iyong, amma i r ta ka tonong yin kamok yin ren yin ikng zizirik ba.
Katsak'e, a fa gy ke yin ma sen bsp yin kak'e kyrna, gip be anong yin ru shim yin kak afe a tana ka bsp yin ikr izhizhk'e kayr rif Adakunom. Yin tsr yin nabasang, sang akpakarak naya ba.
Aner aya nabasang ne na ta nye naya wu ru nye izk igon, an m be kubsp natoon kuse azhl nashn Adakunom ba.
Naya na ta se kpakarak nye nafe ner aya a tan te anerawe, ner kuri ayong ne ninye itomong be kutrng ba nong ta kyem ren ikng iya i ta nye itek be imaan'e.

Kamok anong, tu bun i beseng yir izen yir natoon ikr izhizhk'e natoon aYeso ba, nong ta ya yir kashn, ta te yir nerawe. Sang tu bun i kubun yir kama ta nye yir kubsp itak kushishing kuse natoon ikr i tana bn riku be itak ku nink katsak na Adakunom ba,
itak abatisma be ku nisaas ibk ritek natoon nerawe, ne kudorok ikom be amok afe izen izen.
Ke Adakunom shim yir t te yir anong.
ya ta tsang ren akanang'e, tan fok kunang Adakunom, ya a ta gung rice be Kabik Kazhl'e,
ne ya a t kun fok ritek rif Adakunom ne kukyem kufe kashn.
Gip be anong t ku bun kama kayr kunk katsak ba. ta ba kyem b ba nong ta shishing kuse ba ba, kamok ba t bun tigak Igon Adakunom ne ku te isum kayr nerawe.
Kaben kaya ka ta s ashi nizen iya iza tin kpas yr yr ne naya te didng, ne ka s ritek Adakunom.
Amma kaya amaan agam be ikiritsan tin tang nye ka kpdng'e. Adakunom t fiming kar kayong, ne a shosh nigang'e.
roneng, yir f yir anong gyrtatan, amma yir nk yir katsak ye yin ta se yin anong ba, yin ta s yin ritek ikr iya i ta nye ife kus kashesh.
Adakunom won dar a nye gyr ba. A t tiburum be itomong ne kushim yin t ku tonong yin kuya yin t tobok yin nerawe wu ba. Ne i ya yin kashn be kunye anong.
Yir shim yir koangan kayr yin tu ya kashn be ifeng anong ma nigang'e, nong ta ren yin ye yin t s yin ikng iya yin ta min te yin riy.
Yir shim yin tu ymng yin ba, amma sor yin kyndi ya a tin nk katsak ne naka tsesek ma ya kutse ikng iya Adakunom ta tsang a f.
Nizen iya Adakunom t nk kut be Ibrahim, a nye be kushu. A shu be riyerek wu kamok akak tu nar yiik nong a tin nye kushu be wu ba.
Adakunom f ye, Katsak'e mi ta ka te ritek. Mi ta sak kuri wan t te whr.
Ibrahim t fa mees riy wu, yong a s ikng iya Adakunom t f ye a tu ku nye'me.
nerawe shu be aner aya a ta ka nar ba yiik, kushu'ong nye agbang ikng ku gang nanan.
Adakunom shim a ta tonong aner aya a tana di ikng iya wu t f ye wu shishing ba, yong a shu.

Adakunom nye anong kayr ikng ifa a tana shishing'e ba, iya Adakunom tanin b abs ba. Yir fe i ta te yir gbashak i ta shan yir ikng iya i t min te yir riy ta tsesek yir. In yiir yir ikng iya i t min te yir riy be agap ma ay yir n kpa nafa.
Kute riy yir ta be yir na ne ku sak yir ta nyesek yir ana dar inyim ka be agak riy ba, ri n tsik ma nama alaple kayr kaza, kar Adakunom tu ku sor.
aYeso tsang an tseng azong nashn yir kamok yir. An te agbang atsi ma izen izen kyndi aMakizadek.
aMakizadek na ne a nye agwm aSalim, a nye atsi Adakunom Agbang Agwm gwm. A nyim be Ibrahim nizen a t ne ni iya gwm kak nitsm, yong a t te kuc.
Ibrahim t nk ikng izining kayr koakye ikng kusk a t ya nar itsm'e. Ife imsng'e, riyerek wu nye Agwm katsak. Riyerek wu a ta yis ye Agwm aSalim'ong sor ye, Agwm kusor caang.
A be ada ka ang ba, akak ren izen a t ku tes ka izen iya a t ku ba. A se kyndi Igon Adakunom a ta nye atsi ma izen izen.
Di yin kuri kuyiik a t be, ma atukop yir Ibrahim t ku nk izining kayr koakye ikng kusk wu t ya nitsm.
Itsi aMusa f ye kuri aLawi aya a ta te tsi, ta shan izining kayr koakye ikng kusk nerawe, ronyining ba gip. Ba nye kuri Ibrahim gip gyrtatan.
aMakizadek'e nye kunik kasa aLawi ba. Gip be anong, a shan izining kayr koakye ikng kusk nufe Ibrahim ne a ku te kuc, wu afe Adakunom t f ye a t ku nye ikng ikak.
Katsak'e, aner aya a ta te akak kuc se yiik ne a ku nar aya a tu ku te'me.
Nabon aLawi naya na ta shashang izining kayr koakye ikng kusk'ong kus kyndi ribir nerawe. aMakizadek shashang izining kayr koakye ikng kusk gip, rif Adakunom ra tak ye a ku ba.
Aner ta kyem a f ye aLawi afe a ta shashang ikng izining kayr koakye ikng kusk'ong karang nubk Ibrahim.
Kamok nizen iya aMakizadek t nyim be Ibrahim, a tsang a tes aLawi ba.
Ke itomong ritsi kuri ife aLawi ta kyem i sak aner ta te zhl (Kamok atsi ne a nye itsi) t, aky sak a bun a shim ke a s atsi akak a ta se kyndi aMakizadek sang aHaruna ba ?
Kamok ke a shishing atsi, ne a shishing itsi gip.

Katsak'e nye aYeso Agwm gwm yir wuruk kayr kuri aYahuda kuya sang aMusa ta kun nif ikng ikak natoon ba ni itomong ritsi ba.
Ikng iya yir tin f yir min barang kute kanang, atsi akak kyndi aMakizadek n wuruk.
Aya a ta te atsi sang natoon ign tukop wu ba, amma natoon kukyem kutser kufe ku tana sor ma izen izen.
A f ye, Wan nye atsi ma izen izen kyndi aMakizadek.
A won ign ife imsng'e kamok i be agap ikng ikak ba.
Itsi aMusa kyem i ta sak ikng ikak ta te zhl ba, iyong ne i sak yir nye yir kanyk ikng itek iya yir tin te yir riy natoon'e nong ta se yir bubarak be Adakunom.
Adakunom nye anong be kushu wu. Ribir tsi n kayr itomong ba dar kushu.
Amma aYeso te atsi be kushu nizen Adakunom t f be wu ye, Agwm gwm n shu, a ta bun a shishing riy wu ba. Wan nye atsi ma izen izen.
Kamok kushu Adakunom na, aYeso tonong ye kushu'me nye katsak ne ku nar ribir'e cei.
tsi tuse whr gbugbang kamok riku ta ka roon ba kuya kashn be itomong.
Amma aYeso t sor ma izen izen, kamok ritsi wu t gang zr ba.
Kamok anong, a ta kyem a shesh koangan a ta gor nufu a ta tseng nufe Adakunom, a ta sor ma izen izen ne a yiir nye aduwa kamok ba.
Atsi kuri ayong ne a tin rng yir rinn yir. A se zhl dar rinn, a be narik ba, a t kam zr be fe rinn, a t ku tiyiik a ta tseng kayr kaza.

A se kyndi ribir gbang atsi ba, a nye asidaka koakye katuk kamok rinn wu ni imsng'e nizham a ta ra nye kamok nerawe ba. Amma a nye asidaka kamok rinn nerawe cicr kutak kuzining nizen iya a t nk rice wu.
Itsi aMusa sak nerawe t raar t te agbang atsi, amma kushu kufe ku t b nama itsi sak Igon'e a ta se zhl te atsi ma izen izen.
Rice rif yir tin f yir se ye, yir be yir agbang atsi akak kyndi ayong afe a t sonong nubk riya itsik rigwm Adakunom ayiik'e kayr kaza.
A nye itomong wu nar itomong atsi kazhl'e kufe katsak, kuya Adakunom t nye sang anerawe ba.
A sak koangan agbang atsi ni itomong nong a ta shosh asidaka ikr be ife ikewum. Iyong ne i sak i ta se gyr ayu gip a ta tsr ikng ikak a ta nk.
A fa f ye a rusek nazatse, ke a sor atsi ba, kamok ner kak kuse ta nye asidaka kyndi itsi aMusa t f.

Nizen iya a ta nye itomong nar kaya ka ta nar kuse zhl, a maas ne a kuus nawu ikng iya a ta nye kayr kaza tsek. Iyong ne i sak a t kpam aMusa nizen iya a t tsr a t tar kubur a tanin ya Adakunom iben ye, Sak riy nong ta nye koakye ikng kyndi mi ta ka tonong natoon rifan.
Itomong aYeso t nye se yiik ne i nar ifuba cei, kyndi kushu kufas wu tin n natite nerawe be Adakunom ta nar kuse yiik. Ikr Adakunom t f ye a ta nye nar kunye itek gip.
A fa f ye ikng ikak won dar i te titeng be kushu kufe imsng'e ba ke a bun a nye kufe afa'me ba.
Adakunom di nerawe t taam. Ayong a f ye, Izen saase mi tana ya kushu kufas be ner Isarela be kasa ner aYahuda.

Iyong ta se kyndi kushu mi t nye be tukop ba nizen iya mi t ka krk ba kubk i t ka tun ba niben aMasar ba, kamok ba yiir kushu mi t nye be ba be katsak ba. Kamok anong Agwm gwm f ye, Mi ta ka kirik ba kama.
Kushu kuya mi tana nye be kasa ner Isarela na: Agwm gwm f ye nama izen iyong, mi t ka te ba Itsi kayr ay ba ne i bun i zibir nay ba. Mi t te Adakunom ba ne ba te nerawe mi.
Akak t ba bsp afegbak wu'me ba. Akak t ba bsp aronyining wu'me ne a f ye, Ren Adakunom ba, kamok koangan tin ren, inoon'e ba ashn'e cei.
Mi t ka rng ba rinn ba, mi t ba yiring be rinn ba ba.
Kum Adakunom t f ye rif kushu na nye Kufas, kufe imsng'e te kuzen. Ikng iya i tan te izen ta gor ne i gang.
Kushu kufe imsng'e tonong iren a tana ya Adakunom iben, be kar ku kuya iben anerawe ta nye.

Nizen iya a t saas ikr na cei anong, ne tsi ra ma n nutu kufe kanu'me, t nye itomong ba.
Agbang atsi tsek ne a n nutu kufe kayr'e, kutak kuzining koakye riy. Izen iya a ta n ma a n be nask a tana nk kamok rinn wu be riya nerawe t nye kayr kudun kuren.
Iyu ne i sak Kabik Kazhl'e t tonong ye, an karak kar ka ta nar kuse zhl nizham ba, kum ke kubur'e ru kuse.
Iyu ti tonong yir ikng ikak kyrna. Iyong ti tonong yir ye asidaka a ta nye yr yr t sak ay anerawe ta te zhl nashn Adakunom ba.
Ikr'ong a t nye se natoon kuyas be kus ne ku naka kusu. Ikr'ong nye ife kurm tsek iya a tin nye itomong ma nizen iya Adakunom ta shishing koakye.

Nizen iya aYeso t b, wu ta nye agbang atsi afe ikr itek iya i tan b nakuruk, kubur kuya wu tin nye itomong kayr'e se yiik ne ku nar. Ku nar kubur kuya anerawe ta tar zhl, kubur'ong nye kufe kazatse na ba.

ke nask ikewum kyndi iyong t sak anerawe te zhl shita nask aYeso Kiristi a? Wu afe a t b kayr Kabik Kazhl'e dar rizik nashn Adakunom, a nk rice wu kamok rinn yir. A ti kam yir be ikr iya i ta bn riku nong i ta ya yir Adakunom afe kutser iben.

Kamok anong, aKiristi ne a se natite kushu kufas nong as fe a ta ma ka yis ba t shan kutser kufe izen izen kuya Adakunom ta f ye a t nk. Kyrna wu ku nong a t ka shesh ba kayr rinn rife ba t tsang nye kayr kushu kufe imsng'e.

Kamok a ti nye itomong be kufumung natoon kuya kutse ba, ma ke aner a ta zibir kufumung'e ku. Ke aner'e rusek be kutser, a sen kyem a ninye itomong ba.
Iyong ne i sak a kyem a ninye itomong be kushu kufe imsng'e dar nask ba.

Nizen iya aMusa t tak nerawe Itsi, a sok nask inoon inyak ne nafe izha a tin gung be ashi. Ne a sok iwhang kakon kakak a ta yis ye aHisop mak be nakuyng tsamang naseng a ta shumung, a tin mis nask'e natoon kufumung Itsi ne nerawe cicr.

A fa f ye aKiristi nye anong, ke an s risam ne a toos'e kum nizen iya a t nye kazatse. A b kutak kuzining tsek nigang'e na, a t nk rice wu asidaka kamok rinn yir.
Kyndi a tan sak,
anong ne a nk aKiristi kutak kuzining gip nong a t sor asidaka kusok rinn nerawe whr. A t bun a b ife afa nong a t shesh ya a ta sen ku tor, sang kamok nong a t sok rinn baba ba.
Itsi nye nawu ikr itek i tana b tsek sang atuk kunik ikr'me ba. Iyong ne isak asidaka aya a t yiir nye'me koakye izen, ay be ay t sak ya a ta bs kuya Adakunom iben ta te zhl ba.
A fa f ye, Itsi ta kyem i sak nerawe ta te zhl, ke a ba nye asidaka'me akak ba. Ke a rng rinn nerawe kazining tsek, ke ay ba se gak natoon rinn ba baba ba.
Amma asidaka a t nye'ong yiir iyiring nerawe rinn ba koakye riy tsek.
Kamok nask amung be izha ta kyem i kusu rinn nigaan'e ba.
Kamok anong, nizen iya aKiristi t b nazatse, a f ye, Asidaka be kunyesek ikr ne wan shim ba, amma kurm ne wan nye kanyk'e.
Asidaka a ta shosh ne asidaka kukusu rinn, ne wan ti be riy rikan ba.
Iyong mi f ye, Mi na, Adakunom mi, mi m b nong mi ta nye ikng iya wan ta shim, kyndi i ta se ni izibir natoon'i, kayr Kufumung rif Adakunom.
Ni imsng'e, a f ye, Asidaka be kunyesek ikr, ne asidaka kushosh be afe a ta nye kamok rinn, wan ti be riy rikan ba. Itsi ne i f ye a ra nye anong.
A bun a f ye, Mi na, mi n b ta nye ikng iya wan ta shim. Iyong tonong ye a won kushu kufe imsng'e nong a t ku te kufe afa.
Be kushim Adakunom ne yir n te yir azhl'e be kunk aYeso Kiristi kyndi asidaka kutak kuzining tsek.
Koakye katuk atsi nye itomong wu, a nye asidaka ne a toos'e koakye kunom. Gip be anong iyong kyem i kusu rinn ba.
Amma aKiristi t nye asidaka wu kutak kuzining kamok rinn nerawe, a sonong nubk riya Adakunom.

Kabik Kazhl'e f be yir anong gip natoon iyu. Ni imsng a f ye,

A bun a ti barang ye, Mi t ba yiring be rinn ba be amaan kunye ba ba.

Won tu b yir bubarak be Adakunom be riy rizining, be kunk katsak kamok aYeso ti mis nask wu na agak ay yir. A bun a kusu irm yir be ashi a ta se zhl.
Won yir tu yiir yir ikng iya yir ta min te yir riy, iya i ta taas yir, kamok wu afe a ta f ye wu tin nye yir ikr na shishing rif wu ba.

Sang yir tu won dar i nyiis yir kyndi kak tan m ne nye ba. Amma i ban naka tsesek yir, ne i ni barang yir kunye anong kamok yin di yin Kunom'me nye ne kub gbugbarak.

Natoon kunk katsak ne aHabila ti nye Adakunom asidaka afe a t nar afe aKayinu. Be anong ne a s kushim Adakunom ye wu nye aner atek nashn Adakunom kamok a shan asidaka wu. aHabila n ku, amma kamok kunk katsak wu a ru f kanu ma kyrna.

Akak ta kyem a karp Adakunom riy dar kunk katsak ba, kamok koangan ne a b nufu ma a ti nk katsak ye wu kuse, ye a nyesek aya a tu ku tsr be katsak ishorong ba.

Natoon kunk katsak ne aNuhu ti kpa inyim izhl'e nizen iya a t ku krk kuto natoon ikr wu tan di ba. A nk kukpara ashi a tin shesh fekari wu. Kunk katsak aNuhu sak a tak kazatse rinn ba, aNuhu t sor aya kutse kamok a se gyr nashn Adakunom, kuya a ta s natoon kunk katsak.

Natoon kunk katsak ne Ibrahim ti nk Ishaku a t sor asidaka nizen Adakunom t ku bmng. Wu afe a t shan ikng iya Adakunom t tsang a f be wu ye a t ku nye'me, a bun a sen sok asuzr igon wu'me a tin nye asidaka.

Natoon kunk katsak ne aYusufu ti f itak kuwuruk inoon Isarela niben aMasar nizen iya a t b barak a t ku. A f ikng ikak natoon ikup wu.
Natoon kunk katsak ne atek aMusa t nr ma ifn itaar nama a t ku tes, kamok a di igon'e t kam be ribir'e. t ku teng rigwm gum ba.
Natoon kunk katsak ne aMusa ti rawu a t ku yis ye igon angas aFiruna nizen iya a t te agbang'e.
A nar kushim a t s risam be ner Adakunom ingya be a tana fok kusas rinn kayr kaban izen cik.
A nar kushim a t fok isum kamok aKiristi be a tana sor kayr kurum aMasar, kamok a tsang a ni te riy nishorong wu.

Kamok anong, kum nerawe fe ta kuus rif yir kuse whr ta min gorok yir na, won i tu ku barak yir koakye ikng i tanin tnng yir, be koakye kuni rinn ri ta kyem ri tin te yir afartak zizirik. I naka tsesek yir ta teng yir itsi iya i ta se nashn yir.

Won tin sak yir anyisi na aYeso wu ne a ta nye ritin kunk katsak yir ne a nye aner aya a tana sak kunk katsak yir tanan mumak. A tsesek kayr risam riku wu kamok ikng riy rikan i ta se nashn. A fok isum riku wu natoon kukon ba. Kyrna a se nusonong nubk riya itsik rigwm Adakunom.

Yir be yir da yir fe kurm ya a tin nees yir, iyong ne i sak yir ta ka di yir ba yiik. Fa gy ke yir tiyiik yir Ada yir afe Kabik a ta be kutser ne i nar yir aa?
da yir fe kurm ti nees yir nizen cik niren iya ba ta di i se gyr. Amma Adakunom ti nees yir nong as kunees'e tin s mo yir t s yir kanu kafe yir kayr kuzhl wu.

Kuus yin iren itek nong fan kutak kuya sang kuta nye kutser baŔ bu te kukun'e.
Nye yin koakye ikng yin tana kyem a nye yin nong ta sor yin caang be nerawe cicr ne i sor yin zhl kamok aner akak ta kyem a di Agwm gwm ba, sang ke a se zhl ba.
Sak yin riy fan akak bu ni wei ni ritek Adakunom. Sang tu won yin akak tin wuruk kayr yin be amaan kuse nong a ta sak kak ta wei ba.
Sang tu won yin akak tu kuus nyining kpdng ka a tu se dar inyim Adakunom kyndi Isuwa t sok rishn wu a t rp acek wu'me kamok naya kakereng kazining ba.
Nama a t nye anong, a shim atek t ku te kuc ma be nanyisi, a s ba, kyndi yin ta ren yin. Kamok a shim a t shishing ikng iya wu t nye, a ra kyem'me ba.
Yin n s yin rifan a tana kyem a ra be kubk ba, ka kurng kuya ku ta ya didng, ka kar te whi ne ann nyim whi,
ka rigba, ka kut ku ta f kanu. Kut ku t f kanu'ong sak fe a t fok nye izong ye sang a t ba f be ba ba.
kyem tsesek be ikng iya a t f be ba ba ye, Ko a fa f ye ikewum ne i ra rifan'e, a ta ra barak be ata.
Ikng iya ba t di'me se zhirim ma aMusa f ye, Kurm'i tiim be inyim.
Amma yin n s yin rifan aSihiyona ri ta nye aUshalima afe kaza, agbang kuwp Adakunom afe kutser ne kanyim riy rikan maleka whrr.

Yin n b yin kayr fikuus, ya a ta nye inoon nafe ife imsng'e ya ayerek ba ta se nuzibir kayr kaza. Yin n b yin nufe Adakunom aya a tana t nerawe cicr amok ne nufe nabik ner aya a ta se zhl, ya a ta shining gyr.
Yin n b yin nufe aYeso a ta igaas kushu kufas, ne nufe nask a ta mis na ta be ritek ne na nar nask aHabila.
Sak yin riy, tu rayin aner a ta f rif na ba. Ke kyem wher nizen ba t raba aner aya a t ka tigba ba nazatse ba, yir ta nye yir an ta wher yir ke yir ti nang yir kama ni wu afe a tin tigba yir naza ?
Nizen iyong, Kut Adakunom zuur kazatse. Amma kyrna a bun a nk kut ye, Mi ta bun i zuur kazatse kutak kuzining gbak, sang kazatse tsek ba, amma cei be kaza gip.
Rif a ta f ye, kutak kuzining'ong tonong ye, a ta turung ikr iya a ta zuur'me; i ta nye ikr iya Adakunom t nye, kamok ikr'me ikak iya sang a t kyem zuur ba, kuse.
Kamok anong kum yir tanan n yir kayr rigwm riya sang a tana zuur ba, won i tu tonong yir riy rikan, ne iya yir Adakunom iben kyndi wu ta shim, be kuyiik ne ikap kutiim,
kamok Adakunom nye kurng ku ta ya nar.
Ya yin kashn be ku naka shim kyndi aner be ronyining,
Sang tu won kushashang yin tsen ba, kamok be anong kak ti shan maleka dar kuren ba.
Yiring yin be ya a ta se nitsm, nye yin be ba kyndi yin se yin mak. Yiring yin be ya a ta sen ku nk ba risam, nye yin be ba kyndi yin se yin mak.
Koangan ra tor kuwnng yiik, koangan ra tor kuwnng wu zhl'e, kamok Adakunom t t aner a t nye rikuna be ya a nye kpdng amok.
Kam yin be kuse kumak shim itsm, ne i ni fan yin nikng iya yin ta be yin, kamok Adakunom f ye, Mi ta ka won ba, ko cik mi ta ka barak nigaan'e ba, ko cik.
Iyong ne i sak yir ta kyem i f yir be riy rizining ye, Agwm gwm nye aner a tin tobok, mi ta fok inyim ba. Anerawe tin nye ikng ikak ?
Yiring yin be kk kashn yin ya a ta ka tak yin rif Adakunom. Yrk yin kuri kusor kuya ba ta sor nong ta kuus yin kunk katsak ba.
aYeso Kiristi afe kure be afe katuur ne afe izen izen se azining, a shishing nigaan'e ba.

Sang tu won yin kubsp kuduk ta krk ay yin ba. I se gyr ay yir ta s agap kayr ritek Adakunom sang be kukuus itsi kuya naya ba. Kukuus itsi kuya naya ti barang ner aya a ta kuus itsi iyong ikng ikak ba.
Yir be yir abagadi aya afe, afe a ta nye asidaka nubur tanan kyem ya ikng ikak azong ba.
Agbang atsi n be nask ikewum kayr kar ka ta nar kuse zhl kamok rinn nerawe, a shosh rinam ikewum'e nama kuwp.
Anong ne aYeso di risam nama kuwp, nong a ta sak nerawe wu ta te zhl kamok nask wu.
kamok anong i wuruk yir nong ta be yir nufe nama kuwp, nong ta fok yir isum kyndi wu t fok.
Yir be yir kuwp kufe ku tana sor ma izen izen aze nazatse na ba, amma yir min te yir riy nuwp kuya ku tana b.
Kamok anong, won tu kerek yir Adakunom kayr aYeso be abom nanu yir. Iyong ta sor asidaka aya i tana nk yir, tu ku kerek yir ne i tiyiik yir riyerek wu.
Sang tu won ku naka tobok yin ne i naka nye yir ritek ba, kamok riy Adakunom karp be asidaka kuri ayong.

Kuus yin ikng iya kk kashn yin ta f, ne i nye yin ikng a ta f be yin, kamok ba ne a ti sak riy natoon yin kamok a ta tak kut itomong ba katuk kakak. Ka fok yin ba kuto nong itomong ba ta ka be ba ifeng sang kyndi acer ba. Ke itomong'e ta sor ba acer, iyong ta ka barang mo yin ikng ikak ba.
Nye yin aduwa kamok yir. Kutrng riy yir se gyr, yir shim ta nye yir ikng iya i ta se gyr kayr koakye iren.
Mi shim yin ta nye yin aduwa ne i yiring yin be mi nong Adakunom bun a b be mi nufe yin.
Won Adakunom aya a ta nyesek kameneng riy, aya a t dorok aYeso nurk kamok nask kushu kufas, won wu afe a ta nye afek atek,
ta ka nk yin koakye ikng i ta nye itek, nong ta nye ikng iya wu ta shim. Won wu tu nye ikng iya i tu ku se gyr be yir kayr aYeso Kiristi. Won kuyiik tu sor kufu ma izen izen. Anong!
Kusuk yin roneng, sok yin itabak mi ta ka zibir yin'e na be riy ricaang kamok mi ta zibir yin'e cik tsek.
Mi shim ta ka tak yin ye an tun aronyining yir aTimoti nitsm. Ke wu gum b, mi ta b mak be wu nong ta ka di yin.
Ku nye shou yin kk kashn yin, be azhl'e cicr. fe a ta se niben Italiya ta nye yin ashou.
Ritek Adakunom se mak be yin cicr.
aYakubu asam Adakunom ne afe Agwm agwm yir aYeso Kiristi, mi nye nerawe irem kusk be afa aya a ta te shaam kayr kazatse ashou.
Aroneng, sok yin be riy rikan, izen iya yin n yin ni iriri kubmng.
Kamok yin ren yin ye, kubmng kunk katsak yin ta sak yin tin barang yin Ku naka tsesek.
Ku naka tsesek yin ta tseng ma nigang'e, nong as yin ta shining yin, ne kyem yin sang ta raar yin nikeng ikak ba.
Ke akak yin be kukyem kuren ikeng ba, a ra rip Adakunom, afe a ta nk koangan washak. A tu ku nk be riy rizining sang be ay afa ba.
Amma izen iya ne a rip, a ra nk katsak dim dar agak riy, kamok aner aya a ta be agak riy se kyndi agung ashi ishng kuwun ta kap.
Aner ayong tu di ye wu ta s ikeng ikak nufe Adakunom ba.
A nye aner a ta nye ikeng be riy gak, a be kutrng kuzining natoon koakye wu ta nye ba.
Aroneng aya a ta se ni mees rice, a ra nye riy rikan ni itsik igbang'e wu tin se.
Amma aner aya a ta nye arum, a ra nye riy rikan kayr itsik ihiir'e wu tin se.
Kunom tar ne ku joosh ne ku sak naya koor, ne ato'me kpas ne kusas'e gang. Anong ne arum ta kpa nizen ife a ta tsang a tseng ne a tsr kutser wu.
Aner awng nye aner aya a tana tsesek kayr kubmng, kamok ke a na ka tsesek kayr kubmng'e, a ta se ribong kutser riya Adakunom ta tsang a nisak natoon fe a tu ku shim.
Izen iya ne wan n nubmng, sang tu f ye, “Adakunom sen ni bmng ba,” kamok a bmng Adakunom be imaan'e ba, ka wu bmng akak ba.
Amma koangan ne a n nubmng, ke a ti te riy wu na amaan ikr wu ta shim, ne ikr'me sok riy wu.
T, izen iya ne kushim riy wu nyeseng be agap, a ta yiir nye rinn, ke ri rasak didng, ri ta bn be riku.
Aroneng'i, tu won a ta ka wrk yin ba.
Koakye kuri ritek ne kunk kutek kuya ku ta ne naza se gyr nufe Ada afe a ta be akanang aya a ta be kaben, aya afe sang a ta shishing kyndi nawu ta sesek ba.
Wu ne a di a tin kasa yir a tin tes yir kayr rif katsak, nong yir ta se yir kyndi kutes kufe imsng'e kayr ikr wu ta nye.
Aroneng'i atek, yiring yin iyu; koangan ra se gbashak nufok rif, amma ne se whiwh nif kanu, be kubeseng riy.
Kamok kubeseng riy bn kusor kujel'e Adakunom ta shim ba.
Kamok anong, kam yin be ikr kurisik ne iriri anyas nong ta mees yin rice ta shan yin rif a tan tuus nay yin, riya ri tana ka shesh yin.
Tu foos yin rif'me tsek ne i wk yin rice yin ba, amma ninye yin itomong.
Aner aya ne a foos yin rif'me amma a ti nye itomong ba, a se kyndi aner aya a ta yrk kanyisi wu kayr amadobi.
Nama a ta naka yrk ne a tseng ne a wor a tiburum be kuse kanyisi wu.
Amma aner aya ne a yrk itsi iya i ta se gyr ife i ta bn kusor nk, ne a yiir kunye anong, a tiburum ikeng wu ta fok ba, amma a yiir nye'me, a tu ku te awng natoon ikeng wu ta nye.
Ke akak sok rice wu ye wu ren Adakunom ne a ra kyem a yiir kanu wu ba, a wk rice wu, i nye ye kuren Adakunom wu sor ikeng ikak ba.
Kuren katsak Adakunom kuya Ada yir Adakunom ta sok ye kunye kujel'e nye, ku nisak riy ni nakpiin be akumung kayr risam ba, ne i yiir rice wan fan kazatse ba ka sak ta wondar I se jel.
Aroneng'i kyndi afe kunk katsak na aYeso Kiristi Agwm Agwm yir, afe kuyiik, tu tonong yin kushim rice ba.
Ke nye ye aner akak be nar kanyim yin be nanarang nafe itsm didng ne ares atek, ne aner rizor akak gip be kayr'e be agyr ares wu.
Ke yin ti sak yin riy na aner a ta te ares atek ame, ne f yin be wu ye, “Kar kusonong katek na kamok wan,” amma ne yin f yin be aner rizor ame ye, “Wan nyeseng azong ka sonong kaben nashn'i.”
Iyu tonong ye yin tonong yin kushim rice aa? Yin t yin amok be amaan kut aa?
Aroneng'i aya mi ta shim, wesek yin kuto, i se ye Adakunom kasa fe rizor nashn kazatse na nong a ta te arum kayr kunk katsak ne aya a ta ya kutse rigwm Wu ta nye kanyk'e natoon aya a tu ku shim aa?
Amma yin jsh yin fe rizor. Sang rum ne a ka mr yin ne tsees be yin natu amok aa?
Sang ba ne nye aya a ta beseng riyerek wu riyiik'e, riya a ta ka yis yin mo aa?
Ke yin sak yin agbang itsi iya i ta se kayr Kufumung Adakunom nay ye, “Shim aner agbak wan kyndi rice wan.” I se gyr anong.
Amma ke yin tonong yin kushim rice, i nye ye yin nye yin rinn, ne akak tn yin amok kyndi afe a ta shorop Itsi.
Koangan ne a tin sak riy nitsi, amma a ta won izining kayr'e, a shorop ribir'e cicr.
Kamok wu afe a ta f ye, “Sang tu nye rikuna ba,” wu ne a bun a f ye, “Sang tu fr akak ba.” Ke wan nye rikuna ba, amma wan fr akak k, i sor wan shorop Itsi.
F kanu ne i nye kyndi aya a tana ku t ba amok be Itsi iya i tana bn kusor nk.
Kamok koangan a ta se dar kur riy, Adakunom tu ku t amok dar kur riy. Kur riy be kusas riy natoon amok.
Aroneng, aky se gyr azong ? Ke anerawe nye di wu n nk katsak, a ra nye itomong i ta tonong kunk katsak'e ba ? Kunk katsak'ong tu ku shesh a?
Ke nye ye aronyining ka angasnyining akak se dar ares ne naya kuya.
Ne akak yin f be wu ye, “Tseng, mi ta mok ritek, te ares ta joosh ne iya naya ta wha,” a ra nye ikeng ikak natoon kudaam wu ba, i nye aky itek ne wu nye ?
Anong ne kunk katsak gip ke a ti barang be kunye itomong ba, ne kunk katsak'e sor ikeng ikak ba.
Amma akak ta f ye, “Wan be kunk katsak; mi be kunye itomong.” Ni tonong kunk wan dar kunye itomong, nong mi ta ka tonong kunk katsak'i be itomong'a mi ta nye.
Wan nk katsak ye Adakunom azining ne a kuse a? I se gyr! Amaan nabik gip a ti nk katsak anong ne inyim.
Wan afunam akak, wan shim a ta ka tonong ye kunk katsak dar kunye itomong sor ikeng ikak ba a?
Adakunom sok atukop yir Ibirahim ye a nye ajel'e kamok ikeng iya wu t nye nizen a ta sen nk igon wu Ishaku natoon abagadi aa?
yin di yin kunk katsak wu, be itomong wu, ta tseng mak, ne kunk katsak wu shining be ikeng iya wu ta nye.
Ne rif Kufumung Adakunom shining riya ri ta f ye, “Ibirahim ti nk katsak na Adakunom yong kunk katsak wu sak a tu di jel, ne a ku yis ye aferim Adakunom.”
yin di yin anerawe ye a se gyr kamok ikeng iya wu ta nye, sang I se kamok kunk katsak wu tsek ba.
Anong ne a di aRahap a ta nye inyak agwm gip ye a se gyr kamok ikeng iya wu ta nye nizen a ta nk atom kar kuks ne a ku tun ba niren ikak zr a?
Kamok anong, kyndi kurm ta se dar isong nye kukom, anong ne kunk katsak dar kutonong itomong nye kukom'e.
Aroneng, tu te yin afe kubsp anerawe'me wher ba, kamok yin ren yin ye yir afe i ta bsp nerawe'me, yir ne a tin t yir amok be agap ne nar.
Yir cei i taam yir niren zr zr, ke akak taam nikeng iya wu ta f ba, i nye ye wu se ryong, a ta kyem a nisak riy rice wu cei.
Nizen iya ne yir tin te yir atsm nanu itsaap nong se i tin fok yir kuto. Yir ta kyem nye yir ikeng iya yir ta shim yir be itsaap'e.
ninye yin kumaas be kukpara ashi, ku nye kugbang'e didng gyrtatan, kuwun ku tosom be agap, amma be kaban kutsm kakak aner kutsip'e ti kirik, ne a tseng'e nar wu ta shim.
Anong ne irem se, i nye ihiir'e kayr ikap kurm. Amma i ta kyem i fo rigwm. T, a ta kyem a shosh agbang kuci be kaban kurong.
Irem gip i nye kurong, i nye ritin amaan kunye kayr ikap kurm, i beseng aner, i te kutser anerawe kayr kasa kurong. Wu be rice wu i tana ka te kayr kasa kurong.
Peer iriri ikewum, nanon, ikeng i ta tseng be nafa be ikr kayr ashi te caang, a ma ka sak ba a ta te caang dar inyim anerawe.
Aner akak ta kyem a nees irem wu ba, i nye amaan ikeng dar kurn, i be amaan nadm.
Be irem'e ne yir ti tiyiik yir Adakunom yir, be wu ne yir bun i fiming yir anerawe, aya a ta ma ka nye ba di Adakunom.
Kanu kazining a tin kerek be kanu'me ne a ti fiming. Aroneng'i, i tu se anong ba.
ashi atek ne ashi itk ta kyem a wk nishng izining a?
Aroneng, ritin atafo ta kyem rites ica rifar a? Ka ritin anap ta kyem ri tes agba atafo ? Anong ne itop ashi itk ta kyem turung ashi atek ba.
Angan ne a be kukyem ne a ren ikeng kayr yin ? Won a tu tonong be kuse wu kutek, be kunye kutek ne kumees rice riya ri ta ne kayr kukyem.
Amma ke wan yiir amaan rishishim ne kushim rice kayr riy wan, tin nye kuka natoon'e ka ta ton katsak'e ba.
“Kukyem” kuyu ne naza ba. amma kazatse, kuse jel ba, kunye kufe amaan kabik.
Kamok kar a ta se rishishim be kushim rice, azong ne wan ta se ashangam be amaan kunye.
Amma kukyem ku ta ne naza, nimsng'e cicr se jel ne kushim kutek be kuto akak, ne kumees rice, be kur riy kunye kutek kufe katsak dar kushim rice.
fe a ta b be kusor acaang, aya a ta tuus kayr acaang ne a ta nye ishamang ijel'e.
Aky ne bs be kuren, be riwng nanu kayr yin ? I bs kamok ikr yin ta shim yin iya i ta nye itsm kayr ay yin aa?

yin shim yin ikeng ikak amma i s yin ba, yin fs ne shim yin ikr ikak didng, amma yin ta kyem s yin ikeng iya yin ta shim yin ba. Yin ras yin riwng ne krng yin, yin s yin ba, kamok yin ta rip yin Adakunom ba.
Izen iya yin rip yin i s yin ba, kamok yin rip yin be amaan kutrng nong ta wei yin ikeng iya yin ta s yin nikr rice yin.
yin fe i ta nye yin rikuna, yin ren yin ye rifertseng be kazatse nye rimudn be Adakunom aa? Aner aya ne kasa a ta nye rifertseng be kazatse a te amudn Adakunom.
Ke yin di yin ye Kufumung Adakunom f tsek ye Kabik wu ta sak ka ta sor kayr yir, be rishishim didng a?
Amma a ti barang ku ni nye yir ritek, kamok anong ne rif Adakunom f ye, “Adakunom shim afe kuka ba, amma a nye afe a ta mees rice ba ritek.”
Nk yin Adakunom rice yin, kam yin be Ishetan nong wu ta kam be yin.
B yin bubarak be Adakunom nong wu ta b bubarak be yin, kusu yin ibk yin, yin fe rinn, nye yin ay yin tu te jel, yin fe agak ay.
Nye yin riym ne daam yin, tus yin, shishing rimanang yin ri tu te riym, riy rikan yin tu te riy riwe.
Mees yin rice yin nashn Kunom Wu ta ka tiyiik yin.

roneng, tu f amaan ikeng natoon fudang wan ba, koangan ne a ti f amaan ikeng natoon aronyining wu, ka a tu t amok ayi, i nye a ti f amaan ikeng natoon rif Adakunom ne a ni t amok natoon'e. Ke wan t itsi amok, i nye ye wan kuus itsi'me ba.
Adakunom tsek ne a nye afe kunk itsi be kut amok. Wu ne a kyem a shesh ne a fr. Amma wan nye angan tana t aner agbak wan amok ?
Kyrna wesek yin kuto, yin fe i ta f yin ye, “Katuur ka natson yir ta tseng yir na agbang kuwp kuyu ka kukya nong ta se nye yir riy rizining azong ta ya yir kashn be rijik ne i se yir itsm.”
Sang yin ren yin ikeng i tana nye natson gum ba, kutser yin se an ? Yin se yin kyndi ishikr na ta wuruk nizen cik ni na bun na wei.
Gyr ke yin f yin ye, “Ke Adakunom shim, yir ta sor yir ne i nye yir iyu be ikya.”
Kyndi i ta se, yin nye yin kuka ne i kok yin rice naza, Cicr iriri kuka nye imaan'e.
Koangan afe a ta ren ikeng itek i ta se gyr ke a nye, a ra nye ba, i sor rinn.
Kyrna wesek yin kuto, yin arum, tos ni tang yin ikun kamok amaan risam a tana ka s yin.
Kurum yin nru, ne ajiji n ya ares yin.
Atsm yin a ta yis ye azinariya be azurfa nbeseng. Kubeseng ba ta f rif natoon yin, ne a ya rinam kurm yin kyndi kurong. Yin tusung yin kurum kayr inom igang'e.
Di yin, itsm yin ta gaar kukarang yin fe a ta ka nye yin itomong nak yin ta sen tos natoon yin. Nanak fe itomong ishamang'e n tseng nato Ada Adakunom.
yin n sor yin kayr kusas nazatse ne nye yin ikeng ay yin ta shim. Yin sak yin rice yin i ta ns yin kamok kunom kutsk anerawe.
yin n t yin aner a ta se dar rinn amok, ne ku fr yin aya a ta ka ra yin.
roneng, kamok anong na ka tsesek yin ma nizen kunom tana b. Yin di yin aner ikap ta tor rik ta te naya natek be a ta na ka tsesek kum be iza kushik ma ishamang.
yin gip, na ka tsesek yin ne nyeseng yin be agap, kamok kub Kunom mb bubarak.
roneng, tu f yin iriri rif nace yin ba, ke anong ba, a ta ka t yin amok. Aner ku t amok'e mb bubarak.
roneng, di yin Ku naka tsesek nizen risam, di yin ner kuzarap aya a ta f rif riyerek Kunom.

Kyndi yin ta ren yin, yir sok yir fe a ta na ka tsesek fe awng. Yin n fok yin itak yin itak Ku naka tsesek Ayuba ne di yin ikeng iya Adakunom tu ku nye'me ni gang'e. Ada Adakunom be kur riy ne kuse kutek didng.
Aroneng'i nama anong, tu shu yin ba, be kaza ka kazatse ka be ikeng ikak zr ba, won a “Ei” yin tu sor a “ei,” ne a “Wayo” yin tu sor a “wayo,” ke a ta ka t yin amok
Akak yin se nudaam a? A ra nye aduwa. Riy akak n karp a? Won a tu bom abom ku tiyiik Adakunom.
Akak yin kuse a ta nye atser ba, kayr yin a? A ra yis ashn ikilisiya nong a tu ku nye aduwa ne ni kon name niwu kayr riyerek Agwm gwm yir aYeso.
Aduwa a ta nye kayr kunk katsak sak aner kurk'e ta te atser. Agwm gwm tu ku dorok. Ke a tsang a nye rinn, a tu ku rng'e.
Kamok anong naka taas yin rinn yin, ne i naka nye yin aduwa nong a se ta te yin atser. Aduwa aner ajel'e be agap didng ne nye itomong.
Iliya a nye anerawe kyndi yir ana tsek, a nye aduwa be katsak ye sang iza tu kpa ba, ne iza kpa niben'e ba, ife ay ataar be ribir.
A bun a nye aduwa, ne Adakunom sak iza kpa, ne kaben te naya.
roneng'i, ke akak yin won katsak'e, ne akak yin kubun be wu.
Yiring yin iyu, koangan ne a tu bun be aner rinn na amaan kunye wu, a tu ku shesh riku ne a kis rinn ri ta se gaan.
Mi, aBitrus, amanzo aYeso aKiristi yin ya i ta se yin kyndi tsen kayr kazatse, ya a ta ka kasa yin i ta te yin shaam koakye niben aPontus be aGalati ne aKapadokiya be Asiya ne niben aBitiniya.

Yin ya Adakunom a ta nye Ada ne a t ka kasa yin kayr kanyk wu gbugbang, a bun a t ka sak yin nong yin ta te yin zhl'e kamok kukyem Kabik Kazhl'e. Kunyek wu nye nong i t fok yin aYeso Kiristi kuto ne kumis nask wu. Ritek ne kameneng riy Adakunom se mak be yin didng.
Nakerek nye nafe Adakunom ne a nye Ada Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi, wu ne a r riy yir didng a ta bun a ti dorok yir be riku aYeso Kiristi nurk kute riy kufe katsak kamok kudorok aKiristi nurk.
Be anong ne yir ti te yir riy nong ta ya yir kutse kuya sang ku tana gang ka ku ta beseng ka ku t te rish ba, amma kuya a ta ka sak yin'e kayr kaza.
Yin aya kamok kunk katsak yin, Adakunom kayr agbang kukyem wu ta ka fek yin ma yin s yin kashesh na a tana tun katuk igang'e nong koangan t di.
Kamok anong, nye yin riy rikan didng, katsak yin se yin kayr riy riwe kyrna gyrtatan kamok iriri kubmng kuya ku ta ka ss yin.

Ikr iya i ta ka ss yin'ong se nong a ta ren kuri kunk katsak kuya yin ta be yin. Izinariya gip i tana beseng, a bmng be kurng nong a ta di ka i nye itek . Anong ne a ta bmng kunk katsak yin gip, kuya ku ta nar izinariya yiik. Be anong ne ku t ka bn yin nakerek be kuyiik katuk kaya a tana tonong aYeso Kiristi.
Yin kun ku di yin ba, gyrtatan amma yin tu shim yin. Yin tu yrk yin kyrna ba, gyrtatan amma yin ti nk yin katsak ni wu ne i be yin agbang riy rikan kuri riya sang a tana kyem a f ba.
Kamok yin tana s yin kashesh kutser yin iyong ne i sak yin tin nk yin katsak.
Natoon kashesh'ong ner kuzarap ya a ta ka taas yin natoon ritek riya Adakunom ta f ye a ta ka nk yin, ba ti nye kuyrk didng nong as a ta ren kashesh Adakunom kaya yir tin f yir na.
Ba shim nong ta ren izen'e be kuri iren kashesh'e Kabik aKiristi ka ta se kayr ba tu ku tak ba natoon'e nizen a t f itak natoon risam aKiristi be kuyiik wu tana s nama risam'me.

Adakunom t ku tak ba ye sang ba nye itomong rice ba ba, amma t nye yin'e nizen ba t nye kuzarap'ong cicr. Kyrna ya a t ka taas yin Rif Ritek na, t ka taas yin kyndi Kabik Kazhl'e kaya Adakunom t tom'e kayr kaza ta ka tees ba. maleka gip shim kuren ikr na didng.
Kamok anong, nye yin kanyk kayr ay yin kamok itomong: yiir yin rice yin, ne i ni te yin riy didng natoon ritek riya a tana ka nk yin katuk kaya a tana tonong aYeso Kiristi.
Kyrna yin ta nye yin inoon naya na ta fok kuto, tu won yin ikr iya yin tin be yin ifng gbugbang ta sok ay ba. Nizen iyong yin se yin na awhi.
Amma wu Adakunom afa a t ka yis yin se zhl, yin gip ma sor yin zhl kayr koakye.
Kamok i se ni izibir ye, Sor yin zhl, kamok mi se zhl.

Kum yin ta yis yin Adakunom ye Ada, nizen iya yin ta nye yin aduwa. T, sor yin be ikap kutiim ma katuk kaya yin tana gang yin ritsen yin kayr kazatse na. Kamok wu nye aner ku t amok. Wu tin kasa ba, nizen iya aya a ta sen bsp itomong nerawe wu ba.
Kamok yin ren yin ye a t ka shesh yin kayr akpdng ign iya tukop yin t ka won yin'e. A t ka shesh yin be ikr iya i tana beseng kyndi azurfa be izinariya ba.
Amma a t ka shsh yin be nask aKiristi na ta se yiik, aya ta se kyndi aturuk asidaka, a se zhl dar rinn ka rizik ka inya ayi.
Wu ne Adakunom tsang a ku kasa nizham a ta ra nye kazatse, amma kamok yin ne a tu tonong nizen igang'e na.
Kamok Adakunom t ku dorok nurk a t ku nk kuyiik, iyong sak yir ti nk yir katsak ne i ni te yir riy na Adakunom'me.
Kyrna yin tan sak yin rice yin nong i t te yin zhl kamok yin t kuus yin rif Adakunom, shim yin ronyining yin be riy rizining, naka shim yin anong be katsak.
Kamok a bun a ma ka tes yin sang be ikng iya i tana beseng ba, amma a ta ka tes yin be rif Adakunom, rife kutser rife izen izen.
Kyndi a ta zibir ye, nerawe cicr se kyndi agam ne kusas ba cicr se kyndi afure katse. Agam koor ne afure suruk kaben,
amma rif Agwm gwm t sor ma izen izen.  Rif na ne rinye Rif Ritek riya a t ka nye yin awazi'me.
Kamok anong, kam yin be koakye kuri amaan kuse, be abs ne akardak kuse be rishishim be kpdng rif cei.
Se yin kyndi inoon nazhizhk'e na ta shim kus ribasang. Anong ne yin gip be yin ifeng rif Adakunom, kamok be anong ne yin t rasak yin nong ta s yin kashesh yin.
Kyrna yin tan fok yin ritek Agwm gwm.
B yin nufu, wu aya a ta se kyndi kuta rink kutser. Wu ne a nye kuta kuya nerawe t raba, amma Adakunom t ku kasa ne a ku sok yiik.
Yin gip, ma te yin kyndi kuta rink kutser a tanin nk kasa kuri kafe kabik nong yin ta nye yin itomong ritsi rizhl'e. Yin ta nye yin asidaka kabik azong kuri aya Adakunom ta shim kamok aYeso Kiristi.
Kamok i se ni izibir ye: Di yin mi n kasa ayiik kuta, kuya ku ta nye itsik ritin kasa mi. Mi sak kayr aSihiyona. Koangan afe a tin fereng nuta na, a t ba fok isum ba, ko, cik.
Kyrna yin ya i tin nk yin katsak, kuta na be kuyiik nufe yin. Amma ya a ta gaar ku nink katsak, i t ku sor ba kyndi a t f ye, Kuta kuya fe rink t raba, n te ayiik kuta ribor.

I bun i se ni izibir nar kakak ye, Kuta'me sak nerawe ta tu atak, ku sak nerawe ta kpas!  nerawe'me ti tu atak kamok ba raba kukuus rif Adakunom. Kamok anong ne Adakunom tsang sak afe a t gaar kukuus rif wu'me.

Amma yin, yin nye yin kuri kuya Adakunom t kasa, be rice wu. Yin nye yin atsi Adakunom a ta nye Agwm, yin nye yin nerawe ya a ta nye azhl'e, nerawe ya a ta nye afu. A t ka yis yin kayr awhi nong t n yin kayr akanang afe katsak nong t taas yin ayiik itomong wu ife azhing.
Gbugbang yin tsang i nye yin nerawe Adakunom ba, amma kyrna yin nye yin nerawe Adakunom. Gbugbang yin tsang i s yin kur riy Adakunom ba, amma kyrna yin n s yin.
f yin, ya mi ta shim, mi ta nye yin akusuk, kum yin ta nye yin tsen kayr kazatse na, yin be yin kasa aze ba, ye i ra kam yin be kudi ikng kuri kufe rinerawe. Kuse kuri kuyong kn itsom be kabik yin.
Sor yin kusor kutek kayr ya sang ta nye afikuus ba. Ba yiir kunye kukun yin gyrtatan, amma ke ba di koakye itek yin ta nye yin nerawe'me, ta tiyiik Adakunom katuk a tana b t kazatse amok.
Kuus yin koakye kuri rigwm kayr kazatse na kamok Agwm gwm. Kuus yin rif agbang agwm yin kamok wu ne a ti nye rigwm natoon koangan.
Kuus yin ikng iya gwomna yin ta f be yin kamok akk kashn kaben yin ne tu sak ba nong ta nees aya a ta nye rinn ne a kerek ya a ta nye ikng itek.
Kamok Adakunom shim yin tu nye yin katsak fan aner aya a ta be akpdng kut natoon yin bu se ikng rif.
Sor yin kyndi ner aya a ta se nk, sang tu sok yin kusor nk'e nong tin nye yin amaan kunye ba. Amma sor yin kusor kuya ku tana tonong ye yin nye yin sam Adakunom.
Nk yin koangan kuyiik wu, shim yin fikuus afudang yin, fok yin inyim Adakunom, te yiik yin akk kashn kaben yin.
Yin sam, kuus yin ikng iya tekasa yin ta f be yin ne i ku nk yin ba kuyiik koakye izen. Sang be ya a ta se gyr ne be kuse kutek tsek ba, amma cicr be ya a ta se hash gip.
Kamok ise gyr ke anerawe s risam natoon ikng iya sang i ta nye rinn wu ba, ke a nye anong kamok wu ren ye iyong ne i nye kushim Adakunom, i nye ikng nakere.

Ke ta whereng yin natoon rinn riya yin ta nye yin, ko yin tsesek kayr'e, yin be yin ishorong ikng ikak natoon'e ba. Amma ke yin s yin risam'me kamok kunye kutek, ne i tsesek yin Adakunom t ka te yin ritek.
Kamok kuri risam'ong ne Agwm gwm t yis mo yin. aKiristi gip a s risam kamok yin. Be anong ne a t won mo yin an wu nong t kuus yin.
Wu kun nye rinn ikng ikak ba. A kun fok abs nanu wu ba.
Nizen iya nerawe t ku barak ritok, a t ku karang ba, nizen a t s risam a f ye wu t ku karang ba, a ban a ti te riy na Adakunom aya a tana t amok afe katsak ingya.
A sok rinn yir nurm wu be rice wu, nizen a t ku tigak nukon nong as a tin kam yir be rinn ne i sor yir kusor kuzhl'e. Yin n te yin atser kamok ifor wu.
Kamok yin tsang i se yin kyndi itsamang iya i ta te shaam, amma kyrna yin mu ku bun yin nufe Afek ne Akk Kashn kutser yin.

Yin nyining iwnng, yin gip, kuus yin ikng iya tek yin ta f be yin, nong ke kak ba kuse ya sang t min nk katsak rif Adakunom ba, kashim kuse nyining ba t sak tin nk katsak sang ma akak f ikng ikak be ba ba.
t di kuse zhl yin be kufok ato yin ne shishing.
Izem yin ta nye yin tuse nurm tsek ba, kyndi kunye rice ne ikr a t nye be izinariya ne ares itsm.
Won izem yin tu ne kayr ay yin ingya, izem i tana gang ba kyndi kumees rice ne kuse tatan, iyong ne i nye iyiik'e didng nashn Adakunom.
Kamok nyining ya a t nye zhl'e agbugbang ne ni te riy na Adakunom tsang nye izem ba anong gip. kuus ikng iya tek ba t f be ba.
Kyndi aSaratu, aya a t kuus ikng iya amitek wu Ibrahim, t f be wu ma a t ku yis ye ada wu. Yin nye yin ngas wu ke yin nye yin ikr iya i ta se gyr dar inyim ikng ikak.

Yin tek gip, ren yin kuri kusor kuya yin tana sor yin be nyining yin. Ba be agap kyndi yin ba. Ku tiyiik yin ba kamok yin be ba cicr, yin shan yin ayiik kutser Adakunom nawarak mak. Nye yin anong fan ikng ikak bu tnng aduwa yin.
Ni igang'e, won yin cicr kutrng yin tu se kuzining. Be yin kur riy ne i naka shim yin kyndi aner be aronyining, ne i se yin gyr ne i mees yin rice yin.
Sang tu ku karang yin imaan'e be rimaan'e ba, ka ritok be ritok ba. Amma ku karang yin be ritek kamok anong ne a t ka yis mo yin nong yin t ya yin kutse ritek Adakunom.
Kamok i se ni izibir ye, Aner aya a ta shim a ta fok kusas kusor ne a shim a ta sor didng nazatse na, a ra won nyas be abs.
A ra won kunye anyas nong a ta nye kunye kutek. A rin te isr ni itsr kusor caang be nerawe.
Kamok anyisi Agwm gwm se natoon ner ta se zhl ne a wesek ato na aduwa ba. A rawu ya a ta be anyas.
T, ke yin shim ku nye yin ikng i ta se gyr, ko akak t ka nye yin ikng ikak ba.
Amma ko yin fa s yin risam kamok kunye kutek, yin ta s yin ritek Adakunom. Kamok anong, sang tu fok yin inyim ya a tana ka nk yin risam ba, sang tu te yin febek ba.
Amma won yin aKiristi tu te Agwm gwm kayr ay yin. Koakye izen sor yin be kanyk nong ta kyem i tak yin koangan ikng i ta sak yin tin te yin riy nikuus aKiristi. Amma nye yin kayr awhiwh ne ku yiik,
sang be riy gak ba. Nye yin anong nong as fe a ta f imaan'e natoon yin kamok kuse yin kutek kayr aKiristi ta fok isum rif ba.
I nar, ke Adakunom ne a nye anong ye yin ra s yin risam'me kamok yin ta nye yin ikng iya i ta se gyr, be tana s yin risam kamok kunye yin ta nye kumaan'e.

Kamok aKiristi s risam ma a ku kamok rinn yir cicr kutak kuzining tsek, wu nye azhl'e, amma a ku kamok ya sang ta nye azhl'e ba nong a t tseng be yir nufe Adakunom. A t fr nurm amma Adakunom t sak a dorok kayr kabik be kutser.
Kayr kabik'e ne aKiristi se taas nabik naya na t se nitsm rif Adakunom

Nabik nayong'e nye naya t raba ku kuus rif Adakunom gip be anong gbugbang nizen aNuhu. raba ku kuus ikng iya Adakunom t f. Adakunom tsesek be ba nizen iya aNuhu t nye Kukpara ashi'me. Nizen iyong'e nerawe ikara tsek ne a whr.
Ashi'ong sor kyndi abatisma aya yir ta nye yir, i tin s yir kashesh. Sang nong tin tun yir narik kurm ba, amma kamok yir ta nye yir Adakunom izong be riy rizining ne kamok aYeso Kiristi t dorok nurk.
aKiristi tseng kayr kaza, a se nubk riya Adakunom, maleka cicr ne ribir ya a tin nye rigwm natoon kaza se nubk wu.
Kamok anong, kum aKiristi t s risam nurm, t, yin gip nye yin kanyk kus risam kamok koangan aya ne a s risam nurm tonong ye wu n gang be rinn ba.
Kamok anong, yin ba bun a sor yin kusor kuri kufe kazatse na be kukuus amaan kushim riy yin ba, amma yin nye yin ikng iya Adakunom ta shim.
Gbugbang, yin mak tsang i beseng yin izen didng ninye ikr iya furin t nye, ikr kyndi kunye kpdng be kubi ne kufeng be kugbr ne kunye kyndi gabu ne kukuus ikr itsi.
Ikng'e t nk ba azhing, ba ta di sang yin t ba gung yin rice be ba nong ta nye yin akprdk kunye'ong be ba ba. Iyong ma ka barak yin ritok makong.
Amma ba t taas aner aya a tana t atser be ikom amok ikng iya ba t nye.
Kamok anong ne i sak a t taas ya a t tsang kus Rif Ritek'e gip, nong t ku t ba amok nurm kyndi ribir nerawe, amma sor kusor ba kayr kabik kyndi Adakunom.
Igang kazatse m b bubarak. Kamok anong, sor yin be kanyk ne i yiir yin rice yin gyr nong as ta kyem i nye yin aduwa.
Ikng iya i ta nye igbang'e cicr nye, naka shim yin didng, kamok kushim bn kurng rinn whr.
Sang tu shashang yin tsen be anyinym ba.
Adakunom nk koangan kunang nong a tin nye itomong. Kamok anong koangan ra nye itomong be katsak be kunang kufu nong tin tobok yir kak yir kayr ritek Adakunom.

Ke akak be kunang nye awazi Rif Ritek, t, a ra taas kyndi Adakunom ne a sen taas'e nanu wu. Ke akak be kunang kutobok akak, t, a ra nye be agap Adakunom t ku nk nong as kayr koakye Adakunom ta s nakerek kamok aYeso Kiristi. Kuyiik be kukyem nye kufu ma izen izen. Anong.
roneng ya mi ta shim, sang tu te yin zhing be amaan risam riya yin ta sen s yin'e kyndi ikng ikak ifas ne i sen ka ss yin ba.
Amma ban i nye yin riy rikan, kamok yin ta gung yin rice be aKiristi kayr risam wu. Yin ta nye yin riy rikan didng nizen iya a tana tonong kuyiik aKiristi'me.
Ke a ta ka kas yin ye kamok yin ta nye yin fe aKiristi, sok yin ye i nye ikng itek, kamok kuyiik ne kabik Adakunom se natoon yin.
Amma ke yin ta s yin risam sang ri tu se kamok yin t fs yin kak ka kamok i nye yin itsang ka ikng ikak imaan'e, ka kamok yin tin ns yin nikr nerawe ba.
Ke kak yin ta s risam kamok yin nye yin fikuus, sang tu fok yin isum ba, ban i kerek yin Adakunom ingya kamok ta ka yis yin be riyerek'ong.
Izen n nye a tana san kut nerawe amok, a ta san'e be fikuus Adakunom. T, ke a san'e be yir, i ta se an be ya a ta raba kukuus Rif Ritek Adakunom ?
Kyndi a t zibir ye, Ke i ta r ner ta se gyr nashn Adakunom ta s kashesh, t, i ta se an be fe a ta fok inyim Adakunom ba ne fe rinn ?
Kamok anong, cicr ya a ta s risam kayr kushim Adakunom ra won rice ba nubk Adakunom aya a t ka nye ba. A ra ya kashn be kunye kutek.

Mi akk kashn ikilisiya, mi aya mi t di kuri risam riya aKiristi t s be anyisi mi. Mi aya i tana s ishorong'i nashn kayr kuyiik a tana tonong, mi nye kk kashn ikilisiya fudang'i a ta se kayr yin akusuk ye,

yin rin sak yin riy natoon nerawe Adakunom ya a ta ma ka won yin'e amana'me nubk. Ni sak yin riy niba be riy rizining kyndi Adakunom ta shim sang kayr riy kubeseng ba. Sang tu nye yin itomong kamok itsm tsek ba, amma kamok ifeng yin ta be yin.
Tin nye yin rigwm natoon ba be agap ba, sor yin kusor kuri kuya ba tana kuus an yin.
Nong as izen iya aKiristi aya a ta nye Agbang Afek nerawe tana b, a ta ka nk yin ribong rigwm rif kuyiik riya sang ri tana te rish ba.

Anong ne yin cam gip, kuus yin ikng iya akk kashn ikilisiya yin ta ka tak yin. Cicr yin, mees yin rice nong ta naka nye yin itomong kamok i se ni izibir ye, Adakunom rawu ya a ta kok rice naza, amma a nyesek ya a ta mees rice ritek wu.
Kamok anong, mees yin rice nubk Adakunom ayiik'e nong a ta ka tiyiik yin nizen iya a ta shim.
Ku won yin kudaam yin cicr kamok wu ne a ti sak riy ni yin.
Yiir yin rice yin ne i sak yin riy kamok amudn yin Ishetan tsang a kar kyndi azaki a tsang a muus kamok a tsr aner aya wu tana fr.
Sang tu ku nk yin iren ba. Nyeseng yin be agap kayr kunk katsak yin kamok yin ren yin ye fikuus afudang yin kayr kazatse cei sen s kuri risam riyong gip.

Nama yin s yin risam nizen cik, Adakunom aya a ta be ritek cicr aya a t ka yis yin nong ta s yin kuyiik wu kufe izen izen kayr aKiristi be rice wu t ka sak yin ta se yin gyr ne a ka tsesek yin ne a ka sak yin ta nyeseng yin be agap didng.
Kukyem tu sor kufu ma izen izen. Anong.

aSila aya mi t ku sok kyndi aroneng aya mi ta di a be katsak ne a ti s mo i t ka zibir yin kaban kufumung na nong as ta ka tsesek yin ne i ka tak yin ye iyu na ne i nye ritek Adakunom rif katsak. Nyeseng yin be agap natoon'e.
ronyining yin fikuus ta se na aBabila aya Adakunom t kasa kyndi yin gip ta nye yin ashou, anong ne igon mi aMarkus gip ta nye yin ashou.
Naka nye yin ashou be ku naka kur yin be kushim. Kameneng riy Adakunom se mak be yin cicr, yin ya i ta se yin kayr aKiristi.
Mi aSiman Bitrus, asam aYeso aKiristi ne i bun i nye amanzo wu, yin ya i ta s yin agbang kunk katsak kyndi yir ta ma s yir kamok kuse kutek Adakunom yir aya a ta nye Aner Kashesh yir aYeso Kiristi.
Adakunom ta ka barang mo yin ritek ne kameneng riy wu didng kayr kuren Adakunom ne Agwm gwm yir aYeso.

Adakunom kayr kuyiik wu ti nk yir koakye ikng iya yir ta tsr yir nong ta sor yir kuri kusor kuya wu tana fok kusas'e. Yir s yir ikr na cicr kamok yir ta ren yir Adakunom a tin yis yir kayr kuyiik be kuse kutek wu.

Kamok ikr iyong ne wu ti nk yir gbang ikr i ta be kuyiik didng iya wu t tsang a f ye wu tin nk yir, nong ta gung yir rice be kuri kuse Adakunom nong ta wher yir amaan kuse kazatse na ku ta bs'e kayr ay yir.
Kamok anong, nye yin koakye i tana kyem i nye yin nong tin barang yin ritek natoon kunk katsak yin, ne i ni barang yin kuren natoon ritek yin.
Ni barang yin kuyiir rice natoon kuren ikr Adakunom, ni barang yin ku naka tsesek natoon kuyiir rice yin. Ni barang yin kuse kuri kufe Adakunom natoon ku naka tsesek'e.
Ni barang yin ku naka shim natoon kuse kuri kufe Adakunom, ni barang yin kushim koangan natoon ku naka shim.
Ke yin be yin kuse kutek anong koakye izen, kuren Agwm gwm yin ta ren yin ta ka bn yin ifeng ne itomong nufu.
Kamok koangan aya a ta dun kuse kutek kuri kuyu di kar tsik ba, a nye akpatn'e. A tiburum ye Adakunom mu ku rng rinn wu t tsang a nye.
Kamok anong roneng, nye yin koakye ife yin tana kyem i nye yin nong ta tonong yin ye Adakunom ma ka yis yin ne a ka kasa yin. Ke yin nye yin anong yin ta kpa yin ba, ko cik.
Be anong ne a t ka shan yin ibk ifa kayr rigwm Agwm gwm rif izen izen rif Aner Kashesh yir.
Kamok anong mi ta yiir kuka yiring yin ikr na, mi ren yin tsang i ren yin gyrtatan, yin nyeseng yin be agap natoon katsak yin ta be yin.
Mi di ye i se gyr ta yiir kuka yiring yin ikr na kum mi ta rusek nazatse na be kutser,
kamok mi ren mi m b barak ta won kazatse na, kyndi Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi tin tonong kanang.
Mi ta nye koakye mi tana kyem i nye nong as ta di yin yiir kuyiring yin be ikr na nizen iya mi ta se kayr kazatse na ba.
Nizen iya yir t ka taas yin itak kukyem ne kub Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi, sang yir t taas yin atin afe kashn kak t f ba. Wayo, yir di yir agbang kuyiik wu be anyisi yir.
Kamok wu s kuyiik be nakerek nufe Adakunom a ta nye Ada nizen iya yir ta fok agbang ayiik kut Ada Adakunom ye, Ayu na ne a nye Igon'i, kafe mi ta shim, mi ta fok kusas wu makiyi.
Yir be rice yir, yir fok yir kut'ong ku ta ne naza nizen iya yir ta se yir mak be wu natoon kawhanang Kazhl'e.

Kamok anong yir ti te yir riy yir nikr ner kuzarap t f didng. I ta se gyr ke yin ti sak yin riy rif'me kyndi akanang kurng ta ya kanang nawhi, ma aYeso bun a b kyndi kadiding ta karak ne akanang wuruk kayr ay yin.
Agbang ikng mi ta shim yin tu ren yin nye ye kuzarap kukak kuse a t zibir kuya ner kuzarap akak t zibir be kutrng ba tsek ba.
Kamok kuzarap nye ikng iya i ta ne kayr riy anerawe tsek ba, amma Kabik Adakunom kaya ka t nk kayr ay ba ne ka sak nerawe t f ikr iya ba t shan nufe Adakunom.

Kyndi ner kuzarap fe abs t ku se kayr nerawe Adakunom'me gbugbang, anong ne ner kubsp fe abs kak t wuruk kayr yin. ta bs be kubsp kukak kyn, ta bsp nerawe abs ma t ku beseng ba ma nerawe t gaar Agwm gwm aya a t ka shesh ba. Ku nye anong ta sak ba be rice ba ta kpa zizirik.
nerawe whr t kuus akpdng kuse ba. Kamok kunye ba, nerawe'me kak t te be iren katsak'e fr.
Kamok kuyrk ba, t ka wrk yin nong ta ka mr yin be rif rm rm. Amma kum gbugbang Adakunom ma ka tn ba amok riku. Amok ba ku se a sen ka tor ba.
Ko maleka agbugbang, nizen t nye rinn, Adakunom t won ba kyn ba, a t ku barak ba kayr ribong kurng. A t rosom ba kayr ibong i t se tsik ne i se whi. ta tor kunom amok.

Nizen agbugbang, ner aya a t nye anyas gip, Adakunom t ku won ba ba. Adakunom tu ku fs ba be amaan ashi nizen aNuhu. Amma a shesh aNuhu, aner a nye awazi katsak be ribir nerawe kanataar ne a gaar tsek.
Adakunom shosh agbang iwp aSodom be aGomora ma i te itong. Iyong tonong kuri ikng i tana s ya a ta nye anyas.
Wu ne a shesh aLot, aner aya a t nye azhl'e, aya a t daam natoon amaan kunye ner aSodom t gaar kukuus Itsi Adakunom.
aLot nye aner katsak gyrtatan, amma a sor natite amaan nerawe, ne a yrk kuri amaan kunye ba koakye kunom ne a foos amaan rif ba, ma a yiir nye riy riwe kayr riy wu kamok ba t gaar ku kuus Itsi.

Kamok anong, ikr kuri iyuna ne i sak yir ta ren yir ye Adakunom ta kyem a shesh ner aya ta se kayr iriri kubmng ner aya a ta se gyr nashn wu ne a won ya a ta be amaan kunye nong ta ya kashn be risam ma katuk a tana t kazatse amok.
Amok na ta nar natoon ner aya a t shim ikr kuri ife rinerawe ne zhsh rigwm. ner kubsp fe abs na, a be isum, ko cik ba. kok rice naza didng. fok inyim akak ba, ma a kas fe a ta se nashn Adakunom.
maleka'me be rice ba ta be agap be kukyem ne nar ner kubsp fe abs'e sang f ikng ikak imaan'e natoon fe a ta se nashn Adakunom ba.

Amma ner na f rimaan'e natoon ikng iya sang ba ta s rikpa'me ba. se kyndi amaan ikewum iya i ta kuus ikng iya riy ba tu ku nk ba tsek. A t tes ba kyndi amaan ikewum nong a ta yising ne a fs tsk, t kus kyndi ikewum'e.

A t ka karang ba be risam kamok ba nk kak risam. Ba fok kusas'e kunye ikr isum kyndi agabu natite kunom. Kusor ba be yin nye ikng isum ne ku nye amaan ikng, yas mak be yin gyrtatan nama anong ne nye ikr isum'ong.
shim ku tssk nyining didng, ma rn be kunye rinn ba. tsang wrk ner aya sang tan nyeseng be agap ba. mak be kuyrk didng. Iri ba ne Adakunom ma ka fiming ba.
won iren itek nong ta ban kuus akpdng iren aBalam igon aBeyo, afe a t shim a ta s ishorong natoon amaan kunye wu.
Amma a t ku tigba kamok amaan kunye wu. Azhaki akak a t kun f kanu ba, a f kanu be kut anerawe nong a t tigba aner kuzarap'ong kamok kuririm wu.
ner kubsp afe abs na se kyndi ribong riya sang ri ta be ashi ba, ne a se kyndi ann kuwun ta fsm. Adakunom n nye kar ka ta be amaan awhi kamok ba.
A ya aduk kuka be rinn ne wrk ya a ta ra won kunye rinn'ong tsek be ikr iya kurm ta shim.
f be nerawe ye ba ta s kusor nk, amma ba be rice ba nye sam kusor kpdng. Kamok anerawe nye asam nufe koakye ikng i tin nye rigwm ni wu.

Ke ner kubsp abs'ong wher nubk amaan ikr kazatse kamok ba t ren Agwm gwm yir Aner Kashesh, aYeso Kiristi, amma ke ra bun won amaan ikr kazatse'me t ku karam ba ma i nar agap ba, tu ku bun ta te amaan'e ne nar izen iya ba t tsang ren aYeso ba.
I nar ke ba fa tsang ren iren katsak'e ba ingya, be tana ren ne ra bun a won Itsi Adakunom izhl'e a t tsang a ka nk ba.
Ikr ba t nye'ong se kyndi karr rif a ta f ye, Agabu kos ne a bun a rs rikos wu. Karr rif'me kakak bun ka f ye, A so lade ne a bun a kubun a ta se biring kayr amrsh.
roneng, kufumung'i kufe afa na'me. Mi zibir afumung afa'me cicr nong ta ka yiring yin'e nong tin nye yin kutrng gyr.
Mi shim yin tu yiring yin be ikng ner kuzarap azhl'e t f gbugbang ne ikng iya Agwm gwm Aner Kashesh yir t f be agbang kut ni nanu manzo yin.
Agbang ikng mi ta shim yin tu ren yin ye kayr inom igang'e, ner kak tana nye fe zhsh kar t wuruk ne nye maan ikr ay ba ta shim. t ka mas yin,
t f ye, aYeso f ye wu t b n ? T, ayong a se ak ? Kum ne tukop yir ru nye atser, iyu koakye rusek kyndi i ta se kum nizen a t nye kazatse.
ner ta f anong f anyas tsek, ba tiburum'e ye be rif Adakunom ne Adakunom sak kaza be kaben ti wuruk kayr.
Adakunom kis kazatse be ashi nizen iyong, nizen iya ashi ta whn kazatse.
Be rif Adakunom'me ne a tin shosh kaza be kaben kaya yir ta yrk yir na. Be rif Adakunom ne Adakunom won kaza be kaben ma katuk a tana t ya sang ta fok inyim Adakunom'me ba amok ne a ka shosh ba.
roneng ikng ikak kuse izining mi ta shim yin t tiburum yin'e ba ye, kunom kuzining se kyndi ay izungu izining nufe Agwm gwm ne ay izungu izining se kyndi kunom kuzining.
kak di kyndi Adakunom mak a sok izen nizham a t ra nye ikng iya wu t tsang a f ye wu t nye. I se anong ba. A be kutsesek ne kamok yin, a shim akak tu wei ba amma koangan ra shishing kuse wu.
Katuk kub Agwm gwm bu se kyndi kub akpatang. Katuk kayong a t fok riwng be agap ne kaza wei, cicr ikr a tin nye kaza be kaben a t shosh. Koakye i ta se nunrng kayr'e a ta tun kanang nashn Adakunom.
Kum a tana beseng koakye ikng anong, t, aky kuri kusor ne yin sor yin ? I se gyr ke yin sor yin zhl ne i kuus yin Adakunom.
Tor yin Kunom Kub Adakunom be ifeng, ni barang yin kanyk didng nong ta di yin ye a b zizirik. Katuk kayong a ta shosh kaza be kurng. Ikr tin nye kaza be kaben cei ta te wuyong.
Amma be kunk kut Adakunom t tsang a nk, yir sen tor yir kaza kafas be kaben kafas, kar kaya katsak tana kuse koakye izen.
Kamok anong, roneng fe riy mi, kum yin ta sen tor yin Kunom'ong, t nye yin koakye ikng iya yin tana kyem i nye yin nong ta sor yin nashn Adakunom dar rizik ka rinn ayi. Sor yin nashn wu caang.
Ren yin ye kutsesek Adakunom se nong nerawe ta s kashesh, kyndi aronyining yir aBulus aya yir ta shim yir, t ka zibir yin'e gip be kukyem kuya Adakunom t ku nk.

Ikr iya wu tin f natoon'e na ni izibir afumung wu t zibir cei. Ikr ikak kuse kayr afumung'e i ta r kuren, iya ner ta se nawhi ne be agap kayr kunk katsak ba ba, ta kirik rif'me kyndi ba ta nye be izibir rif Adakunom ikak ne bn rice kawei.

Amma yin roneng fe riy mi, kum yin t ren yin ikr na, t, sak yin riy be kuri ner ta gaar kukuus Adakunom, fan kubsp ba kufe abs ba ka krk yin nong ta won yin iren yin itek iya yin ta min nyeseng yin be agap.
Amma ban i ni barang yin kuya kashn kayr ritek ne kuren Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi, Aner Kashesh ingya. Kuyiik ra sor kufu kyrna ma izen izen. Anong!

Yir sen ka zibir yin rif na natoon aYeso Kiristi aya a ta nye Rif Kutser. A tuse kum nizen iya a t nye kazatse. Yir fok yir rif wu ne yir ku di yir, yir t ku yrk yir be anyisi yir ne yir ku ras yir be ibk yir.

Wu ne a nye aya a ta nyesek kutser, a b nufe nerawe, yir t ku di yir. Kamok anong yir sen ka taas yin rif na natoon wu aya a ta nyesek kutser kufe izen izen. A se mak be Adakunom a ta nye Ada'me, amma Adakunom sak yir t ku di yir.
Yir sen ka taas yin rif natoon aya yir t di yir ne yir ku fok yir, nong as yir t te yir kyndi aner azining ne kusor yir se kuzining be Adakunom a ta nye Ada'me ne Igon wu aYeso Kiristi.
Yir t zibir yin kufumung na nong as riy rikan yir t shining mumak didng.
Rif yir t fok yir nufu ne yir sen ka taas yin ye; Adakunom nye akanang, awhi kuse kayr wu, ko cik ba.
Kamok anong, ke yir f yir ye yir n gung yir rice be wu amma ne yir ra bun i sor yir kyndi fe awhi, i nye ye yir be yir abs, i be yir katsak ba.
Amma ke yir tseng yir na akanang kyndi Adakunom ta nye akanang, ne i gung yir rice be koangan afikuus, ne nask Igon wu aYeso ni kusu yir rinn yir nong t te yir zhl.
Ke yir f yir ye yir be yir rinn ba, i nye ye yir wk yir rice yir, katsak kuse kayr yir ba.
Amma ke yir taas yir Adakunom rinn yir, a tin rng yir'e kamok wu be katsak ne a be kuse kutek, ne a ni kusu yir kayr koakye ikng imaan'e.
Ke yir f yir ye yir n nye yir rinn ba, i nye ye yir sok yir ye Adakunom be abs ne rif wu kuse kayr ay yir ba.

Inoon'i, yin aya mi ta shim, mi t zibir yin ikr na fan yin bu nye yin rinn. Amma ke akak yin bun a nye rinn, Adakunom tu ku rng'e kamok yir be yir akak a tana nyeseng rice yir nashn Adakunom a ta nye Ada'me. Wu ne a nye aYeso Kiristi aya a ta se zhl nashn Adakunom.
Wu ne a nye asidaka kurng rinn yir. Kamok yir tsek ba, amma nerawe kazatse cei.
Ke yir nye yir ikr Adakunom t f ye i ra nye yir, iyong ne i ta tonong ye koangan yir ren Adakunom.
Ke akak f ye wu ren Adakunom a ra nye ikr iya Adakunom'me t f ye a ra nye ba, i nye ye a be abs, katsak kuse riy wu ba.
Amma koangan ne a nye ikr iya Adakunom'me t f, i nye ye a shim Adakunom be katsak riy wu. Be anong ne yir ta ren yir ye yir sor yir kayr Adakunom.
Aner aya a ta f ye wu sor kayr Adakunom ta sor kyndi aYeso t sor dim.
Ar, ikng mi ta sen ka zibir yin'e na nye itsi ifas ba i nye iya Adakunom t tsang a f be yin, iya yin t fok yin kum ni imsng'e. Itsi na nye rif Adakunom riya yin t kun fok yin.
Gip be anong i bun i te ifas. A ta kyem a di katsak itsi na nuse aYeso ne a di nuse yin. Kamok awhi'me nye ne a wei, ne akanang'e afe katsak n san kuya gip.
Koangan ne a f ye wu se kayr akanang'e, amma ne a rawu aronyining wu afikuus, i nye ye a rusek na awhi.
Aner aya ne a shim aronyining wu afikuus, i nye ye aner'e se na akanang. Ikng ikak kuse i tana ku sak nong a tana won iren'e ba.
Amma aner aya a ta rawu aronyining wu afikuus a se na awhi, a tseng na awhi. Kamok anong a ren kar wu tu ku be ba, kamok awhi'me tu ku whn anyisi.
Mi ta zibir yin'e, aya i ta ru nye yin inoon nabik kamok a ma ka rng yin rinn yin, kayr riyerek aYeso.

Mi ta zibir yin'e, aya i tan kyem yin nerawe nabik kamok yin n ren yin aKiristi'me. A se kum ni imsng'e. Mi ta zibir yin'e aya i ta ru nye yin acam nabik, kamok yin n canang yin Ishetan a ta nye Amaan Aner. Mi ta zibir yin'e, aya i ta ru nye yin inoon nabik kamok yin ren yin Adakunom aya a ta nye Ada yir.

Mi ta zibir yin'e, aya i tan kyem yin nerawe nabik kamok yin ren yin aKiristi'me aya a t se kum ni imsng'e. Mi ta zibir yin'e, aya i ta ru nye yin acam nabik kamok yin be yin agap nikuus Adakunom ne rif Adakunom'me kuse nay yin. Yin n canang yin Ishetan a ta nye Amaan Aner.
Sang tu shim yin kazatse ka ikr kazatse'me ba. Koangan afe a ta shim kazatse, t, kushim Ada'me kuse kayr riy wu ba.

Kamok koakye ikng iya i ta se kayr kazatse na, kyndi; kushim ikr kurm, be iya anyisi ta wk aner be kuni tsor kafok be ikr iya yir ta be yir—, ikr kuri iyong nes nufe Ada ba, amma kayr kazatse ne iwuruk.
Kazatse na, be amaan kushim ikr i ta se kayr kazatse'me ta gang, amma aner aya a ta nye ikr Adakunom ta shim a t sor ma izen izen.
Inoon'i, yin aya mi ta shim, won ta ka tak yin, inom na nye izen gang'e. Kyndi yin t fok yin ye mudn aYeso Kiristi t b, kyrna gip mudn'e m b whr. Kamok anong yir ren yir ye inom igang'e m b bubarak.
mudn'e se kayr yir nizham a t ra wuruk, ba kun se mak be yir nigaan'e ba. Ke a fa nye ye ba nye afikuus be yir katsak'e, ke a sor mak be yir. Kukam ba be yir tonong ye ba nye afe yir ba.
Amma yin, yin s yin Kabik Kazhl'e kamok Adakunom t ka kasa yin. Kamok anong cicr yin, yin ren yin ikr i ta nye katsak.
Sang mi ta zibir yin'e ye kamok yin ta dun yin katsak'e ba, hiir, amma kamok yin ta ren yin katsak'e ne i bun i ren yin ye a gung abs be katsak ba.
Angan ne a b agbang abs ? Aner aya a ta ton'e ye sang aYeso nye aKiristi. Aner kuri ayong ne a nye amudn aYeso, a rawu Ada'me be Igon'e.
Akak kuse a tana rawu Igon Adakunom ne a te azining be Ada'me ba. Aner aya a ta shan Igon'e, a shan Adakunom a ta nye Ada'me gip.
Kamok anong, mi f be yin ye i ra yiir yin rif yin t fok yin kum ni imsng'e. Ke yin nye yin anong, yin ta te yin azining be Igon Adakunom'me ne Adakunom a ta nye Ada'me.
Ke yin nye yin anong, yin t s yin kutser kufe izen izen kuya aYeso t tsang a nk kut ye wu tin nk yir.
Mi ta zibir yin ikr na natoon ner ta shim ta ka wrk yin nong ta won yin ikuus.

Amma yin, yin n s yin Kabik Kazhl'e nufe aYeso kaya ka ta sor be yin koakye izen. Kamok anong yin ba tsr yin aner akak a tana ka bsp yin'e ba. Kabik wu t ka bsp yin ikr'me ife katsak cei. Kukasa wu tin kasa yir nye katsak, ku nye kufe abs ba. Kyndi a t ka bsp yin'e ye i ra sor yin kayr aYeso.
Kyrna inoon'i, yin aya mi ta shim, sor yin kayr aYeso nong as izen iya a tana bun a b, yir ta fok yir inyim ka isum nashn wu ba.
Ke yin ren yin aYeso nye azhl'e. T, yin ta ren yin ye koangan a ta nye ikr i ta se gyr nashn Adakunom gip a t sor igon Adakunom nabik.
Yrk yin ta di yin kuri kushim Adakunom tin shim yir ma a ti yis yir ye inoon wu. Ikng yir ta nye yir'ong! Kazatse ti ren yir ba, kamok ba tu ren ba.
Ar, kyrna yir nye yir inoon Adakunom. Yir ren yir ikng yir tana te yir nashn ba. Amma yir ren yir ye izen iya aYeso tana bun a b, yir t te yir kyndi wu ne i di yir kuse wu.
Kamok anong, koangan a tin te riy wu ye wu ta se kyndi aYeso ne a won kunye rinn nong a ta sor zhl kyndi aYeso'me.
Koangan afe a ta yiir nye rinn tonong ye a rawu itsi Adakunom. Kunye rinn nye kuwon dar kukuus itsi Adakunom.
Amma yin ren yin ye ikng i t sak aYeso t b nye, nong a ta sok rinn yir. A nye rinn ba.
Aner akak kuse a ta se kayr aYeso ne a bun a yiir inye rinn ba. Aner akak kuse a ta yiir nye rinn, ne a f ye wu ren aYeso ka wu kun ku di aYeso ba.
Inoon'i, yin aya mi ta shim, sang tu won yin akak ta ka wrk yin ba. Aner a ta nye ikr i ta se gyr ne a se gyr nashn Adakunom kyndi aYeso ta se.
Amma aya a ta yiir nye rinn nye afe Ishetan kamok Ishetan n m ne a nye rinn kum ni imsng'e. Iyu ne i sak Igon Adakunom'me t b nong a t yirik ikr Ishetan'e t nye cei.
Akak kuse a ta nye igon Adakunom ne a bun a yiir nye rinn ba, kamok kuse Adakunom kuse kayr wu. A ta bun a ya kashn be rinn ba, kamok a nye igon Adakunom.
Ana ne yir t ren yir ya a ta nye inoon Adakunom be inoon Ishetan. Koangan afe a ta nye ikng i ta se gyr ba, ka aya a ta shim aronyining wu afikuus ba, a nye igon Adakunom ba.
Rif yir t fok yir kum ni imsng'e se ye i ra naka shim yir.
I tuse yir kyndi aKayinu ba. A t nye afe Ishetan ma a fr aronyining wu. Aky sak a t fr aronyining ? Kamok kunye wu nye kumaan'e ne kufe aronyining se gyr nashn Adakunom.
roneng, tu te yin zhing ba ke kazatse ta rayin.
Yin ren yin, yir tsang i nye yir ikom'e cicr nabik, amma kyrna yir be yir kutser kamok yir shim yir ronyining yir. Aner aya afe a ta shim aronyining wu ba, a nye kukom'e nabik.
Koangan a ta rawu aronyining wu se kyndi aner a ta fs nerawe. Yin ren yin ye akak kuse a ta fs nerawe a ta be kutser kufe izen izen ba.
Yir ren yir ye kushim kufe katsak se ana, aYeso Kiristi nk kutser wu kamok yir. Yir gip, yir t nk yir kutser yir kamok fikuus fudang yir.
Ke akak kuse a ta be ikng ne a di aronyining wu fikuus a be ikng ikak ba, a se nudaam, amma a r riy wu nong a tu ku nye ikng ikak ba. An ne wu ta tonong ye kushim Adakunom kuse riy wu ?
Inoon'i, yin aya mi ta shim, kushim yir tuse ni nanu tsek ba, amma i nye yir ikng iya i tana tonong ye yir naka shim yir be katsak.
Kunye yir anong ta tonong ye yir nye yir fe katsak. Yir t s yir kameneng riy nashn Adakunom gip, nizen iya ay yir
tin t yir amok. Kamok Adakunom ren ay yir ne a ni nar yir ne a ren koakye.
Ar, yin aya mi ta shim, ke ay yir ti tonong yir ye yir n nye yir imaan'e ba, t, i tu fok yir inyim nashn Adakunom ba.
Adakunom tin nk yir koakye yir tu ku rip yir, kamok yir kuus yir rif wu ne i nye yir ikr wu ta shim.
Ikng Adakunom t f ye i ra nye yir'e nye ye, i rin nk yir katsak ni Igon wu aYeso Kiristi ne i naka shim yir kyndi aYeso t f be yir.
Koangan afe a ta kuus ikng iya itsi Adakunom t f a se kayr Adakunom'me ne Adakunom se kayr wu. Yir ren yir ye Adakunom se mak be yir be Kabik Kazhl'e a tin nk yir.
Ar, yin aya mi ta shim, tin nk yin katsak natoon koakye kuri kabik ba, bmng yin kuri nabik'e nizham nong ta di yin ka na ne nufe Adakunom'me. Kamok ner kuzarap fe abs kuse whr nazatse kyrna.
Iren yin tana ren yin ye Kabik'e nye kafe Adakunom nye, ke aner'e f ye aYeso b kayr kurm i nye ye Kabik'e nye kafe Adakunom.

Ke aner'e f ye sang aYeso b kayr kurm ba, i nye ye kabik'e nye kafe Adakunom ba. Aner kuri ayong be kabik kaya ka ta nye amudn aYeso Kiristi kaya yin t fok yin ye ka saase, kyrna gip ka se kayr kazatse.
Amma yin inoon'i, yin aya mi ta shim, yin nye yin fe Adakunom. Yin n canang yin aner kuri ayong, kamok Kabik kaya ka ta se kayr yin nar kaya ka ta se kayr kazatse'me.
Ba nye fe kazatse, kamok anong ba f rif kuri rif kazatse, ne nerawe'me ku fok ba.
Amma yir, yir nye yir fe Adakunom, koangan afe a ta nye afe Adakunom ti fok yir. Aya a ta nye afe Adakunom ba, ti fok yir ba. Anong ne yir kyem i ren yir Kabik kafe ka ta be katsak ne kafe abs.
Ar, yin aya mi ta shim, won i tu naka shim yir, kamok kushim ne nufe Adakunom. Koangan afe a ta shim nerawe nye igon Adakunom ne a ren Adakunom.
Koangan afe a ta shim nerawe ba, a ren Adakunom ba kamok Adakunom nye kushim.
Ana ne Adakunom tonong kushim wu kayr yir. A ta tom asuzr Igon wu kayr kazatse na nong as yir t s yir kutser kamok wu.
Iyu ne i nye kushim'e. Sang yir ne i shim yir Adakunom ba, wu ne a ti shim yir, ne a tom Igon wu nong ka t b ku kyndi asidaka kurng rinn yir.
Ar, yin aya mi ta shim, kum Adakunom tin tonong yir kushim wu didng ana, i t ma se gyr ke yir ma naka shim yir gip.
Akak kun di Adakunom be anyisi ba amma ke i naka shim yir, i nye ye Adakunom se kayr ay yir ne kushim wu shining kayr ay yir makiyi.
Yir ren yir ye yir se yir kayr wu ne wu se kayr ay yir gip, kamok Adakunom ti nk yir Kabik wu Kazhl'e.
Yir n di yir be anyisi yir ne i bun i taas yir nerawe katsak'e ye Adakunom n tom Igon wu nong ka t sor aner a tana shesh kazatse na.
