T, mi t ku sak a t nye amaan kurk, ne i sak ya a t mereng be wu t s risam didng sang ke shishing kuse ba ba.
Mi t fs inoon wu cei nong as fikuus cicr t ren ye, mi ne i nye afe kuyrk ay nerawe be kutrng ba cei. Mi t ku karang koangan yin titr be itomong wu.
Amma yin ribir'e, i ta se yin na aTiyatira, i ta kuus yin kubsp wu ba, yin bsp yin ikr iya ta yis ye, Ikr Ishetan i ta se tsik, ba. Mi shim t ka tak yin ye, mi ta ka nk yin acer akak ba.
Yin yiir yin kunk katsak yin tsek ma mi bun i b.

Aner aya a ta canang kazatse ne a nye ikng iya mi ta shim ma nigang'e, mi t ku nk kukyem a t nye rigwm natoon kazatse cei kyndi mi ta shan kukyem'i nufe Ada mi. Kyndi a ta f ye, A tin nye rigwm natoon ba be ishn kutsm, a t ka fo ba kyndi a ta fo kadonong iben. Mi tu ku nk adar kusetson.
Aner aya a ta be ato kufok a ra fok ikng iya Kabik ta f be ikilisiya.
Zibir amaleka ikilisiya aSardis'e ye: Rif na ne nufe aner aya a ta be nabik Adakunom kanataar ne a yiir dar kanataar nubk wu. Mi ren kunye wan. nerawe ta di kyndi wan nye atser aser wan nye kukom'e.
Dorok, ni barang agap nikng i ta rusek i tan b barak i ta ku, kamok mi di kunye wan shining nashn Adakunom ba.
Kamok anong, yiring be ikng iya wan ta fok i ta shan. Kuus nong ta shishing kuse wan. Amma ke wan dorok ba, mi t b kyndi akpatang, wan t ren izen iya mi tana b ba.
Amma gip be anong, yin be yin nerawe cik kayr yin na aSardis ya a tan riir ares ba be rinn ba. ta te ares akan nong ta tseng mak be mi kamok ba kyem ta tseng mak be mi.
Aner aya a ta canang kazatse, a t ku te ares akan kyndi ba. Mi t birik riyerek wu a ta zibir kayr Kufumung Kutser ba. Nizen iya mi tana nyeseng nashn Ada mi ne maleka wu, mi t f ye aner na nye anaan.
Aner aya a ta be ato kufok a ra fok ikng iya Kabik ta f be ikilisiya.

Zibir amaleka ikilisiya aFiladefiya'me ye: Rif na ne nufe aner aya a ta se zhl ne a be katsak, wu ne a be agbang akarak aDauda. Ikng iya wu ta karak akak ta kyem a whn ba, ikng iya wu ta whn akak ta kyem a karak ba.
Mi ren kunye wan. Di, mi ma ka won kanukutu kuy kaya sang akak tana kyem a whn ba. Mi ren wan mak i be agap ba, gip be anong wan kuus rif mi sang wan min ton ba.
Mi t sak ner Ishetan, ya a t f ye ba nye ner aYahuda, amma sang ra nye ba, be abs, mi t ka sak ba ta b kpas natak wan ne ren ye mi ta shim.
Kum wan ta kuus rif mi natoon kutsesek, mi t ka fek nizen kubmng kuya ku tana b natoon kazatse cicr, nizen iya a tana bmng nerawe kazatse.
Mi saase kyrna. Kamok anong yiir kunk katsak wan kpa fan akak bin shan ribong ishorong wan.

Aner aya ne a canang kazatse mi t ku sak a ta sor itsik agbang kutu kuya Adakunom mi iben. A ta won kar'ong ba, ko cik. Mi t zibir riyerek Adakunom mi natoon wu be riyerek agbang kuwp Adakunom'i a ta yis ye aUshalima afas, a tana wuruk naza nufe Adakunom mi. Mi ta bun i zibir riyerek'i rifas natoon wu gip.
Aner aya a ta be ato kufok a ra fok ikng iya Kabik ta f be fikuus.
Zibir amaleka ikilisiya aLaudikiya'me ye: Rif na nye rif aner a ta yis ye, Anong. Wu ne a tonong katsak Adakunom kayr katsak, be wu ne Adakunom nye koakye ikng.
Mi ren kunye wan, wan shirim ba, wan zhoosh ba. Wan fa shirim ka i zhoosh ayi ke i nar.
T, kamok wan ta se mumk, wan shirim ba wan zhoosh ba, mi m b barak ta ka titu.
Wan f ye, Mi nye arum mi be kurum didng, mi ba tsr ikng ikak ba. Wan ra ren ba, wan n te riy riy, wan be rizor, wan n te ikng kur riy, wan nye akpatn'e ne i se ica'me gip.
Mi t ka nk ibrng, shan izinariya aya a tan shirik be kurng nunaan nong ta te rum kayr kabik, be ares akan nong tin kis kurm wan fan i bu fok isum. Shan rikan anyisi nong t di kar gyr.
ner aya mi ta shim ne mi tu zhr ba ne i ku te nunyi. Kamok anong, dorok be katsak, shishing kuse wan.
Di, mi na nunyeseng ne i ca kanukutu. Aner aya a fok kut mi, a ti karak'e ne mi n ta ya mak be wu ne wu ya be mi gip.
Aner aya a t canang kazatse, mi t ku sak a ta sonong mak be mi natoon itsik rigwm mi kyndi mi t canang kazatse ne i sonong mak be Ada mi natoon itsik wu.
Aner aya a ta be ato kufok a ra fok ikng iya Kabik ta f be ikilisiya.
Nama anong, nashn mi, mi bun i di kanukutu kakak nukarak kayr kaza. Ne mi bun i fok kut kuya mi ta tsang i fok ni imsng'e kyndi rigba ame ye, Ngarak aze, mi t ka tonong ikr a tana nye dim nama iyu.
Nizen izining, Kabik ti tiik natoon mi ne mi di itsik rigwm nashn mi be aner akak a ta min sonong natoon'e.
Aner'e gysm kyndi iwrng ikak a ta yis ye aZhaspa ne aKaneliya. Itsereng i ta gorok kar kusonong'e gysm kyndi kuta kukak a ta yis ye aEmeral.
tsik rigwm kak isk ifa be anaas gorok itsik rigwm'e, be kk kashn isk ifa be anaas tan sosok natoon tsik rigwm'e. kk kashn'e n tes ares akan be abong izinariya.
Itsik rigwm i ta se natite'me yiir berep kyndi akanang iza t tarang kar be kutasak. Irng apitila kanataar tuse azong i ta gysm nashn itsik rigwm'e, Irng iyong nye nabik Adakunom kanataar.
Nashn itsik rigwm'e ikng ikak tuse kyndi agbang kudung a t nye be agilas, i ta gysm kyndi amadobi. Ikr ikak inaas i ta be kutser tuse i ta gorok itsik rigwm'e. Ikr'me be anyisi whr nashn be kama.
Ikng ife imsng'e tas azaki, ife afa se kyndi amung, ife ataar be kanyisi kyndi anerawe, ife anaas'e tas akim.

Ikr inaas'ong cicr be atsn igataar be anyisi nurm koak ba ma na afabak ba gip. Katuk be kunom a yiir bom abom ye, Azhl'e, Azhl'e, Azhl'e nye Agwm gwm yir Adakunom a ta be kukyem, a t se gbugbang, a kuse se kyrna, a ta bun a b.
Ikr inaas itser'ong bom abom riy rikan, be nakerek ne a kuyiik, aner aya a ta sonong natoon itsik rigwm'e, wu aya a tana sor ma izen izen'e.Koakye izen iya ba nye anong,
ne kk kashn isk ifa be anaas ame kpas kaben nashn wu aya a t sonong ni itsik rigwm ame, ne ku ya iben, wu aya a tana sor ma izen izen ame. A turung abong rigwm ba nashn itsik rigwm'e ne f ye,
Agwm gwm yir Adakunom, wan kyem ta shan kuyiik be rigwm ne kukyem, kamok wan ne i nye ikr cicr, Nu shim wan ne ikr'me kuse kamok anong i be kutser.
Mi di kufumung a ta min nye izibir cei abas afa nubk riya aner aya a ta se nusonong natoon itsik ame. A rosom kpa be idun kanataar.
Ne mi bun i di amaleka akak agbang'e, a sen f be agbang kut ye, Angan kyem a ta bisik idun na nong a ta karak kukpa'me ?
Akak kuse, natoon kaza ka kaben ka kayr iben a tana kyem a karak kukpa'me shita a tana fa ba.
Iyong mi tos didng kamok a kyem a s akak a tana kyem a karak kukpa shita a ta fa ba.
Ayong akak kayr kk kashn ame f be mi ye, Sang tu tos ba, Di! Azaki kya kayr ner aYahuda, kunik kasa aDauda, n canang kazatse. A kyem a ta karak kukpa ne a bisik idun kanataar'ong.

Ne mi bun i di Aturuk akak kyndi an tsr kut'me nunyeseng natite kar itsik rigwm'e. Ikr inaas ame be kk kashn t ku gorok. Aturuk'e be atom kanataar be anyisi kanataar. Ayong ne nye nabik Adakunom kanataar naya t tom'e nazatse cei.
Iyong Aturuk ame tseng nong a t se sok kukpa nubk riya aner a tan sonong ni itsik rigwm ame.

Nizen iya a ta sok kukpa, ikewum inaas ife kutser ame ne kk kashn isk ifa be anaas ame kpas kaben nashn Aturuk'me. Koangan be izom wu ne kakereng izinariya nafe name ikn itek kayr'e. Name'me sor kyndi aduwa zhl'e.

Iyong bom abom afas ne f ye, Wan kyem ta sok kufumung'e, wan kyem ta bisik idun'e kamok a t ka tsr. A ta nyosong nask wan nong i tin shan nerawe a ta te afe Adakunom. Wan shan Adakunom nerawe cicr kayr koakye irem ne koakye izere ne koakye kaben.
Wan t ku sak ba ta te ner rigwm wan be tsi nong a ta nye Adakunom yir itomong, tin nye rigwm natoon kazatse.
Mi bun i di ne mi fok kut rigwm maleka izungu natoon izungu whr. gorok ikewum inaas ife kutser ame ne kk kashn ame gip ne itsik rigwm ame.
tang i t be agap ne bom abom ye, Kukyem nye kufe Aturuk a t tsr, a kyem a tu ku nk rigwm be kurum ne kukyem cei be agap ne nakerek be kuyiik ne ri ritek.

Ne mi bun i fok koakye ikr i ta se natoon kaza be kaben cei be iya i ta se kayr kaben ne kayr ashi ne ife i ta se natoon'e cei t ta kut na abom ye, Nakerek be kuyiik be rigwm ne agap nye kufe aya a ta sonong natoon itsik rigwm'e be Aturuk'e gip ma izen izen.
Ne kewum inaas ife kutser ame f ye, Anong. Ne kk kashn ame kpas kaben a t ku ya iben.
Mi di Aturuk'e ta sen bisik kudun'e kufe imsng'e kayr idun kanataar ame. Ne mi fok ikewum ikak izining kayr inaas ife kutser ame t yis be agbang kut kyndi akparam ye, B.
Mi yrk ne mi di itsaap ikan. Aner aya a tin ngarak natoon itsaap'e be ka ta nubk wu, a mu ku te ribong rigwm. Ayong a kpaan itsi ni itsaap'e kyndi aner aya a ta tseng a be ni iya kak ni itsom.
Nizen aturuk'e ta fa bisik kudun kufe afa ne mi fok ikng ife afa t f ye, B.
Iyong itsaap ikak bun i wuruk iseng zhau. A nk aner aya a t min ngarak ni itsaap'e kukyem nong a t sok kusor caang kazatse ne a sak nerawe ta naka fs. A bun a t nk awn itsor.
Nizen iya Aturuk'e ta bisik kudun'e kufe ataar ne mi fok ikng'e ife ataar ta f ye, B. Ne mi di itsaap iwe nashn mi. Aner aya a tin ngarak ni itsaap'e be ikng ifa a tin maas kugaar ikr nubk wu.

Ne mi fok ikng ikak kyndi kut kukak natite ikr ame ku t f ye, Amudu ikpe naya a ta yis ye alikama se kyndi ishorong kuwoso alebura, amudu ataar afe ikpe naya a ta yis ye abale se kyndi ishorong kuwoso alebura. Amma tu beseng name nafar'e ka ashi anap'e ba.
Nizen Aturuk'e t bisik kudun kufe anaas'e ne mi fok kut ikewum ife anaas'e t f be mi ye, B!

Mi t fa yrk ne mi di itsaap ikak i ta se kyndi ashi aruron nashn mi. Riyerek aner aya a tin ngarak natoon itsaap'e nye Riku, kar nabik ya a tan kus tu ku sor tsang ka ku kuus nama. t nk ba kukyem a tanin fs ikes azining kayr ikes anaas ife kazatse be itsor ne izong be irk ne maan kukewum.
Nizen iya Aturuk'e ta bisik kudun'e kufe atoon ne mi di nabik nerawe fe a t ka fs ba kamok a t kuus rif Adakunom be kunk katsak ba, nabik'e se kaben nar a t ku nye asidaka.
Ne a tang kut be agap ye, Agwm gwm, Atek kaza be kaben, azhl'e, afe katsak, ma nizen inyaka ne wan ta t kazatse amok ne i ku karang ikng iya a tin nye yir ?
Ayong a nk koangan ba awn kukpiin kukan, ne a f be ba ye ra tor cik gak ma izen iya a tana fs sam Adakunom fudang ba be ronyining ba kyndi a t ka fs ba a gang.
Aturuk'e ta fa bisik kudun'e kufe igataar ne kazatse wor ka zuur be agap. Kunom wor ku te whi kyndi kukpiin kuwe kuya a ta nye be nakuyng izha iwe. Kufn cicr ku te kuseng zhau kyndi nask.
Adar kpas kaben kyndi kutes atafo kuya kuwun ta suruk kaben.
Ne kaza kunung kyndi ta kunung kukpa izibir ne nawhanang be gang dorok a ta wosong nar kusor ba.
Iyong gwm kazatse ne ritek be agbang sozha, be rum ne fe agap be sam ne ya sang ta nye sam ba cei, ta nrng kayr atas be nawhanang.
t tasak t f be nawhanang be ata ame ye, Ni kpas yin natoon yir nong tin tnng yir nanyisi aner a tan sonong natoon itsik rigwm ne kubeseng riy Aturuk'e.
Kamok agbang kunom riy kubeseng ba m b, angan ne a ta kyem'me ?
Nama ikr iyong, ne mi di maleka anaas tan nyeseng nikes kazatse inaas, ta tnng kuwun iri naas fan i bu fp kaben ka ashi ka koakye kuri kakon.
Ne mi di amaleka akak t wuruk nabas kuwuruk kunom be iziz kukyem Adakunom afe kutser nubk wu. Ayong a ta kut be agap a t ka nk ba kukyem nong a ta beseng kaben be agbang ishng.
A f be ba ye, Sang tu beseng yin iben ka ashi ka nakon ba, ma yir ti tsk yir iziz nati sam Adakunom nizham.
Ne mi fok ye ner aya a t ku tsk ba iziz'me, se ner izungu kusk inyak be isk inaas be anaas kayr nazu ner Isarela kusk be afa.
ner izrk aYahuda se 12,000. Ne fe izrk aRuben se 12,000. fe izrk aGad se 12,000.
ner Asher se 12,000 ne fe aNaptali se 12,000. Aner aManasa se 12,000.
ner aSimiyon se 12,000 ne ner aLawi se 12,000. Aner Isaka se 12,000.
ner aZebulun se 12,000 ne ner aYusufu 12,000. Aner izrk aBanyami se 12,000.

Nama anong, mi t fa yrk ne mi di rigwm nerawe whr riya sang akak tana kyem a fa ba. nerawe'me nes kayr koakye kaben, ne kayr koakye irem be koakye kuri ner ne koakye izere, an nyeseng nashn itsik rigwm ame nashn Aturuk'e. tes akpiin akan be afumung atarkai nibk ba.
tasak be agap ne f ye, Kashesh nye kafe Adakunom yir, wu aya a ta sonong natoon itsik rigwm. Kashesh nye kafe Aturuk'e.
maleka cicr nyeseng a ta gorok itsik rigwm'e be kk kashn ame ne ikewum inaas ame nong ta kpas kaben nashn itsik rigwm'e ta ya Adakunom iben,
ne f ye, Anong, kuyiik be nakerek be kukyem be riy rikan be rigwm be agap ne ritek nye rife Adakunom yir ma izen izen, Anong.
Ayong ashn'e akak kayr ba ti rip ye, ngan na be ares akan na ? wuruk ak ?
Iyong mi f be wu ye, Atekasa, wan ren. Ayong a f ye, ner na ne nye ner aya a t wuruk na amaan risam n kusu ares ba be nask Aturuk'e ta te akan pes.
Kamok anong, ba sor nashn itsik rigwm Adakunom ne ku ya iben katuk be kunom nagbang kar ku kuya iben. Aner a ta sonong ni itsik rigwm'e ta tarak ikpaar wu natoon ba koakye izen.
t ba fok izong ba, t fok kut kukoor ba, t fok kuzhoosh kunom ka kuzhoosh ikng ikak ba.
Kamok Aturuk a ta se natoon itsik rigwm'e t te afek ba. A t tseng be ba nar itop ashi kutser t ku wuruk. Adakunom t ka rng ba nanyisi nanyisi ba cei.
Nizen Aturuk'e ta bisik kudun kufe kanataar ne kaza te win kyndi ribir awa azining.
Iyong mi di maleka kanataar ame ta nyeseng nashn Adakunom, a t ka nk ba agba kanataar.

Amaleka akak, a t be kures a t nye be izinariya b nong a t nyeseng'e nashn abagadi'me. A t ku nk ikr ikn itek didng kayr kures ame nong a tin nye asidaka nong a tin gung be aduwa zhl'e cicr natoon a abagadi izinariya ame ta se nashn itsik rigwm.
Iyong itsing ikr ikn itek ame mak be aduwa zhl'e dorok nubk amaleka'me nong i t ngarak naza nufe Adakunom.
Ayong amaleka'me sok kures aturari ame, a tin shining be kurng natoon abagadi ame nong a t misik nazatse. Ne akparam tar ne kar nye berep be akanang kyndi iza ta tarang kar ne kaben zuur gip.
Iyong maleka kanataar ame nye kanyk nong ta fsm agba'me.
Nizen amaleka afe imsng'e t fp rigba rifu ne rikarang be kurng ku tin kar be nask kpas nazatse. Kurng'e ya kukyes kuzining kayr itaar ife kazatse, anong ne nakon be agam ashirim kurng'e ya cei.
Nizen amaleka afe afa t fp rigba rifu, yong a barak ikng ikak kyndi agbang rifan riya kurng tan yiir ku se kpa kayr ashi. Abas azining kayr ataar afe agbang kudung wor ku te nask.
Anong ne abas azining kayr ataar afe koakye ikng i ta be kutser kayr ashi ame kus. Ne abas azining kayr ataar afe akpara ashi ame beseng cei.
Amaleka afe ataar fp rigba rifu, yong agbang adar akak a ta se kanang kyndi kurng natoon kaza tikpa kayr abas azining kayr ataar afe agbang adung be itop ashi.
Riyerek adar'e nye Kurereng. Abas azining kayr ataar afe ashi'me rereng. nerawe whr aya a ta s ashi'me kus kamok kurereng'e.
Amaleka afe anaas fp rigba rifu, ne abas azining kayr ataar afe kunom te whi, anong ne kufn ne dar te whi gip. Abas azining kayr ataar afe kuwoso se whi anong ne katuk te dar kufn.
Mi t fa yrk ne mi fok akim akak a ta tseng natoon kaza ta tos be agap ye, Wa tsek, wa tsek, wa be ner ta sor nazatse, nizen iya ribir maleka ataar tana fsm agba ba.
Amaleka afe atoon fp rigba rifu ne mi di adar aya a ta se naza t kpa kaben. A nk adar'e akarak nong a tin karak ribong rikak ri ta se tsik dar igak ame.
Nizen iya adar'e t karak ribong'e iyong itsing wuruk kayr'e kyndi itsing kurng a ta kas nagbang kar. Itsing ribong'e sak kunom be kaza te map.
Ne kubep wuruk kayr itsing ame ku t n kayr kazatse, a t ku nk ba agap nong a ta tang nerawe kyndi inyng.
A f be kubep'e ye sang a tu beseng agam ka nakon ba, amma igak nerawe ya a ta be iziz Adakunom nanati ba ba.
A ta ka nk ba agap tin fs nerawe ba, igak tu ku nk ba risam rif ifn itoon tsek. Risam'me ta se kyndi inyng t ta anerawe
kayr inom iyong nerawe ta tsr riku, t s ba. t shim ke kus amma riku ta b ba.
Kubep'e se kyndi tsaap a tan sak a tin tseng nitsm. be ikr ikak nace ba kyndi abong izinariya afe rigwm, nanyisi ba se kyndi nafe nerawe.
Nakuyng ba se kyndi nakuyng rice anyining ne anyi ba se kyndi afe azaki.
kis nafok ba be ikng ikak kyndi kpaar kutsm. Nawor atsn ba se kyndi nawor tsaap atsm kutseng i ta teng i be nar itsom.
be arum tin tang nerawe kyndi inyng. A ta kyem nk anerawe risam be arum ba'ong ma ifn itoon.
Agwm ba nye amaleka aya a t ku nk kukyem natoon ribong riya ri ta be igak ba ame. Riyerek amaleka'me nirem ner Ibrani nye Abadon, nirem ner aHeleni nye Apoliyon, i ta sor ye, Aner a ta beseng ikr.
Risam rif imsng'e gor'ong, a tu ku won rifa riman'e.
Amaleka afe igataar'e fp rigba wu ne mi fok kut kukak t wuruk nikes inaas ife abagadi izinariya ame nashn Adakunom.
Kut'me f be amaleka afe igataar'e, ye, Bisik maleka anaas ame ya a ta ma ka rosom ba nishng aYufiretis.
Ayong a bisik maleka anaas ame ya a t tsang a ku sak ba kamok izen'e ne kunom'e be kufn'e ne riy'me nong t fs nerawe, abas azining kayr ataar.
Rigwm sozha ba'me ya a t kn natoon itsaap'e ta se kyndi aMiliyn isk inyak ifa (200,000,000).

tsaap'e be ner aya a t kn natoon itsaap'e mi t di kayr ikng iya Adakunom tin tonong'e be kpaar atsm iseng ni nafok ba, ife kak se shim shim ne ife kak se kyndi ashi aruron. Ace tsaap'e se kyndi fe azaki, kurng be itsing ne ikng ikak kyndi itong abindiga wuruk ni nanu tsaap'e.
Be risam na ne a ti fs nerawe abas azining kayr ataar, be kurng'e ne itsing ne ikng ikak kyndi itong abindiga t wuruk ni nanu ba.
Agap tsaap'e se ni nanu ba ne arum ba kamok arum tsaap'e se kyndi when be ace a tin tm nerawe.

Ribir nerawe fe sang ta ka fs ba be amaan ikr'ong ba, gaar kushishing kuse ba nong t kam be ikr ba t nye be ibk ba. ya kashn be kuya amaan nabik iben ne ikr ba ta nye be izinariya ne azurfa be atsm ne ata be ikon ba t nye be ibk ba. Ikr'ong di kar ba, i fok kuto ba, i kyem i tseng ba.
gaar kushishing kuse ba kufe kufs nerawe be kukur be rikuna ne itsang ba ta nye.
Ne mi bun i di agbang amaleka akak ne naza a sen tisik kaben. A mu ku kis be ann be itsereng natoon rice wu. Kanyisi wu se kyndi kunom ne atak wu seng kyndi atsn kurng.
Kukpa izibir kukak kuhiir'e se nukarak nubk wu. A nyeseng be kutak riya natoon ashi, kufe rimen se niben ikoor.
Ne a ta kuto be agap kyndi azaki ta muus. Nizen iya wu ta tar ne kut akparam kanataar ame shim.
Nizen akparam kanataar'e t f kanu, mi shim ta zibir rif'me, amma mi fok kut kukak naza ye, Sang tu zibir ikr iya akparam'e t f ba.
Ayong amaleka aya mi t ku di nunyeseng kutak kuzining natoon ashi ne kufe afa niben ikoor ame sok kubk riya wu naza.

Ayong a shu be riyerek wu aya a ta se ma izen izen, afe a t nye kaza be koakye ikng i ta se kayr'e. Wu aya a t nye kazatse be koakye ikng i ta se kayr'e, wu afe a ta nye gbang shng be ikr i ta se kayr'e cei, yong amaleka'me f ye, A ta ba beseng izen ba.
Amma nizen iya amaleka afe kanataar tana fp rigba rifu, nizen iyong ne Adakunom ta taas koakye ikng wu ta tsang a f be ner kuzarap wu.
Iyong mi bun i fok kut kuya mi ta tsang i fok naza ame. Ku f be mi ye, Tseng, ta se shan kukpa izibir ku ta se nubk amaleka a ta nyeseng be kutak kukak natoon ashi ne kukak niben ikoor.
Iyong mi tseng nufe amaleka'me i t f be wu ye a rin nk ikpis kukpa izibir'e. Ayong a f be mi ye, Se sok'e ta ya, wan ta fok kurereng'e nafa wan amma ku se kyndi ritong nanu wan.
Iyong mi se sok kukpa izibir'e nubk amaleka'me i ta ya. Mi fok ku t ta kyndi ritong nanu mi, nama mi t wnng ne mi fok kurereng'e nafa mi.
Ayong a bun a ti tak ye, Wan ta bun i zarap natoon nerawe whr be iwp whr ne rem zr zr ne gwm zr zr.
Ayong a ti nk ikng iya a tin maas kar kyndi ishn. Ne a f be mi ye, Tseng ta se maas agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben be kar a tu ku nye asidaka ne i fa nerawe ya a ta sen ya Adakunom iben kayr'e.
Amma tu maas kubang'e kufe imsng'e ba. Sang tu maas ba, kamok an nk furin, ba ne a ta b shesh kuwp kuzhl'e na ma ifn isk inaas be afa.
Mi t ka nk asheda mi afa kukyem nong a tin zarap ma kuks izungu izining be isk inyak ifa be isk igataar. (1,260) A ta te agyr ares nong ta tonong riy riwe ba.

Ke aner akak nye kyndi a ta ka man ba, ne kurng wuruk kayr kanu ba nong ku ta ya mudn ba'me. Anong ne koangan afe a ta shim a ta ka man ba a t ku fr.

ner afa'ong, a tu ku nk ba kukyem nong tin whn kaza fan iza bu kpa nizen ba ta sen nye kuzarap'e. be kukyem tana shishing itop ashi nong a ta te nask, bun t ku nk ba kukyem a tana kyem tin nk kazatse koakye kuri risam nizen iya ba t shim.
Nama t gang i taas kutom'e, ikewum ikak iya i ta wuruk kayr ribong riya ri ta be igak ba ame, tikpa ni ba ma i nar agap ba, iyong i t ka fs ba.

Kayr inom itaar be ribir, nerawe koakye be irem zr zr ne izere zr zr ne iwp zr zr t bs t yrk ikom'e ma a ta roon'e ye sang tu ku nsk ba ba.
nerawe kazatse t nye riy rikan didng, kamok rikus tom'ong. ta nye riy rikan ne naka toos be ikr kamok riku ner kuzarap afa'ong ne risam t nk kazatse.
Amma nama inom itaar be ribir'e, isong iya i ta nyeseng kutser t ne nufe Adakunom i titiik niba. Iyong wor dorok be kutser. Koangan afe a t ku di ba be kutser fok inyim makiyi.
Ayong ner kuzarap afa ame ta fa fok kut kukak be agap ku ta wuruk kayr kaza ku ta f be ba ye, Ngarak yin aze. Ayong ngarak naza kayr ann ne mudn ba ka yrk ba.
Dim nizen iyong kaben wor ka zuur, abas azining kayr kuwp'e wor kuyirik. nerawe izungu kanataar kus kamok kuzuur kaben'e. fe t gaar be kutser fok inyim didng yong tiyiik Adakunom a ta se kayr kaza.
Risam rif afa gor'ong, risam rif ataar saase kyrna.
Ayong amaleka afe kanataar ame t fa fp rigba rifu, ne a fok t kak kanang kayr kaza i ta f ye, Rigwm kazatse n te rife Agwm gwm yir ne aKiristi wu, wu ne a ta nye rigwm ma izen izen.

ne f ye, Yir shim ta ka tonong yir riy rikan Agwm gwm yir Adakunom afe kukyem cicr, aya a tu ku se gbugbang ne a kuse kyrna. Kamok wan sok agbang kukyem wan i tin nye rigwm kyrna.

Riy furin kubeseng, izen riy kubeseng wan n b. Izen n nye a tana t ikom amok ne a ku karang sam wan ner kuzarap ishorong ba, ne sam wan zhl'e ne koangan fe a ta tiyiik riyerek wan, inoon be kk kashn. Izen n nye wan tana fs fe a t beseng kazatse.
Iyong agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben ku ta se kayr kaza karak ne mi di akpate kushu Adakunom kayr'e. Ne akanang akak wuruk be riwng ne kutasak iza be kuzuur kaben ne agbang rikarang.
Ayong agbang ikng azhing ikak wuruk natoon kaza. Ikng'e nye abining akak a t sok kunom a tin nye ares ne kufn nabas atak wu. Ribong rigwm wu nye dar kusk be afa.
Abining'e se be kafa yong a yiir tos be kur'me kamok izen kutes wu tsang i nye.
Kukng kukak bun ku wuruk naza gbak. Kukng'e nye kukewum kukak kuseng ku ta se zhirim kyndi Kuwhen ku be ace kanataar be atom kusk be abong rigwm kanataar natoon ace'me.
Kurum'e rng dar kaza abas azining kayr ataar a t korok kayr kazatse. Ne Kuwhen ame nyeseng nashn abining ame a tan b barak a ta tes nikum a ta wor a wnng igon abining'e nizen iya a tana tes.
Abining'e tes igon kamitek'e aya a tana nye rigwm natoon nerawe kazatse cei. A t nye rigwm'e be ishn kutsm. Amma a ti shan igon'e zhar a t tseng'e naza nufe Adakunom nar itsik rigwm wu.
Ayong abining'e teng a t n katse nar Adakunom ta tsang a ku sak'e nong a t ku fek ma inom izungu izining be isk inyak ifa be isk igataar (1260).
Ayong a kpaan itsom naza, aMakel be maleka wu kn itsom be Kuwhen ame, ne Kuwhen'e be maleka afu kn be ba gip.
Amma agap Kuwhen'e raar yong ta ya ba ni itsom'e ne ku ro ba kayr kaza.
Ayong a barak Kuwhen ame kaben. Wu ne a nye kuwhen kugbazen'e ame a ta yis ye Amaan Aner ka Ishetan ayi. Wu ne a wk kazatse cicr nong kazatse ta wei. A tu barak kaben mak be maleka wu ame.

Iyong mi fok kut kukak kanang natoon kaza ku ta f ye, Kyrname, kashesh be kukyem ne rigwm Adakunom yir ne kukyem aKiristi wu m b. Kamok an barak aner aya a t tsees kukun ronyining yir kaben, wu aya a ta yiir nye kukun ronyining yir nashn Adakunom katuk be kunom.
ronyining yir t ku canang kamok nask Aturuk'e ne kamok ikng ife ba t f, kamok t ku teng riku ba.
Kamok anong, nye yin riy rikan naza ne ya a ta sor kayr'e. Amma aw be kazatse ne agbang adung, kamok Amaan Aner n tiik kayr yin. Riy wu kun fuus kamok a ren ye izen wu ba gop ba.
Nizen iya Kuwhen'e t di a tu barak kaben, iyong a tikup na abining'e afe a t tes igon kamitek'e ame.

Amma Adakunom nk abining'e agbang afabak afa kuri afe agbang akim nong a tin dorok naza fan kukewum ame nong a t tseng nar a t mu ku sak'e kayr katse. Azong ne a tin sak riy ni wu ma ay ataar be ribir.
Iyong Kuwhen ame kos ashi nanu wu kyndi ashi ishng nong a t wk ye nong a t s ashi'me t sok abining'e.
Amma kaben tobok abining'e. Kaben'e karak kanu ka t wnng ashi aya Kuwhen'e t kos.
Iyong riy Kuwhen ame ti barang kubeseng be abining'e didng, iyong a tseng a ta se kn itsom be ribir afe iri abining'e ya a ta kuus Itsi Adakunom ne yiir itak natoon aYeso.
Iyong Kuwhen ame tseng ku ta se nyeseng natoon rizk nanu agbang kudung ame.
Ne mi di kukewum kukak ku ta sen wuruk kayr agbang kudung. Kukewum'me be tom kusk be ace kanataar ne abong rigwm kusk natoon tom wu'me. A ti zibir riyerek kuzhsh Adakunom natoon koakye rice'me.

Rice ikewum'e rikak be agbang kufor kyndi a tin ku mo, amma kufor'e n te kutser. Anerawe te zhing kamok kufor'e t te kutser ne ku kuus.
nerawe ya Kuwhen ame iben kamok wu ne a nk kukewum'me kukyem wu. nerawe ya kukewum'me iben gip ne f ye, Angan se kyndi kukewum na ? Angan ta kyem a kn itsom be wu ?
A nk kukewum'me kanu a tanin tiyiik rice wu ne a f ikr kuzhsh Adakunom ne a ku nk kukyem a tanin nye rigwm ma ifn isk inaas be afa.
Iyong kukewum'me karak kanu wu nong ku t kas Adakunom, ne ku kas riyerek wu ne kar kusor wu be ya a ta sor kayr kaza.
A tu ku nk kukyem a tanin kn itsom be zhl'e ne a ka canang ba. A tu ku nk kukyem natoon koangan irem be koakye kuri anerawe be koakye kuri izere ne koakye kuri kar.
nerawe ta se nazatse cicr t ku ya iben, cicr ner aya a ta zibir ayerek ba kayr kufumung kutser kuya ku ta nye kufe Aturuk'e ba, aya a ta tsr kum nizen a t nye kazatse.
Aner aya a ta be ato kufok a ra fok!
Koangan ta tsang a se ye, a tu ku yiir a ta te asam ta te asam'me. Aya a ta se ye a t ku fr be itsor, be itsor ne a t ku fr'e. Iyong tonong ye zhl'e ra naka tsesek ne nk katsak na Adakunom.
Iyong mi bun i di kukewum kukak, ku ta sen wuruk kayr iben. Ku be tom afa kyndi afe aturuk amma kuf kanu kyndi Kuwhen ame.
Ku ti nye itomong be kukyem kukewum kufe imsng'e ame. Ku bun sak kazatse ne ner ta se kayr kazatse ta ya kukewum kufe imsng'e ame iben, ku ya kufor rice'me t te kutser.
Kukewum kufe afa na nye ikr azhing didng ma ku sak kurng t wuruk naza nong ku ta kpa kaben ne nerawe yrk.

A nk kukewum kufe afa'ong kukyem a tin nye ikr azhing ne a ni wrk nerawe kazatse didng nong a ta karp kukewum kufe imsng'e riy. A ta sak ba ta nk ikng ikak i ta tas kukewum kufe imsng ame nong a tin tiyiik kukewum'me a tu ku man be kutsor gip be anong ku bun ku nye kutser.
tu nk kukyem nong a tin fp isong nikng'e nong as ku ta kyem ku f kanu ne ku sak a ta fr koangan a ta gaar ku kuya iben.
Kukewum'e sak koangan anerawe ahiir'e be agbang'e, arum'e be afe rizor'e, asam'me be afe a ta se washak, a sak koangan t tsk iziz nubk riya wu ka nati wu ayi.
Sang akak kyem a shan ka a rs ikng ikak ba ma ke aner'e be iziz'ong nizham. Iziz'me nye riyerek kukewum'me ka izibir wu.
Rif na shim aner ra be kukyem. Aner aya a ta be kutrng didng ra fa a ta di izibir kukewum'me kamok izibir'e nye ife anerawe. Iziz kukewum'me nye igataar, igataar, igataar (666).

Mi ta fa yrk ne mi di Aturuk ame nashn'i nunyeseng natoon kawhanang aSihiyona be ner izungu kusk inyak be isk inaas be anaas 144,000 mak be wu, ya a t zibir riyerek Aturuk'e ne riyerek Ada wu ninati ba.

Iyong amaleka'me ta kut be agap a ta f ye, Tiyiik yin Adakunom, ne i kerek yin kuyiik wu! Kamok kyrna izen n nye a tana t kazatse cicr amok. Ku ya yin iben, wu ne a nye kaza be kaben, be agbang adung ne itop ashi.

wu gip a t s ashi riy kubeseng Adakunom, aya a t nye be agap wu kayr kures riy kubeseng wu. A t ku nk risam didng be kurng ne ikng ikak kyndi itong abindiga itong ikak nashn maleka zhl'e ne nashn Aturuk'e.

Itsing kurng kuya a tana ku nk mo ba risam'me ngarak naza ma izen izen. Koangan ner aya a t ya kukewum ame iben ka ikng iya i t ku tas iben ne a t ku tsk ba iziz riyerek ikewum'e, ta s risam katuk be kunom dar gang.

Mi t fa sok anyisi naza ne mi di kunn kukan nashn'i. Mi di aner akak kyndi Igon Anerawe ta min sonong natoon kunn'e. Aner'e be ribong rigwm a t nye be izinariya natoon rice wu. aLauzhe akak a t ya didng se nubk wu.
Ayong amaleka akak wuruk nutu kuya Adakunom iben nong a t yis aner aya a ta se natoon kunn ame be agap ye Nabak alauzhe wan nong tin tsek naya, izen ishamang n nye, naya nbeen kayr kazatse.
Ayong aner a ta se nusonong natoon kunn'e ziming alauzhe wu natoon kazatse nong a ti tsk ikng i tan been kayr kazatse'me.
Iyong amaleka akak bun a wuruk kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben kayr kaza, amaleka ayong be alauzhe aya a t ya nubk wu gip.

Ne amaleka akak a tin sak riy nurng bun a wuruk gbak, a wuruk na abagadi nong a t yis amaleka aya a ta be alauzhe nubk wu ame be agap, ye Nabak alauzhe wan nong tin tsk kutes anap kayr kazatse kamok an te afe kutsk.
Ayong amaleka'me ziming alauzhe wu ame kayr kazatse nong a ta kpr kutes anap ame ne a tusung nar Adakunom tana fi ashi'me be riy kubeseng wu.

A fi ashi anap'e nama kuwp, nask yiir wuruk nar'me ma na teng kyndi kudun a ta rosom nanu itsaap. Kugugk nask'e ta teng se kyndi akilomita isk inyak itaar, ne kutsik'e se kyndi amita azining be ribir.
Mi di ikng ikak natoon kaza igbang'e ife azhing. Mi di maleka kanataar be iriri amaan risam kanataar rif igang'e. Kamok be ba ne a tin tonong riy kubeseng Adakunom rife igang'e.

Iyong mi di ikng ikak i ta se kyndi kudung agilas a t min kar be kurng. Ne mi di ner a t canang ikewum ame be ikng i t ku tas ne iziz riyerek wu ame, ba se nuyeseng nukim agbang kudung'e. se be zom Adakunom t ka nyesek ba.

bom abom aMusa asam Adakunom be abom a ta bom Aturuk'e ame ye, Kunye wan se yiik ne ku nye ikng azhing Adakunom agbang Agwm gwm afe kukyem cei. Iren wan nye iren itek be ife katsak. Wan ne i nye agbang Agwm gwm afe nerawe kazatse cicr.

Angan ne a ta fok inyim wan ba, agbang Agwm gwm a tana won dar a tiyiik riyerek wan ? Kamok wan zr tsek ne i se zhl. nerawe kazatse cicr ta bs ta ka ya iben kamok wan tonong ye kunye wan nye kufe katsak.
Nama anong, mi t fa yrk kaza, kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben ne mi di kubur kushu Adakunom kuy.
maleka kanataar wuruk kayr kutu kuya Adakunom iben be iriri amaan risam kanataar ame. n nyeseng be ares akan aya a t gysm ne rosom nafok ba be idun ikak a t nye be izinariya.
Ayong azining kayr ikr i ta be kutser ame, nk maleka kanataar'e nakereng a ta nye be izinariya kanataar na ta shining be riy kubeseng Adakunom, wu afe a ta se ma izen izen.

Ayong agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben ame shining be itsing i ta wuruk kayr kuyiik Adakunom ne kukyem wu. Akak kyem a n kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e ba, ma izen iya iriri amaan risam kanataar ife maleka kanataar'e t gang.

Iyong mi fok kut kukak be agap ku t yis kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e, ku ta sen f be maleka kanataar ame ye, Tseng yin ta se korok yin kazatse nakereng kanataar nafe riy kubeseng Adakunom na.

Ayong amaleka afe imsng'e tseng a ta se korok ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu kayr kazatse'me. Ayong amaan ifor i ta r didng ti wuruk nirm ner ta be iziz kukewum ame be ya a t ya ikng iya i t ku tas iben.
Amaleka afe afa tseng a t se korok ikng i ta se kayr kakereng kafu kayr agbang kudung, yong ashi'me kirik a t te kyndi nask aner aya a tan ku, ne ikr iya i t sor kayr ashi'me kus cei.
Amaleka afe ataar'e tseng a t se korok ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu kayr ishng ne ninar ashi tu ku wuruk. Ayong ashi'me te nask gip.
Iyong mi fok amaleka aya a tin sak riy nashi t f ye, Amok na ya wan tan tn se gyr, wan afe i ta se gbugbang ne i bun i ku se kyrna. Wan nye Azhl'e, kamok wan t t amok gyr.
Kamok ba tan nyos nask zhl'e be fe kuzarap wan, yong wan t nk ba nask nong a t s tr be kunye ba.
Ne mi fok kut kukak kayr abagadi ame ta f ye, Ei, Adakunom Agbang Agwm gwm afe kukyem cei, amok wan se gyr ne a nye katsak.
Amaleka afe anaas'e tseng a ta se korok ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu natoon kunom. Ayong a nk kunom kukyem a tanin shosh nerawe be kurng.
Iyong kuzhoosh kunom ame ya nerawe ma fiming riyerek Adakunom aya a ta be agap ku tnng amaan risam na. Amma gaar kushishing kuse ba nong a t ku tiyiik.
Amaleka afe atoon tseng a t se korok ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu ni itsik rigwm kukewum ame yong awhi whn rigwm kukewum'me cei. nerawe ros irem ba be kur'me,
ayong fiming Adakunom afe a ta se kayr kaza kamok kur'me be ifor i ta se nirm ba. Gip be anong, a gaar kushishing kuse.
Amaleka afe igataar se korok ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu na agbang ishng a ta yis ye aYufiretis. Ashi'me gang cei nong a t nang gwm a tana wuruk nabas kuwuruk kunom iren.
Ne mi di amaan nabik nataar kyndi kpabor t wuruk nanu kuwhen ame, be nanu kukewum ame ne nanu aner kuzarap afe abs.
maan nabik'e nye tseng i t nye ikr azhing. tsees nufe gwm kazatse na cicr nong a ta ka tusung ba nar kazining kamok itsom a tana kn katuk agbang kunom Adakunom afe kukyem cicr.
Di yin, mi saase kyndi akpatang. Aner riy rikan ne a nye aner aya a ta sor be kanyk, ne a sor be ares wu bubarak fan a bu tseng ica'me ne a fok isum kayr nerawe.
Iyong tseng ame tusung gwm ame cicr nar kakak a ta yis nirem ner Ibrani ye Amagedon.
Amaleka afe kanataar tseng a ta se misik ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu natoon kaza. Iyong kut kukak wuruk be agap kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben nar itsik rigwm wu ye, An gang!
Iyong kar kpaan ku gysm berep berep kyndi iza ta tarang kar, be kutasak ne akparam, ne kaben zuur didng. Kum Adakunom t nye anerawe, kaben kun zuur anong ba, kuzuur kaben'e wor ka nar agap.
Agbang kuwp ame kabak abas ataar ne gbang iwp kazatse kpas zr zr. Adakunom trng be agbang kuwp aBabila. Ayong a nk aBabila'me kures ashi anap kufe agbang riy kubeseng wu.
Koakye rizik ri ta se natite ashi be nawhanang cei titei.
Agbang rikarang riya ri ta gaar didng wuruk naza ri ti kpas natoon nerawe ma nerawe fiming riyerek Adakunom kamok amaan risam rikarang'e ta nar agap.

Ayong amaleka'me ti sok kayr Kabik a t tseng be mi kayr katse. Mi di abining akak azong a tan sonong natoon kukewum kukak kuseng ku ta be ayerek ritok nurm wu be ace kanataar ne tom kusk.

Abining'e te ares akak aseng. Abining'e te ares a t nye be izinariya ne iwrng i ta se yiik. A be kures kus ashi kukak a t nye be izinariya nubk wu. Kures'e shining be ikr akyr be ife i ta be narik rikuna wu.
A ti zibir riyerek rikak nati wu rif sang akak ta ren ikng i ta sor ba ye,
Mi di abining'e tan feng be nask fikuus zhl'e wu tan s, ne nafe ner ta nk asheda natoon aYeso. Nizen iya mi t ku di mi fok azhing didng.
Ayong amaleka'me f be mi ye, Kamok aky ne wan fok azhing ? Mi t ka ts ikpang abining na ne afe kukewum wu tin ngarak na, i ta be ace kanataar be atom kusk.

Kukewum wan t di, tuse gbugbang, amma kyrna ku kuse ba. Ace kanataar'e nye gwm kanataar, atoon kayr ba n kus, azining kuse, akak rusek a ta ra b. Izen iya ayong'e tana b, a ta nye rigwm nizen cik tsek.

Kamok Adakunom sak nay ba nong ta shining ikng iya wu t shim. Ba t shim a t nk kukewum'me kukyem ba nong a tin nye rigwm ma izen iya a tana shining ikng iya Adakunom ta f.

A ta kut naza a t f ye, Kun kpa, ayiik kuwp aBabila n kpa! Kun te kar tseng tu ku sor ne kasa koakye kuri amaan kabik be kar kusor koakye kuri akprdk nanon naya na ta se kyr.
Kamok nerawe kazatse cicr n feng be ashi anap afe amaan rikuna wu. gwm kazatse nye rikuna be wu. gbang zhik kazatse na te rum kamok kushim kusas kusor kazatse wu.
Iyong mi fok kut kukak natoon kaza, ye, ner'i, wuruk yin kayr kuwp'ong, fan rinn kuwp'e bin ngarak natoon yin, fan i bu s yin amaan risam mak be ba.

Ku nk yin risam didng be riy riwe tr be kuyiik ne kushim kusas kusor kazatse wu t shim kunk rice wu. Kayr riy wu a yiir ya kuka ye, Mi sor kyndi agwm. Mi nye akumung ba, mi ta wor i nye riym ba.
Kamok anong, kayr kunom kuzining risam kurk be riym ne izong tin b ni wu. Kurng t ku ya cei kamok Adakunom Agwm gwm ayiik'e t ku t amok.

t nyeseng gugk kamok ba t di risam ba, ne f ye, Wa tsek! Wa tsek, Wan agbang ayiik kuwp aBabila, kuwp aBabila ku ta be kukyem! Kayr awa azining a wor a tu t amok.
gbang zhik kazatse t ku tos ne a nye riym kamok akak ba sen shan ikr ife ba ta rs ba.

Akak kuse a ta shashang izinariya ba ka azurfa ba ka iwrng ba i ta be kuyiik didng ne ares ba atek be aseng, ne ares kak a ta yis ye asilik, ne iriri nakon nafe ikn itek. Koakye kuri ikng iya a ta nye be anyi izoom ne ikon i ta be itsm didng ne atsm a ta be agap be ata rink akak atek.

zhik'e f be wu ye, Ikr itek wan ta min te riy n gang cei. Kurum wan be ikr izem wan n gang cei. Wan t ba s ba.
gbang zhik ya a t rs ikr ba ne a ni ss ikng ikak natoon'e t ma nyeseng gugk kamok risam'me. t tos ne nye riy riwe,
ne f ye, Wa tsek! Wa tsek, Agbang kuwp na! Kuya ku ta tsang ku tes ares atek afe itsm, be ares aseng, be aya a ta nye aseng zhau, ne a naka zem be ares izinariya ne iwrng iya i ta se yiik.
Kayr awa azining kurum'e wor ku te kpdng!  Iyong kk kashn fe kutsip akpara ashi ne fe a t ns kayr'e be fe a t tsip be koangan afe a ta s ikng kunye azong t nyeseng gugk.
t tos nizen iya ba t di itseng kurng ku ta sen ya kuwp'e, t f ye, Kuwp kukak kun kuse ku t be kuyiik kyndi agbang kuwp na ba.
Iyong korok iben rice ne tos ne nye riy riwe ne tang ikun, ne f ye, Wa tsek! Wa tsek be agbang kuwp na! Kuwp kufe fe agbang akpara ashi tin s kurum kayr'e. Amma kayr awa azining, ku beseng cei.
Nye yin riy rikan, yin fe i ta se yin kayr kaza! Nye yin riy rikan zhl'e be manzo ne fe kuzarap, kamok Adakunom n t aBabila amok natoon ikr iya wu t ka nye yin'e.

Ne agbang amaleka akak a t be agap sok agbang kuta kukak ku ta gaar kyndi agbang ku ta ak nong a ta barak kayr agbang kudung ne a f ye, Ana ne a t barak agbang kuwp aBabila be agap kaben, a t ba di ba.
A t ba fok riwng izom ka abom ka asharuwa ka rif rigba kayr wan ba. A t ba s akak afe ikng kunye kayr wan ba. A t ba fok akak ta sen k ak kayr ba.
Akanang ta ba ya kayr kuwp'e baba ba. A t ba fok akak ta sen nye riy rikan kuwnng kufas baba ba. Agbang zhik wan ne nye gbang ner kayr kazatse. Wan ne i bun i wrk nerawe kazatse be kubok wan.
Anong ne a ti t kuwp aBabila amok kamok nask ner kuzarap ne nafe zhl'e fe Adakunom ne nafe nerawe t ka fs ba nazatse.
Nama anong ne mi fok kut kukak kyndi riwng nerawe whr kayr kaza ta tasak ne f ye, Adidngng Adakunom, kashesh be kuyiik ne kukyem nye kufe Adakunom yir.
Kamok amok wu se gyr ne a nye katsak. A t agbang inyak agwm iya i t beseng kazatse be rikuna wu amok. Adakunom mu ku karang kamok a fs sam wu.
Iyong bun tang kut ye, Adidngng Adakunom, itsing kurng kuya ku tu ku ya ngarak naza ma izen izen.
Iyong kk kashn isk ifa be anaas ame ne ikewum inaas ame kpas kaben nong t ya Adakunom iben, wu afe a ta sonong natoon itsik rigwm. Ne tang kut ne f ye, Anong! Adidngng Adakunom!
Ne kut kukak wuruk natoon itsik rigwm ame, ye, Kerek yin Adakunom yir, Yin sam wu cicr, yin ya i ta fok yin inyim wu, kk kashn be inoon!
Iyong mi bun i fok kut kukak kyndi riwng rigwm nerawe, kyndi ashi ta wk, kyndi iza ta tasak. Mi fok ta f ye, Adidngng Adakunom! Kamok Ada Adakunom yir ayiik'e ne a se be rigwm.
Won i tu nye yir riy rikan ne i fok yir kusas'e ne i ku tiyiik yir! Kamok izen kuwnng Aturuk'e n nye. Abining wu afas n naka zem.
A t ku nk ares akan afe itsm a ta forop ma a gysm nong a ta te.  (Ares akan'e sor kyndi kunye kutek kuya zhl'e ta nye.)
Ayong amaleka'me f be mi ye, Zibir ikr na, ner riy rikan nye ner aya a t ku tak ba riy rikan kuwnng Aturuk na. Ne a bun a f ye, Rif na nye rif Adakunom rif katsak.

Mi di kaza nukarak ne i di itsaap ikan nunyeseng. A yis aner aya a tin ngarak natoon itsaap'e ye Aner Katsak be Katsak. A t amok natoon katsak ne a nye itsom kamok katsak.

Itsor ikak iwn'e iya i ta ya didng wuruk nanu wu, a ti tm aner kazatse be itsor'e. A tin nye rigwm niba be ishn kutsm. A t fi kutes anap ba kayr ribong a tin fi ashi anap, aya a ta nye afe agbang riy kubeseng Adakunom afe Kuyiik.
Natoon kukpiin wu be natoon ishurtak'e, a ti zibir riyerek rikak ye,
Ne mi di amaleka akak tan nyeseng natite kunom. A t ta kut be agap a t yis nanon cicr na t sen kar natoon kaza ye, B yin cicr nar kazining nong t ya yin naya agbang riy rikan Adakunom na.

Ayong a yiir kukewum ame mak be aner kuzarap abs aya a ta nye ikr azhing be riyerek kukewum ame. Kamok ikr azhing'e iyong ne i wrk fe a t be iziz kukewum ame ne ya ikng kukewum'me ta nye iben. Cicr ba a t barak ba be kutser kayr icen kurng kuya ku ta cishek didng ne itong ikak kyndi ife abindiga.
A fs ribir sozha ame kak be itsor i t wuruk nanu aner aya ta se natoon itsaap ikan ame. Iyong nanon ti kumung rice ba ni iya ikom'e.
Ne mi di amaleka akak t wuruk kayr kaza ta sen tiik kaben, be akarak ribong riya ri ta se tsik dar igak ame. A be kudun kutsm kugbang'e nubk wu.
Ayong a yiir kuwhen ame, kugbazen kuwhen ame, wu ne a ta nye Amaan Aner ka Ishetan ayi. Amaleka ame t ku rosom ma ay izungu izining.
A t ku barak kayr ribong ri ta se dar igak ame nong a t whn kpa fan a bu s iren kuwrk nerawe kazatse ma ay izungu izining gor. Nama ay izungu izining'e gor, a t ku bisik kayr nizen cik tsek.

ner aya a t fok inyim be fe a t gaar kunk katsak ne fe amaan kunye ne fe kufs nerawe be fe kunye rikuna be fe a t ya kukur, be fe a ta ya ikr iduk iben cei be fe abs, kar kusor ba se kayr icen kurng be itong ikan i ta se kyndi ife abindiga. Iyu ne i ta nye riku rif afa.
Ayong amaleka azining kayr maleka kanataar a t be nakereng na t be amaan risam kanataar nafe igang ame b a t f be mi ye, B mi t ka tonong abining afas Aturuk ame tan sok.

Ayong a ti sok kayr kabik a t tseng be mi natoon agbang kawhanang kakak ka ta se ring ring nong a ta sen tonong Agbang Kuwp Kuzhl'e, a ta yis ye aUshalima. Ku se be kuwuruk kayr kaza nufe Adakunom, ku ta sen tiik kaben.

Kuwp'e be agbang kubar kukak ku ta se garang didng be nanu kutu kuns kusk be afa be amaleka azining a tan nyeseng nashn koakye kanukutu'me. A tin zibir ayerek izrk ner Isarela kusk be afa ni nanu kutu'me.

Abar'e se tr abas akak nar afudang ba, kusp'e be kusaa'me se titr'e. Nizen iya amaleka'me t maas kuwp'e be ishn wu, yong a s kuwp'e se kyndi akilomita izungu ifa be isk inyak ifa (2,200). Kusp'e be kusa'me ne kugarang'e se titr'e.
Amaleka ame t fa maas kukpakarak kubar'e, yong a s ku se kyndi amita isk igataar be igataar. Amaleka'me maas kyndi nerawe ta maas ikr ba.
A nk kubar'e be iwrng ikak i ta gysm a ta yis ye aZhaspa. A nk kuwp'e be izinariya zhl, i ta se kanang kyndi agilas.
A zem abor'e be koakye kuri iwrng. Kuta ribor kufe imsng'e nye iwrng a ta yis ye aZhaspa, kufe afa'me a yis ye aSafaya, kufe ataar nye Agat ne kufe anaas nye aEmeral,

kufe atoon'e a yis ye aOnis, kufe igataar a yis ye aKaneliya, kufe kanataar'e a yis ye aKirisolat, kufe ikara a yis ye aBeril, kufe katonbk a yis ye aTopas, kufe kusk a yis ye aKirisopuras, kufe kusk be azining a yis ye aZhasi ne kufe kusk be afa'me a yis ye Ametis.
Nanu kutu kusk be afa'me a nye be iwrng ikak i ta gysm kususas'e, a nye koakye kanukutu'me be iwrng'e izining. A nye agbang iren kayr kuwp'e be izinariya zhl kyndi agilas a ta se kanang.
Mi di agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben kayr agbang kuwp'e ba, kamok Ada Adakunom ayiik'e ne Aturuk'e ne a nye agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e.

t bs be ikr itek ife kusaas ne kurum nerawe kazatse na cei kayr kuwp'e.

Ayong amaleka'me f be mi ye, Rif na nye katsak, i nye ikng iya a tana kuus. Adakunom, Agwm gwm aya a ta nk afe kuzarap kabik wu, tom amaleka wu nong a ta tonong sam wu ikr iya i tana nye sang be kubeseng izen ba.
Di yin, Mi saase kyrna! Aner riy rikan ne a nye aner aya a ta kuus kuzarap ku ta se kayr kufumung na.

Won wu aya a ta nye amaan ikr tu ya kashn be amaan kunye wu, aner aya a ta nye ikr isum ra ya kashn be kunye anong. Aner aya a ta be kuse kutek ra ya kashn be kuse kutek wu. Aner aya a ta sor zhl ra ya kashn be kusor zhl.
Di yin, Mi saase kyrna! Ishorong yin se nunaan, mi t karang koangan titr be ikng ife wu t nye.
Mi ne i nye Alfa ne aOmega, Imsng'e be Igang'e, Nasan'e ne i nye Igang'e.

fe a tana sor nufang'e ne nye ner aya kunye ba ta tas kufe gabu, fe a ta nye kubok, fe a ta nye rikuna be fe kufs nerawe ne fe kuya ikr iduk iben be fe a ta shim kubs abs.
Mi, aYeso ne i tom amaleka mi nong a t ka tak kutom na nong yin ta tak yin fikuus. Mi ne i nye Kunik aDauda ne I nye Aner kasa'me. Mi ne i nye Adar Kusetson, aya a ta se kanang.
Kabik be Abining Afas'e f ye, B! Aner a ta fok rif na ra f ye, B. Aner a ta fok kut kukoor ne a tsr ashi kus, a ra b a ta s ashi kutser warak.

Mi aYohana ne i f be yin be agbang kuto ye, koangan afe a ta fok rif kuzarap riya ri ta se kayr kufumung na: Aner aya ne a tin barang ikng ikak natoon'e, t, Adakunom t ku barang mo amaan risam wu gip riya a ta zibir kayr kufumung na.
Aner aya a ta tk ikng ikak kayr ikng iya a ta zibir kayr kufumung kuzarap na, Adakunom t sok ishorong kanu kafu kayr kakon kutser ne kayr kuwp kuzhl'e ame, aya a ta f itak'e kayr kufumung na.
Wu aner aya tin taas ikr na, f ye, Ei, Mi saase kyrna. Anong. B, Agwm gwm yir, aYeso.
Ritek Agwm gwm yir aYeso ra sor mak be ner ta nye fe Adakunom. Anong!
